Item.talkText: Let me take care of it.
Item.label: 슈크리나-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: Let me take care of it!
Item.label: 바론-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: It's annoying…
Item.label: 에단-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: Where should we go?
Item.label: 세실리아-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: Consider it done.
Item.label: 마리애나-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: I'll be back.
Item.label: 우리스-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: I'll come back soon.
Item.label: 아르카스-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: I'll bring it soon.
Item.label: 노아-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: Where are you sending me to?
Item.label: 리뮤라-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.talkText: Give me the order.
Item.label: 이베트-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.name: Shucri
Item.talkText: See you soon!
Item.label: 에디스-지도에서 파견을 시킬 때 나타나는 대사

Item.name: Pope
Item.talkText: …Didn't you say you felt strong energy coming from here?
Item.label: 교황일당이 마녀사냥 중 모카모리를 발견하고 실망하는 교황

Item.name: Crown
Item.talkText: …We are pulling out.

Item.name: Crown
Item.talkText: Before we all die.
Item.label: 모카모리 안에 있는 힘의 정체를 눈치채고 철수한다는 크라운의 대사

Item.name: WarriorCatched
Item.talkText: Le… Let me go!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …Let me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you just give me an order?

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Have a good sleep! Master!
Item.label: 모카가 침대에 누워 잘때 집사가 인사하는 말.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We got lots of nutrition today, father.
It won't be long before we are one.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father, your plan will come true.

Item.name: libro
Item.label: 집사가 큰 책을 들때 내는 기합소리

Item.name: Warrior_1
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, you guys were hiding here?

Item.name: Warrior_3
Item.talkText: Ugh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll give you guys a chance. I'm very generous.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will spare your lives if you serve me!

Item.name: Warrior_1
Item.talkText: Re… Really?

Item.name: Warrior_3
Item.talkText: What are you saying? Are you begging for your life?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And what use would such weakings have?

Item.name: Warrior_3
Item.talkText: Eek…!! I knew it!!

Item.name: warrior_1
Item.talkText: Ee… Eek…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oooh~ Impressive!
Item.label: 비틀거리며 일어나는 용사에게 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's the way to Lunata Spring… Could there hideout be there, I wonder?

Item.name: Warrior_0_boss
Item.talkText: Is everybody alright??

Item.name: Warrior_1
Item.talkText: For now… We will be killed by the witch soon, though.

Item.name: Warrior_0_boss
Item.talkText: Don't give up!

Item.name: Warrior_2
Item.talkText: Captain. We are done…

Item.name: Warrior_2
Item.talkText: That witch exterminated the Pope's army all by herself, so how can the four of us defeat her?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Indeed, so why do you magic-less beings try to attack me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The remaining Warrior went to the north.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pity. I expected them to make it to the base…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've already absorbed Lunata Spring, so when did the magic recover?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And this magic power is akin to mine!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… Why I can't absorb this??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have the same magic power as I.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you know anything about this spring?

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: This spring was infused with the magic power of Agamo eons ago.
Item.label: '태초'라는 번역을 꼭 살려야 합니다. 아이다가 태초의 아가모, 마지막 아가모는 모카모리의 아빠입니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You dare lie to me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am the successor of that Agamo. And he is my father as well!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yet I have never heard about such enormous magic power from him.

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Of course, he doesn't know about this.

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: This magic power is mine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You… are not an ordinary deity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And I can barely notice your magic power.

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Come out.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? I've already beaten you before…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And yet you rise once more…Is this your doing?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew. It has grown stronger than before. Not that it mattered, however!

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Indeed…your blessing is unleashed in times of danger.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Y… You bastard! Was that what you were aiming for?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You cocky bastard!! I'll come back for you, you better be prepared!!

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: As long as it takes.
Item.label: 정중한 캐릭터이지만 약간은 재수없는 느낌.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: M… Master!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Your face…!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What happened!!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That cocky bastard…I will get him next time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: To lose all of my hard-earned magic power in an instant…Gah!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Did you…did you lose, master?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Lose? Watch your mouth!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: My apologies! I merely blurted out in shock…!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: May I ask what happened?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I found a spring and someone who has the same magic power as I.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Perhaps a descendant of my father.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: A being who can match you in power, on this continent…? This is a surprise.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But strangely, the kid had no magic power of his own.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Instead, he seemed to draw the accumulated magic power from Lunata Spring at will.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He was guarding Lunata Spring by infusing its guardian with the magic power.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Let's send an army and wipe them out!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This foe is out of your league.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I lost almost all magic power because I had to unleash father's power.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Unleashed all of Agamo's power? The surprises never end today.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's annoying… But I got useful information.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The magic power from the spring can definitely revive father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to report this to father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sorry. Father…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We've collected magic power for a long time… I lost almost everything in one moment.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …Are you hurt?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No matter…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As long as you're safe, I do not mind.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We can gather magic power again…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But my heart aches because of the long time you had to wait.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've waited for a long time^nuntil I found and choose you as my successor.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It is but a moment till the resurrection^ncompared to the time that I've waited.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Daughter. You need not hurry so.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've discovered that Lunata Spring is filled with your magic power, father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And a child was wielding the magic power of the spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The child…had barely any magic power, but handled the spring's guardian as if he was its original owner.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So he has been revived faster than I.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: His name is Ida.^nHe is a primordial, as I am.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He and I warred over the dreams about this continent.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I wanted all life in this continent to gain eternity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is that why you battled each other? And why you lost your physical body?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He and I both lost our bodies from the fight.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But since we are pure-blooded deities,^nour magic power did not disappear but wander around this continent.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It seems he revived himself quickly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My power will help you to grow faster.^nAnd soon enough, you will be stronger than him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's the Lunata spring's magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is for the best.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good job. My daughter.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Become stronger.^nThen bring me the magic power of the spring he protects.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you for your understanding…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will take the spring and make sure you can come back to life.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And I will make sure to realize the world you wished to create.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Why don't you start training on this occasion?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Do you think I'm weak?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You're more than powerful enough to rule humans.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And more so, since you had the backing of Agamo's power.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That is, until today.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But you will also need to be prepared for unexpected enemies like today.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can use father's power if I have more Soul Stones.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: In other words, I can become more powerful without any training.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Didn't you make a big promise to Agamo a minute ago?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Very well, then. As I lost all magic power, I should at least train…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: For father…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I have just the place for your training. Let's go to the basement.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Shall we begin?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Haha! Try harder!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: H…help!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel better.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Nice work.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When did you make this place?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But…if we keep training here, our hideout will be crushed inside out!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You don't need to worry.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The sap under here absorbs released magic power and sends it out to places that don't have magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel like I got weakened… Is it because of this water?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait, isn't it dangerous to stay here?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This meager amount of sap can only absorb high levels of magic power released.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So this place will withstand somewhat powerful magics.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then… Can I go crazy?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'll spar with you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: LOL!? You might die!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: As I said, the released strong magic power will be immediately absorbed into this sap.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Compare to that, my magic power is weak. So when you use your power, I receive magic power from the sap.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Therefore, I can be your training partner… Somewhat.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You? LOL!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's begin, then!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You're amazing.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even with your subdued power, I am hardly your match.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It was nothing to defeat you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I am a bit tired after hours of training. It's not the same as the first training session.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: … Huh?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You might be feeling more tired, as you have released more magic power than usual.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then where did my magic power go?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This sap spreads to Pruto Mountain.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Also, the sap gives good effect on all lives that don't have any magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Sheesh, what a waste…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Well, you'll recover everything when you get a good night's sleep.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Take a rest now.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Get some sleep in the bed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll write down what happened today, as it was very unusual.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Do you… write a journal?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I didn't know you were so sensitive…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't be touched by trivialities.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: We have brought Blue Hedgehog Spine you asked.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Here is the blue stone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nice work everyone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina. Bring one more Blue Hedgehog Spine.
Item.label: 이름 오타. 슈크리에서 슈크리나로

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You, butler. Check the magic altar.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you think I prepared nothing for father's revival?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Someday, we will need to conquer the other continents, too.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You're amazing…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Where are you going now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to take down Poerta. That Stone Slab he has, it's perfect for making a magic formula.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Use the teleport magic circle if you're going down through the castle.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, is it done already? It was annoying to walk, so that's nice.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Magic Altar?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: You are here again…child of the devil.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I see that you have a new horn?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: I moved the spring's magic power stone into my body.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: To protect this spring from you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've absorbed all of Charlie's spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you have anything left to protect?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just give me that Stone Slab on your body.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Wasn't the spring enough for you? Are you taking my body too?!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You should feel honored.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The power I can draw from father during battle is about twice my current power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should've trained more.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's head south. He's probably there.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I will take on everything!
Item.label: 부하 바론이 소환되었을 때 하는 대사

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: And give back as much as I get!
Item.label: 부하 바론이 기술을 쓸 때 하는 대사. 적에게 받은 데미지만큼의 위력으로 공격하는 대사.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Tell that deity brat to come out!

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: Gah…a talking dragon?

Item.name: Soldier_2
Item.talkText: Isn't that the dragon vanquished by the queen?

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Your Queen is very weak now!

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I will take care of that kid, so tell me where your Queen is!

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Don't you want to be free!?

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: Ahhh…My Queen!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, it knows I'm out of Soul Stone magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My minions will be agitated if they know I've become weak during the fight.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need to craft magic to overpower it. But first, I need to get the Stone Slab.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My subjects can take care of themselves.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I thought she'd come about now…

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Perhaps I should break down the ramparts a bit?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: MY Queen!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Get out of my way.

Item.name: sol_3
Item.talkText: Yes, sir!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, you behaved yourself!

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I don't mess with petty humans. I'm not like you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why do the weak ones always act so noble, I wonder?

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Hee hee, stop bluffing.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I know your magic power has been weakened.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: You ARE petty!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You wish.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Sigh… That was a close one…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ahahaha! You are nothing!

Item.name: Soldiers
Item.talkText: Behold! Our queen is the greatest!

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: That was incredible!!! I'm speechless!!

Item.name: Soldier_2
Item.talkText: Praise!! Praise our queen!!!

Item.name: Soldier_2
Item.talkText: I thought you could slay dragons with a single blow.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, it was nothing!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: With this much energy… I think I can evolve the Soul Stone to the next step.
Item.label: 한 단계 '더'가 중요합니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Although the next step is nothing compared to what power I used to have…
Item.label: 얼마전만 해도 영혼석은 강력했지만 꼬맹이와의 전투로 영혼석이 초기화된 걸 말합니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it, that little bastard.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Beware. When I reclaim my power, I'll crush him with my full fury!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: At least, it will be stronger than my current state…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: How was it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not used to less magic power! It's so annoying and inconvenient!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The information you discovered is worth the loss in magic power. Don't be too disappointed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But my fallen majesty…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Your existence itself is majestic and noble.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even if you don't have Agamo's power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you really think so?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I do.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, how was it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why, I'm stronger than that beast, however weak I've become!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But you have to be careful until the Soul Stone's magic power is restored.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't worry about me. I'm super strong!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes, sir!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon, you wait here.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Are you going to summon me for battle?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: For now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My clothes get dirty when I have to fight alone…
Item.label: 한글오타교정, 재번역 불필요

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But of course. You are a noble being, my Moccamori.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I will do my best to protect you from the dirt.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel reassured.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My Queen!!!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why, did the dragon come again?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Some Patrol Units were attacked by an unidentified armed man!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is that the traitors again?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: When we traced the evidence, it seems like one person did all that.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Everyone is passed out, so we couldn't find the exact reason. I'm sorry!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Several units were defeated by a single person?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pathetic. You guys are so useless!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Well, at least they're reporting it. Please forgive them. Master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If one guy did all that… It might be a deity.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: All of them were found incapacitated in Pruto Forest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That must be the Kabanes and Mariena.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was going to absorb Mariena when it comes up more… But oh, well.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They must've been doing this because they knew my weakened power!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's too early to be sure…But it might be the Kabanes villagers who did this to gather the Pruto Forest's fruits.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But that's odd. Why would they put so much faith in Mariena alone, and attack our soldiers?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I told you! They look down on me because my magic power is weak!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, I'm going to ask that myself!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And you, report me as soon as those passed out soldiers wake up.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Yes! Excuse my leaving!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Sigh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's so annoying. How long do I have to wait to fill up the magic power… Ugh.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Let's do our best!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whatcha doing?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Wi… Witch!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you guys making weapons?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you guys did attack my soldiers.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Wh… What are you talking about!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You didn't let us gather fruits, so we were just gonna hunt wild boars!

Item.name: Underling_uris
Item.talkText: Yes! Those are just hunting gears!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you think I'd believe that?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Please! Even without your harassment, we're already in so much pain!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena, I know everything. Are they making weapons with your fire?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're responsible for this.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You… You're going to absorb Mariena again!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You fabricated false excuse that we attacked your soldiers!

Item.name: Underling_uris
Item.talkText: Let's protect Mariena!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Moccamori. Please leave this village alone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You should have thanked me for sparing you and kept your head down. Why did you invade my territory?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I should thank you for imprisoning these people in their village?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You're going to kill us all eventually…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha… It wasn't that long time ago you begged me for your life, and now you rebel openly?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Don't twist the words! She begged for our lives, but she never asked you to spare her!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I had enough of this…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's enough. Just die.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Gasp…gasp…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're stronger than before! I've absorbed quite a lot…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because of that, I'll let you live this time, too. Become stronger!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You're very weak now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you did divine that my magic power has weakened?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You thought them how to use fire~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As punishment, your permitted days of gathering Pruto fruit will be cut down to half!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: They didn't attack your soldiers!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then are you saying you are to blame?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you say one more word, I'll blow up your village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you new?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you new?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is the man who attacked the Pruto Forest patrols.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This time, he got caught attacking the castle alone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So, it wasn't the Kabanes people, but you?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Are you the boss?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Behold the noble Lady Moccamori, the true heir of the ancient king Agamo, the one who rules over all of Ürphea.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm glad I was caught.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's annoying, dealing with small fry.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: M…My Queen!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You disrespectful bastard!!!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll take care of this!!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: (Huh, he's good.)

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: (Master can't stop thinking about the Soul Stone.)

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: (Even if master's power is stronger, she just started the training.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff huff… Do… Don't look down on me!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Release the prisoners.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm just here to find a person.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Oh… Oh!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Eeeek…

Item.name: ethan
Item.talkText: Let me borrow that.

Item.name: varon
Item.label: 바론이 에단을 공격할 때 내는 기합소리

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey. Stand up.
Item.label: 짜증스런 말투로

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Sigh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't even think about fighting back.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I don't even want to move a finger.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I think I've got a cracked back… Where did I get this?
Item.label: 부서진 건 좀 심해서 금 갔다는 표현으로 바꿈. 모카의 마력으로 힘을 얻어 허리도 다시 쓸 수 있게 되는 설정을 위해 허리 다쳤다는 대사로 변경함

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Where are all the other prisoners? Am I the only one?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have no such thing as prisoners.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Humans have prisoners to threaten enemies, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't need that. I can solve everything with my power!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Phew… Then my guess was off by a mile…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You. Are you a Palace Warrior?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But where's your red scarf? All Palace Warriors have red scarves.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What to do…I don't have the stamina and gear to wander further…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey. Can't you hear me?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's hard to fight monsters…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you don't give me an answer, I'll execute you right now!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh, I threw away the scarf.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why you, you were listening the whole time?!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It doesn't matter now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I thought being a Palace Warrior was all about pride? And yet you threw it away?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: A sign…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's been a long time since the power of the palace has fallen.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I would say, that scarf is a dog collar from the Pope.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You don't like the Pope, huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was right.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: None of the Pope's dogs risked their lives to fight me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you'd have a more important goal when you charged at me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You. Why don't you work for me? I like your bravery.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Not interested.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to kill the Pope.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I want this world to be ruled by deities as before.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When we rule the world, I will let your king live.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will give you a rich life under the deities' blessings. I promise.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You said you're looking for someone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? I just explained it to you!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Who would like escaping from the Pope, only to serve the witch…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, that's nice. Less work.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Sigh…then let's hear why you want to hire me, at least.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course, Moccamori doesn't need any help from anyone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because I'm the strongest one. Ahem!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But there are so many guys that interrupt my plan.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I have to deal with every one of them, I'd be super stressed out.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have to focus on much~~~~~ more important thing.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, those soldiers are useless. I need more competent subjects.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What would I do, if I become your subject?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes! If you work for me, you will hunt down traitors.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And, kill all the traitors!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hmm, alright.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's easier than I thought.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If I can't flee from you, then I have little choice.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: However, even if I fight, I will not kill anyone.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That's my last shred of conscience as a Palace Warrior.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, kill or spare the humans, I care not.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you have to kill deities.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm sorry, but I lack the power to fight deities.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And yet you came at me, yes?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh yeah, I thought since the soldeirs are so weak, their queen must be weak as well.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I thought I'd win through sneak attacks, but I failed.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But I am completely useless now. My back is broken…you're better off discarding me.
Item.label: 슈크리나에게 당한 것

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't worry about that.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What is this…?
Item.label: 모카의 마력으로 허리가 나음

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You feel powerful, huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Bow down to me in gratitude!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: How is this possible?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I believe your Pope also received his power like this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How hilarious he was, trying to become a king with such pitiful morsel of power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You can probably defeat your Pope with your power now.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I can?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Thank you. I will use this power well. See you later, then…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ugh…what is this?
Item.label: 모카모리에게 받은 힘 때문에 오히려 모카에게서 멀어지면 고문 마법이 발동하여 괴로워하는 에단

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe! Do you think I gave you power for free?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The magic power I gave you is like shackles. Remember that I can torture you anytime.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I see…it seemed to good to be true.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nothing is easy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Give me my magic power back!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Calm down. I will be your soldier for real.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Stop your nonsense. It's nothing compare to my journey….!!
Item.label: 홍보영상 때문에 회유를 수정한 대사인데 굳이 수정 안해도 됩니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pfft… Pfft…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ah…no. I guess I can't refuse such an intense offer.
Item.label: 전기고문을 환대라고 역설

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This sword is imbued with my magic power. You can fight most deities with this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have to act under my orders.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm the owner of the power!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I feel like I'm a slave now…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Our soldiers… What?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Is… Is that!?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: How dare you carry the master's weapon!!?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You don't deserve this!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even I have not yet received one!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're…actually fuming at ME, right?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: A bit sad, to be honest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I infused you much more magic power. Stop being angry.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I… I knew it! You care about me the most!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, it's not like that… Did you say something about the soldiers?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. One of our men sent a letter saying they found a white dragon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Really? I love white dragons~~~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm leaving now! If that's White Rocky Mountain, I should fly!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I cleaned Nuuk's hair. You can go for a ride anytime.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I just took it because she gave it to me…
Item.label: 에단 회유하기 이벤트 추가대사

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I really feel much lighter. I don't need to exert strength to jump up.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ahem! That's the power of Moccamori!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My… My Queen! Are you here to save me…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're the one who sent the letter?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why don't you go down?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Be…because there are too many dragons, I had to hide.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Where is the white dragon?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I saw it goes up to the mountain top!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay, good job.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Me… What about me…?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I… can't go down…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh seriously!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: And the white dragon dropped this!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: White dragon… It's so beautiful to see it in person!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're mine now!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… I should train it!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah! I got ya!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, go under my mind control spell.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who's there!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: This is my dragon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The magic power in that leaf… was yours.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you… have so much magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, why don't you become my soldier?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: What… What?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What is this! Let me go!?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You're a very rude kid.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… Only troubles after that little brat!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't be this powerless…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You! If I had full magic power, you're nothing!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you know who I am!? I'm the queen that will save deities!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Oh, you have such a big dream for a small body?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Then, how will you save the world?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am Lady Moccamori, the true heir of the ancient king Agamo!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will revive him, and create a world for deities once again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So, you should join me.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Are you following his plan with full knowledge?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: If you revive him…do you know what he plans to do?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He'll give eternal life to everyone!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Sigh… That's an illusion. It's nonsense.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father's magic power is limitless! He can do anything once he is revived!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And get these stones away from me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's so uncomfortable!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you laughing?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Cause you're cute.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Aww, you have a pretty crown too. That's cute.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: But Moccamori. Learn about the world before you become a queen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You said what? Don't try to give me a lesson!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What… Did you change your mind?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wha… What is this!!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: It usually avoids strange magic powers…but must have confused your magic power's smell for another.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Eeeek! Eeeek!
Item.label: 모카모리가 바위에 갇혀 빠져나오려고 안간힘을 쓰는 소리

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: If you want to be a true queen, you have to see the world from the perspective of the weak.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Dispel this magic right now!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Everytime you get angry, this ugly bird magic power would be extended.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: So just relax~

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Stand up.
Item.label: 쓰러진 우버스탄에게 아이다가 하는 명령

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? I definitely struck true!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh…Oh no… I should've never used this power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have to report this to father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go to the main lobby.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go to the training place.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can go down with a chair.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to write a journal in the room and go to sleep.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm tired. I'm going to go to sleep now.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. It's time to wake up.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nom nom…yup! I feel so refreshed! It feels different today!
Item.label: 먹으면서 말하는 상황

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I changed the blanket to black goose down - I'm glad you like it.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Also, Shukrina and Varon are waiting for you upstairs.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should I go up?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't need to walk all the way.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Where should I go to?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will summon Varon for battles. I can't deploy him yet…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Let's go outside!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's catch Poerta. He's in the south.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I haven't caught Poerta.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It took a while.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I once needed only to flick him with my finger to subdue him…
Item.label: 포에르타를 이기고 나서 자신이 많이 약해졌다는 표현

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Success with your first attempt…you are amazing, master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to combine magic circles I crafted!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It took a while.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I once needed only to flick him with my finger to subdue him…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay, I'm going to make magic!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's my first time, but Electric Magic would be easier for me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This Electric Magic I just made is at type magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need a medium to give this character…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't have the right medium for now… I'll just use my magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now when I put some characters in this magic power thing, it'll be more powerful.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The magic is more powerful now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes! Just like I thought.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, I should welcome guests who have come to my castle.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to use this combined magic to the castle intruder.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There's something under the tree… Maybe Pruto Tree fruits?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My magic power drained from the training center helps to grow the fruits…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go under the father's Soul Stone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, Libro. Where can I get empty bottles?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The hardware merchant in Pruto Village sells them, but why?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just need them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Those guys can sense my weakened power.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (It's so embarrassing to use recovery potion… But just for now.)
Item.label: '전투 중 회복약(회복도구)를 쓴다'라는 내용은 그대로 직역해주세요.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I need to get empty bottles.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Magic Circle from ancient deities… I'll connect it with my room.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, you merchant!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Gasp, my Queen… If you go up like that, the tent will fall.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Give me ten empty bottles.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Oh… Yes, yes.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Get them more until I come back next time.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: W…Wait!

Item.name: merchant_item
Item.talkText: Gi… Give me gold!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You, you dare demand money from me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You can live a safe life because of me!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Of course, I know!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Thanks to you, the dragon can't attack us and the evil Pope can't do anything to me!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: B…But…

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: If I don't have gold, I can't get empty bottles too.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: I have to pay gold to order from the craft shop, and the craft shop would say the same thing, too.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Without gold, I can't buy the ingredients.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Even though you're a Queen, it's hard to give them for free…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then should I threaten those guys that bring the ingredients?

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: If you do, they won't come again and it's impossible to get the ingredients.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, but I don't have gold.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Next time, please sell unique ingredients to me. Then you will be able to get gold.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Since you don't have gold, I'll give them for free this time.
Item.label: 오타교정입니다. 번역수정 불필요

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: When you're ready, climb up the chair and go up.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This terrain is very rough. I need to find a place where I can jump.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Anyway… Where's the white dragon?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I heard the soldier that found the white dragon is hiding here somewhere… I'll find him then.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That soldier followed the white dragon and climbed up to the White Rock Mountain and couldn't come down.
Item.label: 이벤트 31번 추가대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was barely successful in squeezing out enough magic power to cast a teleport spell…

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Hyaa…!!!!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My power doesn't recover at home, either!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll find Libro first. I need to at least protect myself.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's so hard to do anything in a bird's body…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's so dangerous to go further in this body.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I… I need to be faster! So I can avoid master's attack!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I have to be useful for master's training!

Item.name: libroObj
Item.talkText: Master…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't freak out. It's just temporary.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm so hungry from shouting… Get me some food.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: How dare that ugly bird give me an order!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I must prove that I am definitely more useful to the master than that Ethan!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Do you think I'm so pathetic that I'd serve a bird as well?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey hey, It's me. Your master……

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Stop tweeting. You ugly bird.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's a relief! You recognize me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: WHAT DID YOU SAY!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That butler. I'll beat him up so much when I recover my body.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You dare kick me!?!? A mere butler!?!?
Item.label: 새 모습일 때 진짜로 발에 차임

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Once I get my body back, you're so dead!!!!!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: My exploration became much easier with her power.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I've combed the Pruto Forest…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The closest village is Kabanes?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll visit there soon.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Is that a stray bird?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (He can't recognize me.)
Item.label: 놈은 에단을 말하는 것

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I can't trust him, not yet.)

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: One day, my homeland will recover.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I have to help Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lord Agamo is never wrong.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You're a cute bird.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Varon can't recognize me too.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Varon respects me. I don't want to show myself like this.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Also we're same blood… I want to keep my dignity.)

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Gosh, I'm so pissed off.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: That empty bottle is a special container, and it's hard to craft!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Does she think a queen do anything?

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Huff huff………

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: Oh, no…

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: I put my wooden ring in the laundry and it's gone…

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: My husband gave it to me as a wedding present…

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: I'm sorry, honey…

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: That's just a wooden ring!
Item.label: 재번역 불필요

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Does it matter so much to you?

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: If you are so sorry, then go to a craft shop and order another.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: There is wood everywhere in this continent, yes?

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: That ring was made from a rare ancient tree!

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: I could've bought a sheep ranch if I sold that ring!

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: Did you find this for me???

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I didn't mean to give it to her…)

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: Thank you~ So much~~ Eat this!

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: Thank you so much. Little bird. I thought my heart was going to break.
Item.label: 반지를 찾아준 모카새에게 고마워함

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: I need to get more ingredients from more places to make new stuff…

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Since Kabanes and Lunata are so hostile to us… I can't go out from Pruto Forest.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: I miss the days when I was able to freely roam Ürphea Continent.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: If I diligently craft these weapons, then one day, will the witch will conquer all continents?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: So I'm crafting weapons that will subjugate me…

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: How tragic.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Father. Mother. I shall reclaim our family's glory.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I have a helper, too. Although she's a dangerous and mean deity.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: And that Pope… I will make sure I kill him.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Please look over me from heaven.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I'll let you kill the Pope.)

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: You little bird!! Go away!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan looks like he's looking for someone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon looks like he misses his hometown… He never told me about his village though.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina is just thinking about her family.
Item.label: 재번역 불필요

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You, butler, shall die by my hands.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Done with deployment!
Item.label: 재번역 불필요

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Huh? What's this bird?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (They'd make fun of me If they know…)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I'll just pretend I'm a bird)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tweet tweet.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: I missed you!!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: I haven't seen you for a long time, what's wrong!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You came back from Rubid Village?

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Hehe, did you know?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: What did you do to the village!!!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Oh, are you worried about your villagers?

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: But people from your town hate you!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: You know. You abandoned them and went to Mocca…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Shut up!!!!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Calm down!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Ugh… When did you……?

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: I've attached a bomb when I greeted you~

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: You get too emotional easily, Shukrina.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You are so sly!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: You have to listen to me first.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: I'll be blunt. I never touched Rubid Village.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: In fact, I'm actually suspicious about Lunata Village.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: ……Are you sure you didn't do anything to Rubid Village?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I AM!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: But I anticipated how you'd react. Understandable, since you were the village's ruler.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: I didn't want to go there. Mocca told me to go there.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: But your methods are too cruel.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: If words don't work, then you threaten with bombs. How can I not worry?

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: It's fast and valid. You know I'm the one who helped to grow Mocca's kingdom~

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Anyway, I can guarantee you I won't do anything to Rubid Village.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Nothing helps if we fight each other.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: We have to fight the Pope!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: ……Okay.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Where's Mocca?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: She went to find a white dragon and hasn't come back yet.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Huh? I'll report it later, then.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: I'm sure Lunata Village people are up to something.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: There were making weapons!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I heard Kabanes people are making weapons, too.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Well we might need to do something about it.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Oh, you're new!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: What's your name?

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: You're tall and handsome!

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Nice to meet you!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: More aggressive than I thought.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I never imagined she would attack a friend.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: When she has a goal, nothing can stop her from getting that.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: But her achievement is good, so it helps a lot.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Also, Mocca's right-hand man.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Just don't mess with her.

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: There it is!

Item.name: Soldier_2
Item.talkText: Ugh, it's so ugly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? How dare you…!

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: I got it!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eeeh! Eeeh! Let me go!?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Let the bird go.
Item.label: 모카가 새라는 걸 알고 병사들을 보호하기 위해 에단이 병사들에게 하는 말.

Item.name: Soldier_2
Item.talkText: What did you say, dude?

Item.name: Soldier_2
Item.talkText: You just joined, and you're giving us orders?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's for your own good.
Item.label: 모카가 언젠가 새 모드에서 풀리면 병사들이 큰일 난다는 마음

Item.name: Soldier_2
Item.talkText: How can you say that when you put a knife in my throat! You're scaring me!
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Go away. Now.

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: May I also go…?
Item.label: 칼 든 에단에게 놀라는 말. 하지만 에단은 모카모리가 화나면 위험하니 빨리 도망가라는 말이었음.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.label: 이전 대사와 같은 의미지만 좀 더 유하게 표현

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Uh… Ummm…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……Tweet tweet.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: So, you're the Little Queen, right?
Item.label: '너 왕꼬마 아냐?' 라는 이전 대사보다 좀 더 확신이 있는 말투

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ho… How do you know?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well, that high-pitched scream sounded very familiar.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Also, the magic power from your body too.
Item.label: 모카와 첫 만남 때 전기고문 생각

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: #@%!! I didn't want you to notice me.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That's a weird hobby. Are you spying on people in a bird's body?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Other soldiers seemed like they can't recognize you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's not a hobby. I was struck down with weird magic.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Can't you do anything with a bird's body?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Does that mean I can't use the power like you?
Item.label: 새가 됐을 때 구해준 에단에게 모카가 하는 말

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Now I know why you saved me.
Item.label: 모카가 새일 때 병사들이 잡아가려는 걸 에단이 막아서 병사들의 목숨을 건진 것

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, good job anyway.
Item.label: 모카는 '고맙다'라는 말을 잘 안합니다.

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: Well, I guess you got some skills,

Item.name: Soldier_1
Item.talkText: But we are senior soldiers! Ya know!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I…I'm back!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What happened!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I LOVE IT!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't like your motive, but I'll give you credit for that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You, are you looking for someone? Do you need my help?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You lost your friend? Or a lover?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll do it on my own.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ten years ago, my brother disappeared from this continent.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Nobody knows how and when, and no one cares.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I have no idea where to start.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's sad.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That's a surprise. You feel empathy in a human's story.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I lost my family too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My mother and father were human too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But at least you have hope that your brother is alive.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: A hope that I can't let go.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I was blacklisted by the Pope and sent here…hence all of my troubles.
Item.label: 에단은 우르파 대륙에 오기 싫었다는 말투로 변경

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This is an opportunity for me to find my brother.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, so the Pope sends people here that he doesn't like.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Okay. I will send you in the name of exploration.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then I just need to find a dude that looks similar to you?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yes. My brother and I are twins.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Then it's easy peasy!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I wish…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master…?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Please don't tell me you were talking and laughing with him!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Don't forget he pulled a sword on you, master!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Also, we haven't confirmed his royalty. He can betray us anytime.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes, indeed.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: ……Huh?

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Why…why?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This cur should be beaten down and taught a lesson.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Here is the lesson you spoke of!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Let go of me!

Item.name: ethan
Item.talkText: It's annoying…

Item.name: ethan
Item.talkText: Let's get it done quickly.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The Teleport Magic Circle is on the floor.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, Libro. Did anything happen when I was not around?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh, no. Actually, there's a minor issue.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You've got to get yourself together!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. I will report again.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Kabanes people are occupying Fruit Forest without permission.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, again?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah… It was a misunderstanding so it's the first time then?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whatever. I should've known when they made weapons.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We sent quite a sizable force, but they were no match.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's because… They installed cannons in the forest and are heavily armed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. I'll put you to a test, Ethan!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You go and take care of them!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I need to look into the Kabanes Village…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They're from Kabanes. If you catch them, you might get some clues about your brother.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hmm. If you say so… Okay.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to check it myself if you actually did what I say.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: As I said before, I'm not gonna kill humans.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whatever. I'm the one who's punishing them!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I can't believe there's still a fool that wants to be a witch's nark!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Dominate me? You're funny. You can't!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Also you witch. You better be prepared this time. A sacred mystical creature, Mammothus, is on our side, too! Hahaha!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now you're bringing mystical creatures because you're so weak.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Because you limited fruit gathering and didn't let us make weapons…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: We had to fight wild boars with our bare hands!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Then we found out we have grown a lot! We have different backgrounds from that whitey kid!
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Also we could make strong weapons, thanks to fire from Mariena!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shall I go and see Ethan now?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I had my reasons.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm so disappointed. You're embarrassing me!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That furry dude… is not to be trifled with. Its power and speed are superior to top-tier soldiers.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And that huge elephant will not fall no matter how much we attack it.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Honestly, it's too much to handle this alone. It's too much to just overpower them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll do that myself, you just help me.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I've prepared for your coming too!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Even deities will suffer from cannonballs.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah, you couldn't handle this much of attack.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I think the enemies prepared for this battle for a long time.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ugh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Chase them away. I'll let you make it up to me.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well I don't really need that chance…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Haha~ Let's see how much the furry bastard tries so hard!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Something's coming at us. Don't come.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That might be Mariena. I can smell the magic power.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Don't come…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's okay. Mariena is so~~~~ much weaker than me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ouch!!!! Did you kick me again!!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not gonna forgive you this ti…!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You dumbass!! You got a shot…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena!! You little!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pruto tree sap…?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Even you can't handle this much sap.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Most of magic power you release, will be absorbed into this sap.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That was a smart move. UGH!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It's okay. I am not scared of a witch without magic power.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Wha… What…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's your turn.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Whatever you want. Now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're so annoying.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I will never give up!!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I can never go out!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh, why didn't you summon me in the middle of the lake?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: It's difficult if you swim and go to somewhere else. We need to finish this here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (She has no clue that I can't swim at all)

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris. My magic also disappears when it reaches the sap.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I'm sorry, I can't help you more.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Prepare to die! You Witch!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: U…Uris!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Can you hear me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What happened?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well I came here, and I saw you and the furry were fighting in the water.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: As soon as you passed out, the furry came out.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: He looked exhausted too, he just left even after he saw me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What… I can't remember anything. I just can remember I came here to fight…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, good job anyway.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I think what you were trying to say was 'Thank you'?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why should I?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I'm gone, your powers will disappear too. You have to rescue me anyway?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well, that's true…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You don't have to, if you don't want to.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Something's missing…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: MY CROWN!!!!!!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Is that important?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's the most important magic power stone that transfers power!! I can never lose it!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Did it fall into the water?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That furry bastard stole it!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: How can you be sure of it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This sap absorbs incredible amounts of magic power, so if the crown fell into the water, it cannot transfer magic power to me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But there's no trouble using the magic power right now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That means, the crown has been moved to somewhere else, and it's not far from here!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You are guessing?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Lunata Village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those furries must have gone to the Lunata Village.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What about Kabanes Village?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's close to my castle, so it's risky for them to go there.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, Lunata Village people are training soldiers that will fight against me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I got information that Kabanes became allies with them…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We're going to Lunata Village!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, how could you summon me with your magic power?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I prepared a strong Teleportation Magic Circle.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: It was under the grass, so you didn't see them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So it was a trick, when you threw a flame.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Taking magic power from who has it… and sharing it with those who don't have magic power and using it as vitality…
Item.label: 15번 이벤트 푸르토 수액에 대한 추가대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course, you didn't go far.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You took the crown, huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why didn't you hide the crown? I can feel the crown is very close to me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena. You know the use of the crown.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you lure me here?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Show me what you got.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You think I'd fall for it again?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have much less magic power and try teleportation magic on me…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: If I knew you can't swim last time…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I could've just summoned you in the middle of the lake. What a shame.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The teleportation magic was stronger than the last time… Did you use my crown?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Surprised again. It's hard to handle my crown's magic power.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: It's just a start.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: The crown's magic power. I'm going to use this from now on.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris. This is enough.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Yes… Let's get ready for the next one.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew, my crown!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sure they went to Lunata village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course, they would unite with Lunata soldiers.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's annihilate the Kabanes and the Lunata bastards this time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I knew you guys will unite.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It is also how weak humans have survived through the ages.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You probably don't know about bonding with others.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, bonding!? I know human's greed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You would fight each other if I wasn't here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You should thank me, I'm the reason that you guys become allies!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why I hate humans.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's all about their desire, but they always glorify as the good!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: That's the way we protect ourselves.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You can't understand the way of living when you born as a weak being.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Greed? Yes. Greed for survival. Because I was born that way.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You are no better than I am.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But my goal is different! I want everybody…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It's not just you, everyone wants to make their dream world.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: But the world we want is all different, so we fight.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I will tell you one thing.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: The world that you dream of, we don't want it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, humans are foolish and arrogant!

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: Uris. I'm not sure we can help you much… We will try our best.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: No, we just did training.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If you didn't teach us how to make swords and cannons, we couldn't have stood up against that witch.

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: We will support with cannons as much as we can, so please hold on.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ugh…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I tried so hard!!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It's… all because of me…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I should've waited and prepared more…!!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I'm sorry. For all of you!!!

Item.name: Underling_uris
Item.talkText: Boss… Don't say that… Ugh…

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: Yes. Uris… You have done your best…

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: If it wasn't you… we couldn't make it here.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You showed our descendants that we could deal with an enemy we thought was unbeatable.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Your courage…it will be passed down to the next generation…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: And the descendants will be stronger with your courage.
Item.label: 우리스 일당의 주제를 나타내는 말이라 뜻을 잘 살려주시면 감사하겠습니다.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You've succeeded.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Uggh… Everyone…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Stop it!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What courage!! Why is that success??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: All you can do is self-consolation!? Huh!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What descendants? You are all going to die here!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I will teach you one more thing…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: How tough our bond is…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ma… Mariena!!! You can't be…!!!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Listen to me if you don't want my death to be a waste.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: … You heard me?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Mariena!!! Wake up!! Please!!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Sob……Sob…… Mariena…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: We will… survive…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: And I will…
Item.label: 모카를 향하여 하는 말.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Don't tell me… You have taught magic to me for this??
Item.label: 그동안 마리애나가 마력도 없는 우리스에게 마법을 가르쳐 준 이유. 목숨을 희생해서 마력을 전수하기 위해.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I will get back to you.
Item.label: 모카를 향하여 하는 말

Item.name: Uris
Item.label: 마리애나가 죽자 절규. 화면이 흔들리는 효과가 나오니 느낌표 많이 붙여주세요.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I could be a help!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I will beat up that evil deity!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Edis, you can't fight, not yet…!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: How can I do nothing, when that witch came upon our village?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Edis, you really love your village.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I do!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Then… Can I join too?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Of course. You will protect our village and furthermore, the entire Ürphea Continent!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Please look after the village. Edis.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Everyone. This is our very last chance.

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: Fight with our lives! Lunata Warriors!!

Item.name: warrior_0
Item.talkText: For Lunata!

Item.name: warrior_1
Item.talkText: For Lunata!

Item.name: warrior_2
Item.talkText: Fight with our lives!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't kill you guys. You chose this way.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You would have already defeated the Pope when you joined me…

Item.name: fu_0
Item.talkText: You devil…

Item.name: fu_1
Item.talkText: Evil witch…

Item.name: warrior_boss
Item.talkText: Kill us too…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won't! You insects! You will only soil my shoes!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So annoying!!!!!!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I can't believe the poison from Tobra that I collected with my life is useless…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master… You don't look good.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro. Answer my question.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What if I get it wrong?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not going to beat you up. Listen.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Humans are much weaker than deities. Even weaker than animals.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But how humans can rule continents?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Other kinds cannot follow humans' solidarity.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Maybe because they're the weakest ones.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You say the same thing.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just can't stand this thing called 'bonding'.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I hated it when they all called me 'devil'!!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That's the weight of the crown.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, you are following your plan perfectly more than anyone.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: When you achieve your dreams, everyone will praise you for that.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You think so?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I want the respect right now…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You have us.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. I really admire you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Really? Ahem!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yawn…
Item.label: 잠에서 깬 에단

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You… You!! Why are you sitting up there!!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What the, who said you can come to my room!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I was just taking a nap. I don't have a house…

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll be staying here for a while.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: So what happened?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Did I hire a madman? You're doing what here for a while?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Come down!! That's where I sleep!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What…here?? You sure are weird.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Damn you!! You used my blanket!! Now I have to burn it!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's good that you did this when I was upset. Prepare to be tortured!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: An excellent notion. Shall I prepare the burning grill? I shall set them up as you like!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Whoa, whoa. Calm down. I'm sorry. I am.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What has gotten into you?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why don't you answer me? Your answer will determine the level of pain from the torture!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I plan to give eternal life to everyone! So why do the humans call me the devil?
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Because you're fuming mad, like so…

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: DO YOU WANT TO ENJOY THE PAIN???

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Perhaps they want the present, rather than eternity.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And eternal life doesn't guarantee happiness, no?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: At least you can't lose anyone! You know what that's like! You're looking for your brother!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: True, if he were dead, I wouldn't have to suffer like this.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? What do you mean?

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What do I care about a bastard that left home without a word…

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Umm…I was trying to punish you, but now it feels awkward.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes! Command me!!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… Huh?

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: M… Master!!!!!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you need to be punished for breaking into my room. Libro!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Phew, I just stopped the poison from spreading.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Can I relieve now!? Master!? Is she okay?!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Just be quiet.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I removed most of the poison with the antidote that I made.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But the poison that's deeply spread into organs, I can't remove it.

Item.name: Cesilia
