Item.talkText: From this point, it's not medicine but magic.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You need a deity that can use powerful healing magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are you awake now!!! Master!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You were so loud, that's why.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia, what happens if I don't take out the poison from my body?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Tobra's poison is dangerous to deities too. You might die from it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You said I need a deity that can use healing magic?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it… Mariena is gone now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well even if she was here, she'd never cure me anyway.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Cecilia! Is there any other way!?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Jeez, don't panic. Mocca is still alive!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: She's strong so she won't be gone that easily!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It's just I can't guarantee she will stay with us until we accomplish our dreams.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Grrr…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, it hurts… My scars from the previous crisis seem nothing compare to this…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The only deity that existed that long and can use healing power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha… I only can think of her right now… Ugh.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Do you have someone in your mind?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay, I'm here… How can I call her?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Release my magic power a lot, maybe?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Oh hey, long time no see!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's been good, thanks to you.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I didn't think you could get the ugly bird magic off.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: So. How did you feel about being stuck in a powerless body?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I got kicked, ignored and yeah…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, it's not like I can do whatever I want. I have a favor to ask.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Okay. What is it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am poisoned by Tobra…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Please heal me…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Oh no, Tobra is not a strong monster, what happened?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Haha, you underestimated humans.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I wanted to teach you about humans, so that's good.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Humans are one of the weakest kinds, but they can give troubles to deities too.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: However, you're a strong deity and Queen, but nothing goes to the way you want to be huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Will you cure me? Or not?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I will.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Under one condition, bring the ingredients for the medicine.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: It's hidden in the Charlie Temple's inscription.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why on earth are the Tobra medicine ingredients hidden there?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: See you later~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha…Me asking a favor? What a shame…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Charlie's Temple… That's where Poerta is watching over…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know why there are medicinal ingredients in that place… Well, at least it's close from here.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: You again…

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Come… I won't kneel even if my body gets shattered 100 times.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No, I'm not here to taking your Stone Slab. I just came here to see the inscription in the temple.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Inscription? Why are you interested to see my master's inscription?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know. I won't bother you again today after I see that.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Kekeke… Who would have ever thought you'd ask me a favor?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Not a favor! It's an order!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Only I can open the temple gate! Mhaha!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then I'll smash down the temple gate!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Hahaha, you're bluffing.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: That must be super important when you ask me a favor.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Go ahead and smash it down. When the temple collapses, the inscription you seek will also be gone.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: It doesn't matter if you break my body. I'm used to getting crushed by you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, you're smarter then you look…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then what would make you open the gate?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Master… What a day.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Okay. Bring me the heart of White Rock Mountain.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: White Rock Moutain? I was just there… I need to go back then. So annoying.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Where's the White Rock Mountain's heart you're talking about?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: It's in the center of the mountain. Look for a cave around there or something.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Will you really open the gate if I bring it to you?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Of course. If you can. Hahaha!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just wait.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Bring the heart of White Rock Mountain. If you can!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Hahaha! Take this with you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you giving me this?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Well, let's just say I'm in a good mood.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did he say it's a heart because the color is red?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When I pull this out, the nearby golems will be summoned around me, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Poerta wants me to deal with them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh, what am I waiting for?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay~~ Come out!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Then why Poerta asked me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, it's a landslide.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master!! This shake is…!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Why I can feel the shaking here?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh no… Master, Is there any chance that you took out the Heart of White Rock Mountain?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just took a piece.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're saying the thing woke up because of that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The whole mountain is a golem???

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: To be clear, it's the half of the White Rock Mountain.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've read about White Rock Mountain from the ancient books but I thought it was just a myth… I didn't know it would actually move!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If that's true, then that monster should not reach this place!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is it that dangerous?? Is it stronger than me?? St… Stronger…?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That is irrelevant.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If the monster comes here, our hideout and even Agamo's Soul Stone will be destroyed!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it… That Poerta bastard was aiming for that!!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You have to end this before it arrives here!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… Poerta… The bastard led that thing to me!!!!
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will kill him once I get the inscription!!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: That… That is…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Here, it's the heart of White Rock Mountain.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: What, did nothing happen when you take this?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, yes. There was.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who would've thought that I'd have a fight with a mountain!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: M… Monster!!!! How did you!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: To be honest, you are the one who looks like a monster.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just open the gate to the inscription.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't tell me you're gonna do something to me because you absorbed that thing.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: I feel powerful… More than when I picked up Charlie's Magic Stone…
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't forget I fought with White Rock Mountain.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Hahaha, of course, you are stronger than I am.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: But also don't forget I am the key to the inscription.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Withstand my attack 10 times!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: However, if you strike back at me, you will never see the inscription!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek… You better keep your word!!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… You actually withstood my attacks.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Could you stand 10 more?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You stop it! If you say more, I'm gonna destroy the spring too!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Al…Alright. I became stronger thanks to you and I let my anger out, so I'll repay you.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Okay, I opened the gate.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: But why do you want to see the inscription? It's probably useless to you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: I opened the temple's gate. Follow that way.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The gate looks like there are monsters in there, not medicine…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… My stomach hurts more and more.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: …… Well, I'll be okay.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There was a child that was loved by Agamo.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: He wanted everything that Agamo had.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eventually, the child gained everything that Agamo had.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: We feard that child.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Therefore we took Agamo's power from the child^nand divided it by four.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And so the primal war ended^nand we all fell asleep.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Waiting for the new generation that will succeed the scattered power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The one who took Agamo's power… It's Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The reason that the Temple Lords in this continent disappeared was because of him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, divided Ida's power into four?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There are four temples in this continent. There was strong magic power like my father's in Lutana Spring. That means…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That means Ida's power has been sealed, not only at Lunata Spring, but at all temples too!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But the magic power of Charlie's Spring was not on par with Luanata's. Father's power fragments should not be so weak…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Perhaps the power was not scattered evenly?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: What the!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: The… The Gate!?!?

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: This gate should never open…! What have you done?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know! It just came out!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Master's shadow is out… Then my master knew that your father's power reach this place.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: I wasn't sure about this but it was my mistake to open the gate!

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Oh… No…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You actually weren't protecting the spring, huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I see. I wondered why you were protecting a dried-up spring so fiercely.

Item.name: Poerta
Item.talkText: Master… I am sorry…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Amazing! It's one of the pieces of the scattered power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm so excited! Can I handle this power well?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I feel so good!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I need to go now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh… Even with the power, the sickness doesn't go away…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… huff……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I read the inscription so come out!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You found the magic power stone in the inscription.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Please hurr…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mom…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… What happened?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Don't worry. Poison in your body is all gone now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait… The spear from the inscription was medicine?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: To rebuild your body part that was intoxicated, I need lots of magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Isn't your magic power enough to cure me?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I wasn't sure you'd do something to me if I use my magic power and get exhausted.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: It was a backup plan. I need to protect the dragon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well good job anyway.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will give you credit when I complete to build my world.
Item.label: '내 세상의 완성'은 중요한 단어입니다. 의미를 살려주세요.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You still don't get it, do you?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Did you actually read the inscription?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: A long time ago, there was a deity that tried to rule the world.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: He was the strongest deity in the world.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: But even he lost his power and disappeared.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: And you are even weaker than I.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Can you get it now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha! Don't ignore me because I'm young!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will be stronger and stronger. I will make my dream come true even if it takes ages!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won't let my father down!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you laughing?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You won't let him down who chose you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't understand. That sounds like you're rooting for me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you're cautious about my dad.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I just want you to realize.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I'll keep an eye on you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Still can't understand…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just don't understand her…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, the magic power is too powerful, I've only absorbed a bit.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Good. It was really a close call.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I worried a lot. I'm so glad.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Phew, I was nervous Agamo's successor might be dead because of the poison.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Don't die before you build my family back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You all see now? I'm strong. I never die easily.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia, you got me extra time because you counteracted the poison.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia. Do you want anything? A vacation maybe?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Hmm~~~ I'll think about it!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: By the way, you found a part of Agamo's power?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Don't you need to report to Agamo right away?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was going to, but I want to show him when I gather everything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It takes lots of magic power to summon father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since I got one of the four divided power pieces, now I can beat up the kid from Lunata spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Get ready, Kiddo!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My Queen!

Item.name: sol
Item.talkText: Huff, huff!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's going on?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: One of Lunata Forest's deities have invaded the castle!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena is already dead… Who is that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay, now go.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I'll buy some time!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay okay~

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: You're finally here! You devil!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I'm here for Mariena!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Kid. You should know who you're dealing with!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I brought a secret weapon that Mariena kept, so you better be prepared!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Even Mariena was cautious of the staff's power! It's too dangerous!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Edis! I told you not to use the staff!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: You even fought with the witch!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I'm gonna go the dangerous thing too!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Ugh…!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Witch! Please don't kill this kid.

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Our village will be devastated if he's gone too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought your village is already hopeless!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Haha, I'll go easy on you because my day has been good.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: You better be prepared!!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Aaagh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena… She had this kind of weapon too?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, I guess Mariena made something else for me too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But she only thought about the magic power difference. She just shoved magic power into the staff and now it's very unstable!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Kid, if you use that you'll be consumed by the wand's magic power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh, it made the magic kiddo into a monster in a second…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And there you go.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Gosh… I ran here because I could feel the dark magic power. She's so little…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's what you get when you use the power that you can't handle.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But she's just a poor child.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Am I too late?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, let me absorb the magic power to celebrate my new strength!

Item.name: edis
Item.talkText: Grrrrrr………

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Ugh, what happened!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You almost died.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: True. Mocca saved you from the controlling.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Mister! What happened really!?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Umm… Edis… Actually…

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Ugh… What a shame!!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Hate it so much!!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I… I got help from that witch?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca is not trying to have a fight with you.

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: It's true that you were controlled by that staff. Also got help from that witch…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And I don't want to fight the Lunata people.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: We are fighting against the Pope.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You know the Pope can't come to the Ürphea continent thanks to Mocca, right?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Have you heard anything from the warriors who came over from Vavelia continent?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: They say outside of Ürphea continent, it's difficult to survive due to chaos.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Join us. We need power from deities like you.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: …… You need my help?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You're strong.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Our courage is strong enough to fight the Pope.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: No!!! Whatever you say, I won't join you guys!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh, it's annoying. Just end it.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Now we won't bully Lunata Village

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You can gather fruits from Pruto Forest, too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey hey, what are you talking about…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You heard her right? Mocca says it's okay.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: So you won't bully our village?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: What are you guys doing!!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You had a hard time, right?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Now let's defeat the Pope with me!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Let's make the village happy like before. With the power of our deities!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Eeehhh…

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I don't know!

Item.name: warrior_0
Item.talkText: E…Edis!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia, what are you doing without my permission?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Hehe, I just liked her.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Shee's so cute~~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You and I have such different tastes.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The staff that Edis kid brought, had quite magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's been good these days!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father… Finally, my hard work pays off!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: With this much power, I can deal with the guardian, too!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have to admit, I can't defeat the brat's guardian yet.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When I get my power back, I'll come back here again.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You're here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You sound like you were waiting for me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But this time, you better be nervous.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just got amazing stuff!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I know. You got one of the four pieces of the power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I can feel it from you very well.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, why are you so calm?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm super strong now! You better watch out!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I know you have gotten stronger.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But I also know you can't fully embrace the power too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just bring your guardian! I'll crush it!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Kid!! It's your time now!!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I've seen your power very well. You read the Charlie's inscription, right?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I took the power from the guy you follows.
Item.label: [중요]이 말의 진짜 의미는 신전장들을 통해 모카 아빠의 힘을 빼앗은 것임. 여기서는 마치 비문의 내용처럼 아이다가 모카 아빠의 힘을 빼앗은 것처럼 묘사.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: To build the world that I wish for.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You selfish bastard! Did you want to have everything on your own?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Why I can't make a world that I want to have?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori. You also have a world that you want to make.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: An imperfect being's dream world is also imperfect!
Item.label: 아이다가 유도한 대답에 넘어간 것임. 아이다는 진짜 신, 모카의 아버지는 가짜 신이기 때문.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I'm different! I will give eternal life to everybody.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: A world that an imperfect being dreams about is also imperfect, you say…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: What a brilliant answer. I'm deeply touched by that.
Item.label: 사실 아이다가 이 대답을 유도한 것임. 아이다가 진짜 신이기 때문.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey! That means you're wrong! You bastard!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't act like you are a god! You offend me!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Then I wonder - is your father a perfect being?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just die! That doesn't even deserve a response!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh… Huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you…you don't have any magic power!?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: This body? Of course.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: My magic power is all of the magic power from this land.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I just haven't infused it all into this body yet…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Grr… Grrr…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let… Let me go…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I'll ask you one question. Are you a perfect being?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I taught you 'fear'.
Item.label: 신으로서 모카를 성장시키기 위해 '두려움의 과정'을 느끼게 한 것임. 원문을 살려주세요.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That is all for today. If you want to reach me, grow up.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You're not enough.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……Are you letting…. me go……?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I'm very interested in you because he chose you.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I'll see you again.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: He…Help me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I couldn't figure out… his magic power at all…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What do I do to win…?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Do you have any concerns?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You were happy that you found a piece of Agamo's power though.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? I'm still excited.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel good!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've served you for 10 years, master - you can't deceive me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Please tell me honestly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha… I don't like you when you're like this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I went to Lunata spring, not long ago.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And I was crushed doing nothing.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh no, you had so much power that time…!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I see… Ida was Agamo's old enemy, I get it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just don't tell about this to other kids.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Of course. Everybody will panic when they know the existence of such a powerful being.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm worried. Do you think I can deal with him once I have all the power pieces?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: There's no such thing that's more powerful than Agamo's power. Don't worry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have one more problem.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The last piece of my father's power, that kid from the Lunata spring is protecting it.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You'd definitely win if you collect the other three pieces.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You think so? Phew…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are you going to report this to Agamo?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I embody my father, half of Soul Stone's magic power would be gone.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Aha, so you safely summoned Agamo last time because you barely had any magic power left.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. Losing half of magic power that's barely there was negligible. Of course, that's why father could only be summoned for a short moment.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Since we have to be cautious about Ida, I think it's a good idea to not to summon Agamo.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What's up?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No… Nothing.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you search into Kabanes Village?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You don't need to know.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I found traces of my brother in the towns of Kabanes and Lunata.
Item.label: 흔적이 없다-> 흔적이 있다로 수정했습니다.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But no one actually saw him. What happened, I wonder…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I'm sure there was…)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, look close again. This continent is big.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I have to find a tomb, if my mother's to be persuaded…Sigh.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My Queen!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Not again! That 'Queen'…

Item.name: sol
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did someone break into the castle again?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: No, it's not…! This time, it's the village!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That is that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You guys are miserably weak. Was that alone too?

Item.name: sol
Item.talkText: Yes…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You don't disappoint me. What is it this time? Deities Humans?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: A Palace Warrior. He had the same Palace Warrior mark on his shoulder like this guy.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Is that so?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If he has a mark on his shoulder, that means he ranks above a commander…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: There are very few Palace Warriors who can defeat all of you.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll go this time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, that sounds so fun!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan, what rank were you in when you were a Palace Warrior?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I was a platoon commander, so my rank is low.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But I've never lost in sparring. Even if he was a commander or anyone else.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I've never had a fight with the Supreme warrior though.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, you pointed a sword at me so you should be that strong. Okay. Go!

Item.name: ethan
Item.talkText: I'll be back.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I will let myself out.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why isn't he coming?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Well think of his style, he won't come here to report.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: He's probably sleeping somewhere else or looking for his brother.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm. They said he passed the castle. The Palace Warrior might be useful too.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I hope he's not as rude as the Ethan guy.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I can't believe it actually happened…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I'm looking for the missing warriors and merchants.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan. I told you to kill him! What are you doing!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You look fine! You look like you can be my soldier.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It was disrespectful to trespassing my castle but if you say you're sorry, I'll give you a chance!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Surprising. Is this little deity the reason that the Pope was so against the Ürphea continent?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Easily? Hey! Are you ignoring me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan! Teach him a lesson!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: He's my senior. I'll talk to him.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hey. Please just go this time.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The Pope is dead, and since the witch-hunt is over, she will come to her senses and stop playing king.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? What are you talking about?? The Pope is dead?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Yes. No more witch-hunting. Now you don't have to worry about other continents too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: UGH!! I'm so mad!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wanted to kill the Pope with my hands.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who did that??? Who killed the Pope?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: The Vavelian deities did.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little King. So we don't need to conquer the continent, huh?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Since there's no witch-hunting.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha… Ethan. Don't think that I'm doing this to play king.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Giving the world to humans will only result in another suffering.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm so upset that I didn't kill the Pope… But thank you, Vavelian deities!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I can prepare for grander goals other than crushing the Pope.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: W… Wait. If humans become denecklace on deities like before…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then all will become miserable!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If the King is the same as the Pope, I'll kill him!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha? You're more arrogant than Ethan!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You blocked my attack…? A mere human…??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's not like there's magic power in the sword…?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Ha, I've had several attacks from deities like you.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I got some tricks to avoid attacks.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A deity like me? Ha.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, As for me… Ethan!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro introduces me well… Well what do I expect?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am Lady Moccamori, the true heir of the ancient king Agamo!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm way different than those deities that you know.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe the Temple Lords are similar as me.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: They're young but they're candidates for Temple Lords.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? They already have power as Temple Lords at a young age?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: They're probably stronger than you think.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then all Vavelian Temple Lores must be weak.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If they need young deities to become Temple Lord candidates, that is!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was a bit interested in those deities, but it was a waste.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I lost my interest, so just go.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Are you letting me go? Now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just go while you can.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What's the catch?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You, chase that blondie Palace Warrior with all the soldiers that you can gather.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Y… Yes!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: We will assign chasers from Pruto Forest!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That blondie must've come with a deity- a Temple Lord candidate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can feel some unfamiliar and powerful magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those juicy foods deliver themselves to me these days!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Well since I know their identity… It'll go well.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: By the way, why don't you stop the conquest?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: My King is very favorable to deities.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll think about that after my father comes alive.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I don't like the King, I'll cut him off.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This is unsettling…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then at least my hometown…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That will depend on you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go now. I'll be busy from now on.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is so good! It seems to be somewhere far, but I can continuously sense the great magic power!
Item.label: 파이베리와 아이루디의 마력을 더 강하게 감지한 모카

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe I should track him down before it's too late?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They probably stationed the chaser army from Pruto Forest.

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Beat me.
Item.label: 달리기 수련 리브로 대사

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I'll beat you when I catch!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: libro
Item.label: 달리기 수련중 모카에게 잡힐까봐 무서워서 지르는 리브로의 비명

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…
Item.label: 수련하고 지침

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: There you go!

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Are… Are you okay?
Item.label: 바위를 떨어트린 모카를 걱정하는 리브로

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: It hurts!!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Aaagh…
Item.label: 바위를 들며 수련하는 모카가 힘들어하는 소리

Item.name: rockLibro
Item.talkText: Do better!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Be careful.

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Don't worry!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…
Item.label: 마력폭발 수련 후 헐떡이는 모카

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Hehe, It's easy peasy!
Item.label: 바위들기 수련 중 모카의 대사, 이후 리브로가 바위에 올라탄다.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Here I come!!
Item.label: 마법연습 수련시작하고 리브로를 향해 말하는 마법발사 기합소리

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: *pant pant*
Item.label: 마법연습 후 지쳐서 쓰러짐

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 짧은 비명 - 마법연습 수련 중 모카의 마법에 맞는 리브로

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: It stings!!
Item.label: 중간 비명 - 마법연습 수련 중 모카의 마법에 맞는 리브로

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 큰 비명 - 마법연습 수련 중 모카의 마법에 맞는 리브로

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 절규 비명 - 마법연습 수련 중 모카의 마법에 맞는 리브로

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel refreshed letting out my magic power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you think I can use this as a combat skill?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If you release all the magic power at once, you might have some trouble in the next battle.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You need some training to control your magic power so you can release as much as you want.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think I just need to practice more!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 마력명상에 실패하여 마력이 터질때 지르는 모카의 비명

Item.name: libro
Item.label: 마력명상에 실패하여 마려깅 터질때 지르는 리브로의 비명

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should've focused a little bit more… Bummer.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I like training! Let's do it one more time!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If you do training in a row, the training efficiency goes down as well as the training effect.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No, I can do it more!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: O… Okay? Let's do it one more time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How about a ball game?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh… Like when you do during the hunting practice…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've only done it for fun. But if I practice that for real, I think I can use it in battles.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes… If you practice more, you can definitely use it in real battles.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Alright, let's go get him.
Item.label: 숲속 워프존 튜토리얼 종료 후 포에르타와 싸우러 간다는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since we have all the ingredients, let's go to the room and make cure medicine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need special water to make the cure medicine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's get Dollis on the puddle in Pruto Forest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The water from it, looks perfect for crafting magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I haven't gotten the water for the empty bottles.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Catch the Dollis that is floating on the puddle in Pruto Forest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I have all the ingredients, let's make the cure medicine!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can make a red potion with these ingredients.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have to be careful when I have lost my power like now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Especially the Kabanes' furry leader dude is capable of anything because he's such an animal.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go to Kabanes once we're ready.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Please get some sleep. You need to take care of your body.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. I don't feel the same since I lost my magic power.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Also if you are feeling alright, don't forget the training.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Alright, alright.
Item.label: 리브로의 잔소리에 약간 귀찮은 말투

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Hello. My highness.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: How was it, Master.
Item.label: 밖에 나갔다 들어오면 하는 리브로의 인사말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have all the ingredients! Let's make the cure medicine!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go and visit the merchant since the Pruto Village is close from here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Master. It's time to train.
Item.label: 수련효율이 100%가 되면 리브로가 자동으로 알려준다

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Master. Take a rest.
Item.label: 체력이나 마나가 낮으면 리브로가 자동으로 알려준다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I think of it, we need more Pruto fruits.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since Pruto fruits are quite a lot around here, I can easily get them. Let's get three and go to the room.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I still need more Pruto fruit.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There is enough magic power to enhance the Soul Stone.
Item.label: 영혼석 충전 시점을 알려주는 리브로.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I forgot the Pruto fruit. I need to gather three.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The back side of the mountain looks different.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: *Sniff Sniff* I can smell the dragon very well…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can feel the same magic power from the puddle as the leaf that the soldier gave me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think the leaf and the water will react to each other…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you sleep well?
Item.label: 밤잠 낮잠 다 포함하는 인사말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If that thing touches me, I'd drown there huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't touch that gross water… Yuck.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, I can't swim… I need to take care of him first.
Item.label: 늪 골렘을 향해 하는 대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh, so annoying. I should do teleport or go back.

Item.name: uFriend_0
Item.talkText: Now we can catch that with our bare hands.
Item.label: 카바네스 마을사람이 멧돼지를 향해 하는 말

Item.name: uFriend_1
Item.talkText: Now we can eat wild boar meat whenever we want!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those bastards, I told them harvesting fruits in Pruto Forest is forbidden. Why they are keep coming?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Can you not hear me huh??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to beat them up again!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 에단에게 발로 차이고 지르는 짧은 비명

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait… Is that the spirit of Pruto Lake?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The one who breaks the balance of the continent…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: An earnest wish from good deity came to me^nI am going to end you now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Man… This is the real stuff… That's why they ran away so fast!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena… You left so many things… I didn't know you would bring the spirit too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (What should I do. My magic power hasn't been fully recovered…)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Wow… A… Amazing…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's beyond amazing! You can't handle it with your power…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, my magic power hasn't been fully recovered!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: No, I didn't mean that…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The sword you gave me, it's really amazing.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: … What?

Item.name: ethan
Item.label: 에단이 큰 힘을 쓸 때 내는 기합소리

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That furry dude was too fast, I couldn't fully use the sword.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But with that speed, I think I can use this sword 100%.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wha… What? Are you really a human?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are going to fight with a spirit because you got some magic power from me?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ohhh!! Nice job! You're my soldier after all!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Push a little bit more! My magic power will activate soon!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? What's wrong?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It hurts so much when I rapidly use power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh no…! Does he need time to adapt the power because he's human?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If he holds the attack a little bit more, I can bring the magic power…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That spirit… It's about to dash…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan! Can you block this attack?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: *inhales* *inhales*

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just hold this attack! I'll take care of it after that!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm sorry.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll do that just one more time.
Item.label: 또 발로 찬다는 뜻

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 에단의 킥에 맞고 지르는 짧은 모카의 비명

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it, I'm thinking of the way to save a soldier who pointed a sword at me!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm caring about a human…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Fast fast, I need to think of a reason why I have to save him!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh right, that dude. He has the sword that I gave him!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just need to save him then! So annoying!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pruto Lake's spirit… The horn on the head looks exactly the same as the Crystal Cave's crystals.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe the Crystal Cave is it's hideout.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: To the Crystal Cave!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No wonder this is your hideout place.
Item.label: 스텔라 몬스터에게 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (The sap here is very shallow. More shallow than the training floor…)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I've done enough training so I can do this!)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wake up. It's over now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, wake up!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan! Wake up?!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it! You're a useful soldier that I've gotten in a long time!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You can't die without my permission! Nobody can take mine anymore!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ouch…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I almost died……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, what was that? I freaked out.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: When he bit me, all of the magic power you gave me was almost sucked out.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I think I passed out after I hit my head on the rock when I was getting out.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm so glad I didn't lose you. Because you're useful!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen. You were more shocked than I thought…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've lost my father and mother.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why I decided to become everyone's Queen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I want to make a world that nobody needs to be separated or hurt.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have the power to do that now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Anyway! You've done well, so now you're my precious soldier.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you die, my great ideals would get a mark.
Item.label: 에단이 다쳐버리면 아무도 상처받지 않게 만들겠다는 이상에 흠집이 생긴다는 것

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I thought you are an immature Little Queen, but you have a soft side of you after all.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well, those tyrants started with goodwill too though.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't think of me as those bugs.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those bastards had big dreams for their power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I'm different. I have power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not an idealist that fails.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What are you gonna do after you conquer the world?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What's going to change after you become a Queen for all the continent?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I'll explain since you seem smart.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to build Utopia!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The world that everybody has eternal life! The world without suffering!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Huh? A world of hallucinations?
Item.label: 복선용 멘트

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew. You're such a human.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can handle my father's magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My father's magic power is enormous.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So enormous that it can realize anything we imagine!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's not a hallucination. It's real!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: So you're absorbing other deities' magic power too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. I need enormous magic power for this.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Immortality is good… But what did sacrificed deities do wrong?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Even I would resist at you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, I explained to you all along and you still haven't got this?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh… No. Now I understand.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Please don't use me as a sacrifice.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's already not fair that I was sent here to this continent, and I don't want to be dead as a sacrifice.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, then be more and more royal to me!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: All you did was beat up soldiers and absorb deities…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's necessary procedure. It can't be helped!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Reason? It's all because of the benefits!!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I heard you're a team with some deities too.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You and I are different! We're doing this for freedom!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I need something too.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: So back off. Otherwise, the Little Queen will come.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Hahaha! My pleasure!! Let her come!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I've prepared a big shot for her! She's welcome!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Before that, you need to back off. It would be so annoying if you join her.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Bahahaha! Kiddo! You're good!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ugh… He's… strong like a wild boar… and very fast…!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Thanks to the witch, she didn't let us gather fruits!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: So we had to hunt wild boars with our bare hands!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: We are not some kiddo who lived without hardships - we are a level above you!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Huh? Were you just mad because of the word, 'kiddo'?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Bahaha!! Kiddo! Kiddo! You're just a kiddo!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Without hardships…?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: So this 'Little Queen' you're talking about, she kidnapped soldiers and merchants that were sent to this continent?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: More like isolating them by breaking ships…not kidnapping.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I think she's doing it for fun…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: She's a bit immature, but she'll be fine eventually.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Then why don't you join us?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The Little Queen put magic power in me and rule me now. I can't act carelessly.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And you know my personality! I hate to be owed.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Would you like to die gloriously?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Wai… Wait. Relax, she does not rule my mind yet!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Is that so? Then it'd be helpful to us if you keep an eye on that Little Queen.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What's your plan?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait, let me see…
Item.label: 저스티스의 외모를 훑는 모카모리

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My Queen! The blond soldier headed to the east side of Pruto Forest!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My Queen! He went to the Fruit Forest to this way!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My Queen! I saw he went to the Dark Stone Cave!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There are no trackers. Were they killed by the Dark Warriors?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, you were hiding.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've expected this but also surprised. You're good as Ethan.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I knew it won't work on you but your reaction is very fast.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You lured me into the Dark Stone Cave to do a surprise attack?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I bet you tied up my chasers too…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, this is not your hideout.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was right. I like you more and more!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: What do you want?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I want to ask where your friends are, but you won't answer huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (It's much different than Mariena's flame.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I inherited my father's power, but how can she be that powerful in her age…)

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Don't touch my husband!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: We're not married yet!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Whatever~~ We're going to! Just get used to it!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: *sigh* This is serious.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: That deity is the Queen of Ürphea that the Pope was frightened.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Really? She's so young!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Thank you! You saved Ürphea continent from the Pope!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Lucia. We came here to find missing men.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Why would they go missing in Ürphea continent?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No way! Did she kidnap people and torture?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who said about torturing?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just broke the ships so they don't go back.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Nice. She didn't kill humans!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She's so naive. I like her….!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It'd be fun if I keep her around me. You. Would you like to join my team?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's a shame if I just absorb you and throw away.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Phew~ I'm bigger than you, how can I be your soldier?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Hey kiddie~ Call me sis~~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your mental age seems lower than mine…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well since you look special, I'll explain it to you with mercy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going to change the world completely. I'm going to gather all the magic power in the world and give eternal life to everybody!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What do you think? Isn't it sound amazing?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What! You arrogant punk!!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I've learned some from my mother, and it takes so much magic power to make a human alive.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I was hurt when the Pope chased me.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Even Justice put a knife on my throat! Phew phew!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (How come their basic magic power is so strong…?)

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Can you please stop talking about the witch-hunt days?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Shut up! This is important!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Even Justice put a knife on my throat!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: But now we're in love!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Without the time, there wouldn't be Justice that I love so much!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Because we overcame a hard time, I'm so thankful for Justice!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you are very easy-going but you say whatever you want to say.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So what you're saying is you're so happy and everything is wonderful~~ Don't change anything~~~ Is that it?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh, what's your name?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My name is Moccamori. I'm the future Queen of your continent!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I think you should stop doing the Queen play…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You little! Just be my food!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I… I won!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Ugh… What… She's so strong.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: No wonder the Pope and Jude were scared of her.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: But you know… Lucia even got blessings from the Temple Lords…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Maybe I was being lazy for training…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, Temple Lords from your continent gave you blessings.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought so. I thought you're ridiculously strong.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: That makes two of us.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm special.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since I used some power, should I start to absorb your power?

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: It's about time…

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 모카모리가 아이루디의 공격을 막으면서 내는 소리

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't come out one by one - at me, all of you!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: We have more powerful warriors.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: We're all you got.
Item.label: 아이루디는 순진해서 저스티스의 의도를 모른다.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: You dumbass…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Those two deities have similar magic power…)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Even if they got Temple Lords' blessings, it should be weaker than my father's blessings!)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Or do they grow faster because they're pure deities?)

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Should we do it again since Eirudy is here?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (It's too much. Ida is enough already…!)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm really surprised. I had no idea other continents' power is this strong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I should go easy. I'll suppress them with my leftover power from the spring, and then absorb the magic power.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll let you go because you surprised me today.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I got her!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What!! What are you!!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Pieberry! Look what I did!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: You were fast… But do you guys have the energy to fight?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I'm alright.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I'm tired…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Then let her go this time. We don't know her full power yet, and it's dangerous.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Let me go???

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I had enough of this! Stop being so arrogant!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They're gone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is so annoying… Two Temple Lord candidates…

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I'll see you soon.
Item.label: 모카모리가 파이베리 일행을 잠시 놓아준다며 떠나면서 하는 말

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Guess who I brought you here!?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Come on in!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? What is this kid doing here?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Phew, I didn't want to come here!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I asked her to come here~
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I told her the accident with Mariena was just a tragedy from misunderstanding. right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's weird. You must be shocked and you're okay?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I haven't forgiven you!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I will just help you until everybody gets immortal lives!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you serious?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca. You know this is my power! Hehe.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Kiddo. Are you going to kill me when I let my guard down?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Yes! I will assassinate you!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I've done some test, Edis has lots of talents.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I've worked with the staff, so Edis can use it too. The power is weaker though.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca. Edis would be a great help to you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't like this too much but if you say so… Fine.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: What's going on, Mocca? You seem tired.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay so…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: OMG… There's a deity that can fight with you?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I mean your power is not fully recovered but you've stored it quite much!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: This is surprising…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need to find more springs and be stronger.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Two Temple Lord candidates are too much for me right now.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Then I'll make some amazing weapons!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro. What's the next closest temple besides Charlie Temple?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. It's the Mirac Temple in Varnado Garden.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? Varnado is Varon's hometown. I flew there with Nuuk but nothing was there.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Varnado Garden is underground in the Varnado Mountain.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha. The spring is hidden under the ground.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But we don't know the way to the gate of Varnado Garden.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: There were many paths to Varnado Garden, but somehow they all disappeared.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I heard the last gate that disappeared was around Cabanes Swamp…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If we ask Kabanes Village Chief, we might get some clue.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh yeah? Let's go ask!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Will he tell us the truth?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The village chief has no backbone. He'll tell us right away in fear!

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: … How come this noble Queen came all the way to the countryside?

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: You've limited our fruit harvest into half… Don't you think it's too cruel??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's your fault. You dummies.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: I… I had no idea! Uris occupied the Fruit Forest all alone!

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: He left the town already! Please don't look for him here! Don't torture us anymore!

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: Uris is not here! He has nothing to do with our village anymore!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't care about that furry bastard. Just tell me the way to the Varnado Garden.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: What's up with Varnado Garden?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know something. Tell me everything you know.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: I don't know what's going on, but I won't cooperate easily! You've made us suffer!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You want me to reduce half of the gathering?

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: There's a big magma monster in the swamp cave. The name is Meteornix.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: A legend has it that fairies who take care of Varnado Garden made the monster to guard the gate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So if I kill the Meteornix thing, the gate will open automatically?

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: But the gate that Meteornix guards is filled with oil.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: There is too much oil to draw out or burn off.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: But if you drop the Meteornix's core, the oil will burn off instantly and opens the Varnado Garden's gate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Let's go and get Meteornix.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: Meteornix from the swamp cave is blocking the way to the Vernado Garden.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: Get the core from him. Then throw that to the oil puddle in front of the Vernado Garden's gate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew… That spirit has the strongest power among its kind…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How did the fairies make this kind of monster?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I bet there's a gate to Varnado Garden somewhere here. Let me find that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I have the Meteornix core… I just need to find the oil puddle in the swamp cave.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's reacting too strongly…this might get hairy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's watch how it goes from the outside, just in case.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you here?

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: I'm here to see your last moment!!!

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: I'll blow up the gate!!

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: Bahaha!! Even you won't be safe If the Meteornix core explodes!

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: Die!!!! The fairy gate is just a myth! Hehehe!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm gonna kill him when I go out!!!! No more respect for the old man!!!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, I need to teleport…!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Damn it! It's too lat…!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… huff……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I almost died for nothing…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: … Nonsense. I'm Moccamori - petty explosions can't kill me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't like this. I got scorch marks on my clothes…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My entire body feels cooked…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Chief!! You will have to pay for this after I find Varnado Garden!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This road is full of magic power fog.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me go a little further.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: How can a stranger come here…!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't tell me you planted the Meteornix here!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How did a mere fairy like you gather such great magic power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It seems Mirac Spring is here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This blue light is the magic power from the spring!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The magic power emanating from this long-hidden spring is incredible. This exceeds Charlie's spring by far!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: You must also be a deity who came here for the spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know it well. So, guide me to the spring!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Unfortunately, the Temple gate is sealed by an unbreakable barrier.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I'm not going to break the barrier…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Interesting. Do you want to die?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: If I was afraid to die, this land would have already been taken by another.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: There were many who coveted this land besides you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're pretty confident.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You believe that if I hurt you, then the Temple gate won't open, right?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: There is a condition.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: If you came all this way, after defeating Meteornix who guarded the east…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Then you might be the savior we were waiting for.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: … A savior?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: This forest has retained the spring's magic power for centuries.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Because of this, it has been invaded by Golems who require magic power…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Or dark-hearted deities who desired magic power.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: This place has been invaded especially by the tainted deities from Varnado in the west.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: So please eliminate the tainted deities of the west.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Then I will acknowledge you as our savior and open the spring's gate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. There are tainted deities in the West, huh?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I beg of you. This place will become peaceful when they are gone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (What…she has very sad eyes.)

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: You have… so much magic power…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: What is your reason… to came here…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You still retain reason.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You, how is it that you have a horn?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Noa…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me why deities have become tainted, and mere fairies are occupying the spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I already saw through that sly fairy's plan.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I heard lots of people tried to invade Varnado Garden.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But the land was in supreme condition.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I bet she did something?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Don't… harass her…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did this fairy, Noa, mess with you? I know everything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, no way. Are you smitten by a fairy?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You fool! Noa is a fairy! Her human form is just an illusion!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: …… I know…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I… had to save her…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Even though I had to make a big sacrifice…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Even if I had to give up my place…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: And I…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Protect her… within this deep darkness…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow, you are so possessed by that fairy!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm… I didn't expect this at all.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Wha… What!?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Arkas…?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I'm Noa. I'm the fairy that protects this spring.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: My duty is to keep the spring safe until the savior comes here…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: …. Varon….?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You called, Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you'd know him, as this is your homeland.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A desolate land with tainted deities - Varon, tell me all that you know.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: So, it has come to this, old friend.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori. His name is Arkas, once a secretary of Mirac spring.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But he neglected his duty as a secretary and used all the magic power for a fairy. Also he handed the spring's key over to her.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: The deities of our town tried to stop him…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But Arkas protected the fairy to whom he gave the key.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So who won?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: He was powerful, as he controlled the magic power of the spring.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But he could not overcome all of us. We defeated him in the end.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But the battle had been so intense that all fighter deities fell, bearing great wounds.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: When we woke up, all the paths to the spring had been blocked.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But Arkas had perished back then…so how…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then your homeland is tainted with Dark Magic Power because the magic power of the spring had been cut off?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Indeed. There are many Dark Magic Stones underneath my homeland.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: When Mirac Spring's influence reached this place, the Dark Magic Stones' power was purified, and actually benefited the deities.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I understand your plight.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Please wholly regain your power and reclaim the land of us deities.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I shall. You can count on me!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: What about Arkas?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just leave him be. What do we gain from fighting someone smitten by a fairy?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That sly fairy Noa probably wanted me to die while fighting him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now that I know of this dark secret, it's time to take the spring key from Noa.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Taking it away… from Noa…?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: No… I can't let you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is so annoying.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Please don't… harass her…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now he's quiet.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Arkas…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: If you go west, you will reach the tainted land of Varnado.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Defeat the tainted deities there.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Then I will open the Temple gate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's the same as the swamp Meteornix. Are you guarding the South?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is very well made.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: H… How?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Surprised to see me alive and kicking?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You were probably on your way to kill Arkas or me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you think I wouldn't be suspicious of a fairy who was occupying the spring of the deities?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Is…Arkas dead?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Sob……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whoa. Look at this place!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A spring full of magic power, with a powerful barrier that inhibits even teleportation.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If there's a teleportation device, I should be able to teleport to the hideout…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: We opened the gate to the West.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You said to get rid of him! What's all this??

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: No…a…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Spirit! Please don't attack Arkas!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: You…still held on to your reason?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I didn't know, I…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, what the heck is going on????

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Arkas died long ago, while trying to protect me.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Because I was being fool and bad people took away the fairy's necklace… Arkas had to make a hard decision.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I was so sorry for him… I brought him back with the spring's power.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: But it was impossible for a fairy to handle spring's magic power like a deity does…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: His body was revived at the end, but he became a monster full of magic power…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I had no choice but to exile him from this land.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? He died trying to save you, and you kicked him out?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: If the spring is destroyed…then he could never come back…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I will revive him by learning of the spring's power - even if it takes centuries or millennia.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So the reason the fairy land was hidden for centuries was nothing more than your romance issues?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's lame.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Humans were… mean…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Because of the humans' false dreams… Noa died…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: They appointed a priest for their immortal lives… And collected magic power in manifold ways…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: But without that necklace, a fairy's body dies…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: So I broke the taboo…and did not offer the day's vows to the spring…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Instead… I gave a new body to Noa with the spring's magic power…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Arkas! You're still alive.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: … It breaks my heart to lose my old friend.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But on the day of vows, we had to purify our land from the Dark Magic Power.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: … I couldn't wait…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: When the next year came…we could have purified the land on the day of vows…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Deities are powerful. We can withstand a year of tainted land…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But if you don't purify the land, it will become tainted by the Dark Magic Power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's true. All deities have at least some resistance to Dark Magic Power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Can't he be allowed a prayer or two for guarding the spring all his life, Varon?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Well, you see……

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Humans cannot withstand the tainted land, even for a moment. Back then, we had a duty to protect the humans.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Why do we care about humans!!!!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Why can't we do anything with our power!??

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: We have protected humans for hundreds of years. Now they should live their own!!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: …. I am sorry.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I regret the decision that I made that day.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: And now I'm trying to change this broken world by helping the queen.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You probably had influenced my decision greatly.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Now? When I lost everything?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I've protected them for hundreds of years… Why…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Why I…! I can't protect someone that I love for a minute!!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I can't forgive them…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He's getting stronger…!!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: He used to be a Temple Lord. He's using Mirac spring's magic power!!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You better watch out!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Arkas. I'll protect you this time…!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Spirit!! Help Arkas!

Item.name: arkas
Item.talkText: Graaagh…
Item.label: 아르카스가 옛 기억을 더듬으며 고통스러워하는 신음소리

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Ar… Arkas!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Are you…remembering?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Don't try too hard!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: If you think of bad memories, you might lose yourself again!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Sob… I am sorry…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Because of me… You became… Sob…
Item.label: 노아가 인간이 되길 원했다라는 내용을 삭제

Item.name: Arkas
