Item.talkText: Phew…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Are you alright…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: My head feels clearer, now that the dark magic power is gone. Phew…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I didn't think you'd save me with the power of the spring.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I am forced to see you die twice…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Is this the price for someone who doesn't deserve the spring's power…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: This wasn't your mistake.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I also didn't have any authority to use the spring's magic power.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I should have maintained the spring in accordance with the old master's will…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: But I just could not quench my desire for you.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Don't be harsh on yourself. It's all because of me…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Stop. Noa.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I don't regret it.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: No matter the cost, I chose this because I love you.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: If I was a normal deity, not a Temple Lord, I would've run away with you…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I couldn't resist the lure of the great magic power of the spring.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Despite falling into the Dark Magic Power for centuries, I never forgot about you.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: And I was thankful to you. You didn't forget about me even in this situation…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Sad… But still happy.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: But it breaks my heart. I still have the key. When the time comes, I might be able to remedy this!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: If it goes wrong, you might see me die once more.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Noa. Discard the temptation of the magic power.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Don't make the mistake I made.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: It's okay if your dream didn't come true.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: We wanted to love each other… and we did, so we were successful.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: That's all.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: If that's everything that we have…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: From now, we won't lose anything else.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: … Alright.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I'm sure I won't lose that.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Thank you…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Then I'll go and wait for you there.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Noa….?

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Let me go with you.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I'm giving up this human body, and the spring's magic power.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Arkas…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What… They're saying they're happy even though they failed?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just can't understand.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori. The temple's barrier is probably gone because the fairy gave up on the spring's magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought the fairy had a key.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Now you can be the new key.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: The spring will acknowledge you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ahem. Shall we go?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Nobody can take this away from me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's check the temple. There's might be a teleport device.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The gate is closed, no surprise.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should I just torture the fairy?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nah. If she hides from me, then that will be a pickle.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A fairy is weak but clever, so I'll lose her if I lower my guard.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's see how it goes after I grant her wish.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There it is.
Item.label: (순간이동 장치가 신전에 있다는 말)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I get tired, I can rest a bit in my room.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Another inscription? Another monster that guards a piece of power will show up!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, this is getting a bit boring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The gate has been destroyed because of the village chief.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need to use the teleport device to go outside.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't expect this…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha! This is but an illusion.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Bring it on! You might copy my appearance but not my magic power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… It even copied my power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Temple Lords may be more powerful than I thought.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I mean, even the Temple Lord candidates are a pain…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Laura of White Rock Mountain is powerful as well.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's just standing there? Maybe it's just a mirror…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: C… Creepy!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was walking, but my reflection in the mirror was just standing still!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Creepy mirror… I'm gonna break that! Something might show up then!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is this empowering time?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ask anything you wish to know.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, are you the shadow of the Temple Lord?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Then answer me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The powers sealed by the Ancient Temple Lords - they're the weapons hidden in each Temple, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I knew it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So if I collect all the powers sealed in the four Temples, then I can wholly regain the power of Agamo?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? You split the powers into more than four?
Item.label: 아직은 숨겨진 비밀. 마지막 힘이 숨겨진 장소는 모카의 아지트에 있는 푸르토 호수.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida. The one who was loved by Agamo.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He was created as the first deity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He received all blessings from Agamo.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I know that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And the power was sealed in the four springs of Ürphea, yes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida's shattered power was sealed in five places.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? There are only four springs in Ürphea.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There's another spring besides Lunata, Charlie, Mirac, and Nova?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Four springs in the Ürphea, and the highest place in this continent.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That should be the Nova Temple. It's in the sky.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So where is the fifth place exactly?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, so you only give selective answers?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Didn't you tell me to ask anything?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay, one more question, then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida. What should I do to defeat him?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I gather all the power of Agamo, can I defeat Ida?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You cannot.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it, I'm not a match for him, even after I gather father's power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is there any way to defeat him?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you do nothing, you can defeat him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you kidding me!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gathering all power is not enough, yet you want me to do nothing?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You will defeat Ida when you do nothing.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm already disappointed with you, but let me ask one more question.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then why are you helping me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is it because you know I'm Agamo's successor?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Half is true,^nthe other half is not.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, that's it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay so now I know there's might be a fifth spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need to find some clues with the butler and Varon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's so irritating it's only giving me hints.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I read the inscription, so let's go to Laura.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This place has a strong barrier. I need the teleport device.
Item.label: 특정 지역에서 귀환마법을 사용할 수 없을때 순간이동 장치가 있어야만 귀한마법이 가능하다.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I don't know anything about a spring besides the four.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But I doubt there's a place that hides Agamo's power in other continents.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: An ancient book I read recently briefly mentions a primal war.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The power of the Blessed of Agamo was split into four and sealed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I know. I read it from the inscription.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'm pretty sure the divided power was sealed in the four Temples in this continent.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Then… Were is Ida's true body sealed?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida is a pure deity. He doesn't have an actual body.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. They say when a pure deity's magic power is scattered, it will be reborn into a physical body by its will.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That's why the Temple Lords probably sealed Ida's soul, too.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is because a deity's soul is medium for collecting magic power for rebirth.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Just like there's Agamo's Soul Stone, there might be Ida's Soul Stone on this continent.
Item.label: 사실 아가모의 영혼석이 다섯 번째 샘

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm, so as time passed, Ida slipped out of Ida's Soul Stone…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But what good will finding Ida's vacant Soul Stone do? It will be empty.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We must find it.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's a special Soul Stone that had sealed Ida's soul.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That… That's it! Because the Ancient Temple Lords couldn't defeat Ida's infinite magic power, they decided to seal his soul!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: So is that all, if we find the sealing stone?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You have to have the magic power to handle the sealing stone.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Four Ancient Temple Lords barely sealed Ida.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Moccamori has to do it all alone, so she needs to be much stronger than now.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It seems like we have a long way to go.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But Ida barely came back to life. His body barely had any magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think Ida only revived his body in haste.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What I'm saying is that it might not be that hard to seal an incomplete Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If so, then I can do it by myself.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Still, I will need to gather much more magic power than now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Fortunately, I found a juicy mark!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Two kids from Vavelia Continent. They're even pure deities!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've already ascertained their location.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good job. Where are they?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: They are helping humans in Rubid Village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They're running a business in my territory???

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They haven't fully appreciated the terror of my power?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This means the deities have hidden cards that they haven't revealed to you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I think so, too. As they seem relaxed, we should be a tad careful.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And as a personal favor, don't hurt my colleague.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The blondie warrior?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He's so weak, I don't even bother. I can grant you that favor…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Thank you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This is awkward. I'm a Palace Warrior, yet I'm not stopping you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't mention this until now because you might become distressed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But worry no more. I've recovered much of my former power!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Here, here. Who needs healing next?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Feel free to come. These are the heroes who defeated the Pope!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: When did you practice healing magic?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: The method for healing humans is quite different from healing deities.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: For now, I can only heal small wounds.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Maybe two more centuries until I can revive humans like mom?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I hear that you received the power of life-giving from Revgato.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I don't know how to use it fully.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I have to spend all of my magic power to do that.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh, have you tried it before?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I'll die if I do.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Hehe, well. It does need lots of magic power.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Hey… Don't you think you guys are too cheerful?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Even you couldn't defeat the Little Queen.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: The master was being easy on her, probably.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Who in this world can face my master, except for the Temple Lords?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Also, we have the next Temple Lord of the Derkarr continent.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: We did go easy on her, but Moccamori was indeed powerful! Right, Eirudy?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Yeah. She had some temper. I think she's really hot-blooded.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: You're too relaxed. Can being too powerful be the problem?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: RUBID VILLAGE PEOPLE!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I spared your village because of Shukrina, and this is what you do?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You don't need to scare the villagers like that!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was very nice to them because of you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When you see an unfamiliar deity, you should report to me - yet you're consorting with them?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: It's because we're weak.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You'll do the same, if you're weak and have no one to turn to.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina. You're being cocky because it's your hometown.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't be sad. You need to get yourself together.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those deities are not the same as the others we've dealt with.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Are you okay!?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: It's just a small wound. I'm okay.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia. You're doing too much, it's not like you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Hehe, I'm just very motivated today.
Item.label: (독을 뿌리기 위해 파이베리 일행에게 달려들었던 것임. 이 시점에서 독 얘기는 하지 않을 것)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is it because you haven't met a powerful enemy in a while?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good. Everybody, pull out your full power!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: She's super stronger than before…

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Too strong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Phew, I'm glad I got Mirac spring's power before this.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (If not, I'd be in danger now.)

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Eirudy! Can you do more?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Of course. Let's channel more power.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Hehe, why don't we borrow the spirits' power this time?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are…you monsters?? You can get up after taking so much beating?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How much power are you hiding from me?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No. We just did our best.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: We simply did not ask for the Temple Lords' protection.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those bastards…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I'm still superior to them. But if they unleash another hidden power…)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? I didn't beat him up to death!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Justice is not breathing! What should we do??

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Use healing magic…!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: It doesn't work! Not at all…!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: This is Tobra's poison, lethal even to deities.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: So that was your plan. I really don't like you.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Then how can I cure this?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Haha, are you a fool?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Why are you asking that to your enemy?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Eirudy! Let's move Justice to a safe place!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I'll cover you. You go ahead.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ha, do you think I'd miss this opportunity?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Eek, what is that????

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh, they had a hidden trap here!!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Thank you, Eirudy!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca! You can attack as much as you would like.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: They probably can't fight back because of the warrior.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Did we lose them?

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: Hey, when are you gonna heal me?

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: My back hurts since I carried too much stuff.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Justice! Wake up already!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Should I draw a Magic Circle that connects to Vavelia continent…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I never drew any Magic Circle that goes to other continents!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: If we could bring Elysion back…

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: If Elysion knows about this situation, she'd come here right away…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I will do it too.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Things that mom did.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Even the Temple Lords have to use all the magic power of a spring to revive a single human!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: It's impossible and also Pieberry you might disappear!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: If Adrian were in the same situation, what would you do, Eirudy?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Pieberry…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: She's not coming back even with the healing…!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Don't worry too much. Eirudy. Black Joe.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I might succeed, you know.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: If you fail, we'll lose both you and Justice…

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I…I'm afraid to lose two friends at the same time.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Mom told me that the power of pure deities is not magic power, but will.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: The will achieves everything.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: You're doing it…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Don't say anything to me now - I can't be distracted from now on.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Justice, even though we've known each other for a short while…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: You're the one I can reveal about the beginning and end of the witch hunt.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: So… You are my everything in my short life.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: So don't die.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I'll be back as soon as possible.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I've researched the poison that got Mocca before, and made it impossible to be neutralized!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I made this for deities, but it's okay.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Sob!!! Why was it you, and not me?!!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: (I'm scared…)

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: (…that we may never meet again…)

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I beseech thee.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: The one I love lies unconscious.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Mercy be upon him, and upon him be tenderness.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As I sacrifice all of my magic power to thee…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Revive thee this beloved one as thou receiveth this offering.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Damn it… Wake up already! You bastard! You need to make the master happy!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Master is crying right now!!!!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: What are you saying?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: I understand you're sad but you can never do that!!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: If you'd do it I'll die too!!!!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Damn it! Damn it! Damn it!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Whatever you're thinking, no! NEVER! Not for any reason!!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: The Temple Lords and their descendants always break the secretaries' hearts!!!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: You want me to suffer the pain of losing a master during the Battle of the Spring?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Why are you being so selfish!!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Use… use my magic power too! I'm gonna die with you too!!!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Wow, Cool cool super cool!! A pure deity sacrificed herself for a warrior!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I was just trying to have more advantages for the battle, but we got lucky!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: She's out of her mind. Go overpower her and absorb her power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: SHUT UP!!!!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why do I need to stoop so low?

Item.name: cecilia
Item.talkText: Wha…what?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Are you mad? This is the best chance to absorb a pure deity!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Why would anyone refuse being fed with a spoon?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Moccamori was lost in deep thought.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca! You know I did it, right? I defeated a pure deity!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It shows my effort overcame the heritage!!
Item.label: 언젠가 세실리아가 배반하는 복선. 선택받은 모카보다 더 노력하여 아가모의 선택을 받으려는 세실리아.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Why everybody is upset?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: What did you guys do?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: They were pure deities! Weaklings like you can never defeat them, even with a horde!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: If you don't have power, use your brains, you dummies!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm quitting this right now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan, calm down.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know this isn't what I intended.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I absorb deities' magic power but never kill them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We deities still have a shred of conscience.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course, I would have needed to keep her alive anyway in order to continuously absorb her magic power…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Shut up!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Does your intentions shield you from this?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I won't ignore your childish excuses any longer.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then why don't you say 'it wasn't my intention' each time you kill someone?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You say you'll give people eternal life, yet you're crushing the happiness of others.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This is because you do as you please, without caring for others.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Do you know how paradoxical this is?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …Are you really leaving?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll torture you if you leave on your own!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Electrify me, whatever.
Item.label: 예전에 모카가 고문으로 에단을 부하로 만들었지만 지금은 그래도 모카를 떠나겠다는 말

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm not going to work with you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You won't?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then in consideration of your past deeds, I won't take away the magic power.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: If you need any help you can always come back to…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did he just ignore me? Ha? Haha…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: This is the weight of the crown. You have to deal with it.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Cecilia. I won't tolerate your rudeness to the master.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Oh, but aren't you the weakest one here?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You wash dishes in the room, and you won't tolerate what?

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: You… YOU!!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Cecilia. You need to watch your mouth this time.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You know Moccamori's code of not killing deities.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Moccamori has much on her mind right now.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: As I told you before, I do not like your methods.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ha? So everyone's saying I'm the one to blame?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mariena died because of Mocca!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And this happened because I was helping Mocca!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca! Am I to apologize for this?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… Never mind.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But from now on, don't hide your plans from me.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You heard that? Haha!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Don't leave us.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I… I like you very much.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You're the worst.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Because of you, my precious friend almost lost his life.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Also, the hero who saved Vavelia died.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I really want to knock you down right now, but I'm holding it in because I have other matters.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Even you are blaming me??

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Well, well~ I'm not the one who killed your brother though!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Yo~~ Don't give me the cold shoulder and turn around.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: … What did you just say?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I see you need to be goaded to look at me.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Don't mess with me! What happened to my brother?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Hehe, I know what happened to Ethan's brother.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Your brother has been dead for ten years now.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Do you want to know who killed him?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It's our Mocca! Ta-da!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It was when she first received power from Agamo and fought with the Pope.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: She couldn't control her power and unleashed her magic, which also swept away your brother.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Shut up.
Item.label: 느낌표 제거. 형을 싫어하는 설정으로 바뀌어서 흥분보다 감정을 죽이는 방향으로 설정했습니다.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Enough with the taunts. One more word and I'll cut you down.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Vavellia Supply Ship number 14.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Phew, I was a bit nervous because it was only a rumor, but I guess I was right.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: That was the ship your brother boarded, right?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If my colleague had died, I would have killed you as well.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Now that you seem to believe me, let me get to the point.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: The thing is…Mocca is too stuffy.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: She likes to show her power, but hesitates in action.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: When she says she needs to keep deities alive to absorb them, it's a lame excuse.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: She can grow exponentially powerful if she absorbs their souls, but she would never do that.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: She's afraid of killing others.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So I had to do extra work.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But thanks to me, previous Ürphean Lords disappeared, we built a castle and gathered lots of warriors too.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I wonder what I would have done, if I were Agamo's successor?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Look, I'm of the same clan as Agamo, just like Mocca. See the same red patterns around the eyes?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: This means I'm also eligible as a successor.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What do you want from me?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: There we go!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Let's attack Mocca. I really need your help.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca is distracted by you. Her eyes fluttered when you walked out!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Why are you thinking so much!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Your brother's revenge… Don't you want that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? There is a ruin of a castle… but not the gate that sealed the power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Would a monster come out when the gate closes and opens again?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it, I saw it…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whatever comes out, it won't be easy…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay… Come.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: THE SUN?????????

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, if it was the sun, the world would be destroyed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't know they sealed the power in the meteorite. That shows how strong the power is.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, the only remaining spring is Lunata.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I have a long way to go to deal with Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I hope Libro finds something about the fifth place…

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Pieberry! I'll give you my power. We might all live!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Ah… Ah…
Item.label: 파이베리가 죽어 망연자실하는 아이루디

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I found it!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? What are you doing here?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You. You need to be punished.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why all of a sudden??

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: What the hell are you doing!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe! Now, it's nothing to me!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Oh, you think so?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ahem! Am I not stronger than you now?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I wanted to persuade you lightly, but it just won't do.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You may have grown in magic power, but not in character.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He's huge…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I endured a lot because I cared about you.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: If I truly fought with you, you will die.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha! You'll probably lose your favorite dragon!?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Just don't kill her.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I will try…

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You see this?!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Laura. Do I need to go further?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: That's enough.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: If you need any help, call me anytime…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Thank you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, are you running away?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm exhausted. An adult like you wouldn't resort to attacking me, yes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Let me go!?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Ouch! Eeek!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing!!!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You need more spanking.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Eeek! Ouch!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It hurts!!!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You little brat!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: What are you doing out there!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know what you're saying!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You killed my old friend's daughter.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: E… Elysion. I'll take care of this here.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: I'm just here to see the face of the one who killed my daughter.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Elysion. You're probably busy gathering your daughter's magic power…

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: I'll just smack her once.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Ha… Then just be easy on her. She's special. Alright? Promise?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: AHHHHH! It hurts! It hurts! It hurts!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who the… Who are you!?

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: I'm Lucia's mother.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Lucia? I've never heard of the name!!

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: Does the name Pieberry ring a bell?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That… That was an accident! I didn't do that!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sorry she died. It wasn't a part of my plan!

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: I want to hit you one more time… But it'll be annoying if I break another's vessel, so I'll let you go.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: See you later, Laura.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: Thank you for letting me borrow the spring.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Don't worry. I had no need for it for a thousand years.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: See you.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: Hope we won't see each other again. Kiddo.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: If you don't behave like a deity, I'll spank your butt again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My head still hurts……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That was not…a simple smack…

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Ugh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How long have I been passed out?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pieberry's mother? She's ridiculously strong.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Now we should keep an eye on Cecilia.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Like before, she does things on her own.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And her ways are so cruel…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But Cecilia made lots of contribution though.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If we start monitoring her right now, wouldn't it be awkward?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We have ignored minor incidents until now.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But the fact that a deity who was influential in the continent of Vavelia has died, and that carries much impact.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: As long as their members are alive, the word will spread fast.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Then all the deities in all the other continents will rise up against us.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Also, those Temple Lords in Vavelia continents are powerful.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If things go wrong, and the Vavelian Temple Lords begin to interfere with Ürphea, this will escalate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Then Libro. Keep on eye on her.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'll definitely monitor her and report.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Any thoughts?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you think Ethan is actually mad at me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't mean to kill Pieberry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Am I responsible, as he said?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You, responsible? Nonsense.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: How dare anyone point a finger at you!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, you did what was needed, and an accident happened in the process.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan just didn't understand the problem, right?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. I told you several times.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That man will leave you whenever he feels wronged.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: See? I told you so.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmmm……

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: No… No way, master. Do you like him?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you wanna die?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'm sorry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's just… he hurts my ego.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That fool Ethan, he will realize how graceful I was when he encounters a monster and dies!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good luck with traveling the Ürphea Continent without my help!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I think you do like him!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll need to smack you now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Has your common sense returned?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's just… he hurts my ego.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should I bring him back and put him in prison until he relents?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe then he'll apologize, even if just to find his brother?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If you hate him so much, leave it to me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I can attempt to assassinate him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Never mind. How will you investigate the fifth power?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. I've sent Patrol Units to the wider areas.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Also, I've ordered the Rubid Village captains to comb the continent.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If the fifth place that has sealed power really exists, we will see progress.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good job.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should I take Nuuk to Nova Spring? It's in the sky.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I heard Nova Temple has a special barrier. So you probably can't find it with Nuuk.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I heard there's a gate to the Nova Temple somewhere on Hill of Wind. You should go to Hill of Wind.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Got it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll look forward to having some progress when I get back.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: On it! I'll definitely find the fifth place

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Don't be too sad because of the Vavelia deity.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It breaks my heart.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, I'm okay.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll be back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It looks like Nova Temple…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It seems like there's only a gate but not a temple.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Ugh…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sure this gate is the Nove Temple's gate…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Poerta opened Charlie Temple, and Noa opened Mirac Temple.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who should I ask to open this gate?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's a cliff back there.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should I ask Laura?

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Lalala~ Lalala~

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Things are getting so well without Ethan. Hahahaha.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'm the only one that master can trust.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Since Cecilia caused trouble, now I'm the 'one and only' for master!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What's up.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Is the queen here?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: You know that Ethan guy. He sent a letter!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What? Ethan?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: ……. Okay. Give me that letter. I'll give it to master.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: He said it's very important and I need to hand-deliver it to the queen!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Shhh! Don't you know I'm the right hand of the master?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Give me that letter right now. I'll report it right away.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Oh… Okay. Fine.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Let's see what he wrote on here…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What if he had a crush on master???

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Little Queen. How are you doing?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She's doing well, so don't ask about her well-being!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now that I think of it, I was too harsh on you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It was definitely Cecilia's fault.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'd like to apologize. I'll wait for you at the Crystal Cave.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I need to burn this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Burn what?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are… Are you back!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah. I just got home.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you hiding though?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Hiding? I don't hide anything from master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Give it to me.

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Gulp…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? It's Ethan's letter!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. I found a clue about the fifth place… Please check…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Hehehe~ I got a clue about the fifth place. Master will be so proud of me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Tell me later.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Were you trying to hide food from me?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You're here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you call me here to reminisce?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why did you change your mind?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you'd like to apologize, I'll gladly accept that.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Let me ask one question.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Are you the one who killed my brother?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who… Who told you that?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: So, it's true?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No… NO!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I meant to tell you sooner, but…I didn't want you to misunderstand me!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You were gonna say it wasn't your 'intention' to kill my brother?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I couldn't help it at that time!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was too young, and I couldn't control my power!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You're never going to say sorry huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan. I understand what you're feeling.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I had lost my mind because my parents died.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We are victims of humanity's greed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So let's make up…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia? Why are you here?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing! Cecilia!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Don't move.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Hehe, Mocca. We are under Pruto Lake.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You're dripping wet with sap, so you won't be able to use your magic power!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Don't try to move. It's full of bombs around you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then Ethan would die with me too!?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Why would I care?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan, you've been betrayed. So put the sword down.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I don't care. As long as I can avenge my brother…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're both really committed…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ethan~try to exhaust Mocca as much as possible.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Then the bombs will destroy her!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ethan! That's…!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ugghhh… You bastard… You're betraying me?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Do you have the right to say that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You didn't betray me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But thanks to me, previous Ürphean Lords disappeared, we built a castle and gathered lots of minions, too.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ethan! Aren't you going to get your revenge? What if Mocca gets out alive?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And the place where Mocca is sitting, it doesn't have any bombs… Huh?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So, is that it, then?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You never planned on working with me in the first place?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You have it all wrong. I hated my brother. I wanted him dead.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Unfortunately, my brother seems to be alive…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Hey! Then you could have just gone on your way!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then it occurred to me that the Little Queen became who she was because of you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Haha, Hahaha.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Damn it… I was played by that couple.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen. Come here when the sap dries.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll hold Cecilia until then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's getting dry! Just a moment!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I see. I knew it was going too easy.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ugh… When did you put a bomb inside me…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Don't be too sad. You played me for a fool, too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now everything makes sense.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You gave the Tobra's poison to the furry. Right?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Correct. Tobra's poison is too special for humans to craft on their own.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I'm the one who helped Kanabes and Lunata villages to unite. Bet you didn't know that, right?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Long time no see. Witch.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you also teach them how to make the cannonballs for their cannons?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Correct! You're catching on fast, Mocca!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I'm here to avenge Mariena!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I see. There was a reason Edis suddenly became my warrior.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I wasn't sure if the poison I gave to Uris would work on you, but it did quite a number.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I kept injecting you with the poison when you were sick in bed, but you seemed to have gained immunity and didn't get worse.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So I researched more and more and made Tobra's poison impossible to neutralize!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I wanted to test it on the deity from Vavelia. If I used it on you again and failed, you would only gain more immunity.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: The blondie warrior interrupted me so I couldn't use it on the deity, but that's okay. I just want to fulfill my goal.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What is your goal?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Finally, the day has come when I can talk about my plan!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Honestly, Mocca you were so annoying.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You act like you're so tough, but you couldn't kill a deity or even a human!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So I had to do all the work.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: The blond Warrior interrupted me so I couldn't use it on the deity, but that's okay. I just want to fulfill my goal.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Despite all I've done, you've even lost all of the magic power that Agamo gave you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: What if I was the one who inherited Agamo's power?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I think I could make the world the way he wanted by now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shut up. I'm the one father chose!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, do you think you can defeat me with that furry and a kid?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? That furry dude has magic power now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought Mariena put a Teleport Magic on you when she died but I guess you did that on your own.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: This power is from Mariena's sacrifice.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: And I completed this power with my persistent effort.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But the ever-prepared Cecilia has one more surprised planned~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Weaklings, coming at me with sheer numbers.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's all over, Cecilia.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll punish you when we return to the hideout.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: What are you…to punish me?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You're nothing without Agamo's magic power.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You are here because of me…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Hehe… Hehehe…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I wanted to leave this case in style after defeating you…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Screw that plan.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You'll all die here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: More bombs?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Many more. I've filed the cave with them from the entrance.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Move an inch and I'll blow them all up at once - so stay put.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then all of your companions will die, too!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Oh my. Mocca, what do you mean, companions?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: My little Mocca has grown up so much! She's worried about others.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: No worries. They've all risked their lives to kill you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I'm satisfied with seeing you panic.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It's a pity, but I'll have to be content with the fact that I made it this far with nothing.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Stop! Cecilia!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Bye everyone.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: What???? Why is the butler here???

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've always been suspicious of you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You've been subtly despising the master and making important decisions on your own.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You never respected the master!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: How did you come here at this moment?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I received report from the warriors saying you were talking with Ethan at the castle gate.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: At first, I thought it was a farewell… but something was off.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You care nothing for those who are useless to you…so why would you give him a farewell?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I was suspicious, and when I saw Ethan's letter, I had a gut feeling right away.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: This was Cecilia's plan!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca. I'm going to become queen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You planned from the start to unite the villages and oust me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why the rebellious villages surrendered easily after you visited them. So that they could unite and bide their time!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ha! You're clever, but what can you do? You're weak.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I will kill you first!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Li…Libro!!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I feel so GOOD! I hated to see you flatter Mocca all the time!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are you done?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Wha… What! Are you a zombie now??

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You're nothing compared to master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It doesn't matter how many times you try. It just ruins my clothes.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You're in trouble now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh… You didn't have to do this!!!!!!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Don't…don't come closer!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: If you come one step closer, I'll blow up all the bombs!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'm fast.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So what? Do you think you can remove all the bombs that I've planted??

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Go! Do it!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And I think one step ahead of you.

Item.name: cecilia
Item.talkText: Blow them all!!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You were going to blow up the bomb with your magic power huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow, Libro! Good job!!!!

Item.name: cecilia
Item.talkText: Damn it!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow, Libro! Good job!!!!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You are just… Eeek…!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I never imagined how loyal you were.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Especially Ethan and Libro. You both did an amazing job!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. I was the one who uncovered everything about Cecilia's plan.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Let's leave Ethan out of this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No. If Ethan hadn't brought out Cecilia's true colors, we would have been hit when we knew nothing.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We didn't know what she was capable of.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: …… Hmm.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I agree…this time. Ahem.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The best and safest way is to win the trust of your foes before you stab them in the back.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I gave some hints to you, Little Queen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, I thought so. You hardly put any strength into your sword attacks.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I won't forgive you for kicking me again.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I was trying to move you to a safer location.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Everybody did a good job.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… Thank you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Finally, you said 'Thank you'.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Now, this is 'bonding'.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Even if you're unbelievably strong, there are things that you can't do alone.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Friends are there for those hard times.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh no, Ethan. Friends? Behave yourself in front of the master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, it's not that bad.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I kinda understand why the Kabanes tried so hard to be loyal to their friends.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel a little bit sorry for Kabanes people.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Phew, I'm relieved.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It took time and sacrifices to make you see that.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: So now you won't be harassing the other villages, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh no, I need to collect taxes.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: … Guess we're not there yet.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What should we do to Cecilia?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She lost her consciousness because the sap took her magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will seal Cecilia's soul into a Soul Stone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll release her when I complete my world. I believe Cecilia will behave when that time comes.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah, I need to stick to my code.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So she will be taking a long nap.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: For her, it will probably be an instant.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I'm jealous of Cecilia. She'll wake up to a perfect world.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You're too gracious to a traitor.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's not like Cecilia is getting away without punishment.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She doesn't know she became a puppet but it's very humiliating.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, let's start the punishment.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Cecilia!!!! WAKE UP!!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: OH NO! I can't feel her magic power!!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: NOOOO!! Bring her back!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just go when you have the chance. So annoying.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia isn't dead. She's just taking a long long nap.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: You liar!!! She doesn't look peaceful!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What should I do with her? She's gonna cry when she wakes up.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should I lock her up, or use as a puppet after I take out her soul…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She has some talent, why don't we erase her memory and use her?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you know how? Mind control doesn't work well for humans or deities.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even if I do, it will break easily.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Submerging a deity into a spring, and the spring will absorb its magic power and soul.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But if we dip her briefly, her body will be sound but she will lose much of her memory.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I absorbed all the springs in this continent. Well, except Lunata spring. Then where I can find a spring that can erase her memory?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, there is Laura's spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The pond behind the White Rock Mountain is a spring that Laura left unused for a thousand years.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh, that sounds wonderful.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Come to think of it, I won't go there.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (And Laura definitely won't allow it.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Also Pieberry's mom… She's scary.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Ida is protecting Lunata spring…)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, you said you found some clues about your brother? Did you find him?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yes. I just need to check a little bit more.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. I hope you can find him soon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Right. I lost my memory when I drowned in Pruto Lake.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That was like… It wasn't erased because of the shock, but it was erased very naturally.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan. How long was I in the lake?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I pulled you out almost immediately.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Alright. Libro. Erase Edis' memory.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. Master.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Can you seal my soul into the Soul Stone?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon, you have too much work to do, so no.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: No! No!! BRING HER BACK!!!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So sad! Do you think your magic power can overpower the sap?
Item.label: 마력으로 폭탄을 터트리려는 세실리아를 잡고 수액으로 뛰어든 리브로의 대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you seem fine. I think the training worked well for you, not me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Thanks to you, master.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: It's too cruel to take out the soul. She's just a kid.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think I can go to the opposite side.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me talk to the soldier that saw the White Dragon.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Should I prepare for Cecilia's execution?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll summon her soulless body to use in battles.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, I almost forgot, did you say you found the clue about the fifth place?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Rubid fishers found a new island.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've searched every book and narrowed it down to places that are least mentioned.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: An island that hasn't been found for a long time. Let’s call it the Ancient Land.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How did you find it, if it wasn't discovered for such a long time?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: From the research of the Ancient books, there was a huge battle of Ancient gods. I couldn't find the story after that…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Its location is surmised to be to the northeast of the continent.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Northeast of the Ürphea Continent? I haven't seen any unusual islands while flying on Nuuk!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It probably has a special anti-magic field like Nova spring.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You can't see with the naked eye from afar, but you can see it when you get close.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We don't know the exact location, so we can't go there by Nuuk.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: For now, going on the hunch of the captain who discovered it would be the best option for us.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe I can find a way to defeat Ida there.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I think so too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That great battle of the past must be referring to the fight between the Temple Lords and Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Ancient Temple Lords were unbelievably strong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But even those Temple Lords could not get rid of Ida, so they sealed parts of Ida's power to the springs in the Ürphea Continent.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The place where the Temple Lords attempted to seal Ida was the Ancient Land you mentioned, Libro.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And there'll be the Soul Stone that sealed Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah. Also, the Soul Stone probably has enormous magic power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That Soul Stone is probably the fifth place that the mirror from Mirac Temple told me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You're wondering why Ida is guarding Lunata spring, yes?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I think the key that can release Ida himself would be the magic power that has been sealed in the four springs.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ida is doing this to find the key starting from Lunata spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Without the key, no one can touch his body anyway, so he doesn't need to take care of the Ancient Land.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. Even Ida himself won't be able to recover his body without the key.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But I am curious - why is he still at Lunata spring?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have dealt with Lunata spring's guardian several times.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He becomes phenomenally stronger and stronger every time I fight him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida keeps enhancing the guardian of Lunata spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I see.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And as his body cannot contain any magic power, he won't be able to go far.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why he let me go. He's sneakier than I thought.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won't do Ida any favors. So as shameful as it may be, I won't fight him directly.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've already called to Rubid Village captain.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good job. Shall we go to the Ancient Land now?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hey, Little Queen.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I have some questions for that Uris guy. Can I see him for a second?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do whatever you need to do. Hope you find your brother.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Thank you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Something doesn't seem right. I'm following him.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Damn it, I can't move at all.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I don't feel good… Is it because of this water?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Stop it. If all the magic power gets drawn into the sap, it'll be dangerous.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You're that witch's filthy dog.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I understand how you feel.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But please be a bit patient. The Little Queen is slowly changing.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm helping her to become a righteous ruler.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Don't make me laugh. Was that a jest?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: She can change, and I've already witnessed that possibility.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Still, a dog is a dog. Woof woof. All hail the witch!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You're not exactly without shame, either.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Your ally, Cecilia, killed the hero who saved Vavelia.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And she was exhilarated.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That's the toxic woman you allied with.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Cecilia never shied away from cruelty to achieve her goals.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If Cecilia's treason had succeeded, you would have been her next target.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I already knew about her heart.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: But she was weaker than your monarch, so would have been easier to deal with. That's why we had a temporary alliance.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You are no different than I, then.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You didn't come here just to mince words, yes?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm looking for someone. I found his track in Kabanes.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Hahaha, and you thought I'd give you any useful news?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Such dreams.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Please. My brother is…!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If you really want to know, shut up and open this gate.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Don't you think you're being too transparent?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Well, then why don't you find your brother on your own?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I plan to return to Vavelia as soon as I find my brother.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Please. My brother has a mark near his left eye.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I wouldn't know. I never met anyone in town with a mark near the eye.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Did you remember something?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I did. A mole around the eye…could it be Billy?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That's not my brother's name…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ah, for some reason he never revealed his real name.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: So we just called him Billy.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: He came here from Vavelia 10 years ago.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: !!! Where is this Billy?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: He moved to Lunata Village after staying in ours.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: He's part of the resistance, and is now hiding in the warriors' hideout.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Tell me the location!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Do you find me crazy enough to reveal the resistance hideout to you?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Although, if you let me out, I can arrange a reunion for you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Lead on, then.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Haha. Very well.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You're familiar with the locations of the guards and the patrols, yes? If we can reach the Lunata Mine while avoiding them, I'll tell you where Billy is.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Lunata Mine… It's obviously a trap.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan, you fool…you're actually falling for this? Idiot.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: This is it.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's very dark. Are you sure this is the warriors' hideout?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It needs to be so, if only to avoid suspicions.

Item.name: uris
Item.talkText: Phew…
Item.label: 우리스가 힘들어서 한숨쉬는 소리

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What's the matter?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: The sap in the prison… It sucked out all power from me, you know?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I can't even walk right now.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Go down first.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: ……… Can I trust you?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Don't you want to see your brother?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Fine. I'll go check and come back.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Kekeke!! He is so dumb!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: He is so naive! Bahaha!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Anyway, so how do I start everything anew?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Cecilia had been a huge help to make it this far…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Now Lady Mariena is no longer among us…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Lady Mariena…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: …… What am I to do?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I guess the creature found him.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I should make myself scarce. It won't do for that thing to come up here…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What… What? How are you alive?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Did you kill the thing?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ha…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You fool! Why did you lure it here!?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Damn it! My magic power hasn't recovered yet!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll face it somehow, so save yourself.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ah… Yes.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I do hope you will fight bravely and have a great warrior's death.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Damn it! And it almost worked!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How pathetic you are - betraying the one who tries to save you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Betray? He was my enemy from the start.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll be having some words with you later. Don't even try to run away.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Fortuitous timing, kiddo.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They were swept away together.
Item.label: 에단과 우리스가 드래곤 꼬리에 휩쓸려감

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Would that become a problem…?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Did I break all the bones in my body…? I can't even lift a finger.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You're alive, as expected.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It doesn't matter…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Soon the mine bugs will come out to eat the dragon.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then let me ask some questions before you die. My brother…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You are so annoying…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I lied about Billy. I just made up the name to escape! Your brother is not in our village!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: My brother raises a strange cairn when he wishes for luck. I definitely saw a cairn in Kabanes.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Try remembering the people who came to the village! He's my twin!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ahhhhh, okay. Alright.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What is your brother's name???

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ah, what was my brother's name, indeed…?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Is this a joke?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Damn it, the only person witnessing my death is a total moron.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I didn't make a habit of calling his name even when we were young, so it's a bit blurry to me.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ha… Can you remember now?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: My brother's name is Kauris.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Kauris… That's a very good name.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: My name was Kauris too.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: The villagers called me Uris for short. There was a hero named Uris in Kabanes back in the days…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh, then you might know my brother very well!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If he and I had the same name, then there's no chance that I wouldn't know about it…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Kauris…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Of course, it's not 'Nah'. Think carefully.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Hmmm… Kauris…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Oh, don't have hope that I might be your brother.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I don't.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: But just out of curiosity.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Where in Vavelia are you from?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Lalaque Village.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Lalaque…it's an amazing village full of the smell of grass and fruit.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I remember smashing pumpkins for fun.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: There was a village idiot who guarded the pumpkin field all day.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ah, I remember. I went on smashing pumpkins just to make fun of him.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Was his name Alfredo?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Yes. Alfredo.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Once, he guarded the field disguised as a scarecrow.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: He probably thought dressing up as a scarecrow would fool everyone. Haha.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then his mom came out.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And you left me as bait and bailed, right?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: That's why I always told you to practice running.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I was giving you stamina training because you wanted to become a warrior.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That was definitely not training. I became a warrior entirely on my own.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Which was possible because you gained basic stamina.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I have yet to meet anyone who could fight me on equal footing with the sword in this continent.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ha. That's just a lame excuse.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Evidently, you're still not sorry. You are the worst, brother.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: As you are the worst to me.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: To think that you're my brother…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You're still alive somehow. I'm disappointed.
Item.label: 진심과 역설 사이의 심정. 형을 증오하지만 한편으론 반갑기도 함.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I'm truly sorry for…volunteering as a supply specialist for the Battle of the Spring without telling the family.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: But I couldn't turn a blind eye and let our family starve.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I thought everything will be worth it as long as I return alive.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Idiot. The Pope didn't pay for your volunteered dispatch.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ha… I should have killed that Pope bastard with my own hands!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Mom didn't want any blood money for her son's life. Did you really think she would have been happy receiving it?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You've really messed up with Mom.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: …… I am so sorry.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ugh… I wish you were dead already.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I had my share of near-deaths, let me tell you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I was on the run from forest monsters when I finally arrived in Kabanes.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I settled down there, hoping to return to Vavelia when the Pope's reign was over.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: But before long, your witch conquered the Ürphea Continent.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I couldn't abandon the Kanabes Village and Lady Mariena who took care of me.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: So I decided to drive off that witch before I returned to Vavelia.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Aren't you going home now?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I won't, not before I have my revenge.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Also, I need to save the village from the witch.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The Little Queen is not such a bad kid,

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And most of the bad deeds were planned by Cecilia.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Cecilia wanted everyone to hate the Little Queen and drive her off the throne.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Then where do I vent my rage?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: And how can I console Mariena's sadness?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll save her.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What… What are you talking about?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's get out of here before the bugs come.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. How is that shabby man standing here on this sacred place?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He's trying to resolve the sins placed on me by Cecilia.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Listen, hairball. What happened to Mariena was unfortunate.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Tell me. How can we revive Lady Mariena?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Reviving the dead is difficult and requires all effort, even for a Temple Lord.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't revive anyone because I'm not yet a Temple Lord.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Are you…taunting me?!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You dare play with the life of another? You will burn in hell, witch!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hairball. Just shut up and listen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I also thought Mariena was dead.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But this is only half right.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She placed all of her magic power and soul into you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: To us, it seems like she's dead already.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But if we take out Mariena from you, she will return to her old self.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since Mariena went inside you only recently, we should be able to get her out.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What, is that truly possible?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Are you being merciful to this cur?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: He was the focus of the resistance - and what about Mariena?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I revive Mariena, then they won't bother me anymore, right?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I beg of you…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I will do whatever it takes…whatever you tell me to do.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I have nothing to give you…but if it is my life you want, you shall have it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Promise me that you will be gone forever.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I'll gladly become your minion! I'll become your dog!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: As long as you can revive Lady Mariena…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Become my minion?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you want to take revenge on me. Is Mariena's life more important than vengeance?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Sob…Lady Mariena…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: She took me in ten years ago, when I was crying because I had nowhere to go.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: She is like a mother to me.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Even if I defeat you and avenge the village and Lady Mariena…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I won't be able to forget her sad face when she died in my arms…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If I can erase the sight of Lady Mariena's sadness from my dreams…I will do anything.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: So please… Bring Lady Mariena back…!
