Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just know this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When Mariena comes out of you, you will die.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Look, hairball. Your body is now closer to a deity's because of Mariena's magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's a miracle. Probably because you're so sturdy and have a good vibe with Mariena.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But a deity dies when all of its magic power is gone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know what I mean?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen! Don't do it!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know about other miracles, but it always requires a great sacrifice to gain life.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: …… I am already ready for that.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Are you going to die right after meeting me?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You haven't even seen mother's face!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If I leave and come back from Vavelia, is there a chance that we cannot save Lady Mariena?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's possible.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: After a certain period, Mariena's soul will be completely absorbed by you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: …… Ethan.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Tell mother I am sorry.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: But Lady Mariena is also my mother too.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You piece of trash! Do you know how much mother cried when she saw that letter saying you were enlisting in the army?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Worse, she fainted when she heard your ship was wrecked!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And now you want to die because you want to?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Damn it! Why did I go through all that trouble to find this worthless idiot?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ethan… I'm sorry.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Witch. Begin, before it is too late.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: DON'T!!! LITTLE QUEEN!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena died because of me, so I should bring her back.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I told you not to!!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm just being responsible for what I've done.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: U… Uris?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris….!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You stupid bastard!!

Item.name: uris
Item.talkText: Eeek…

Item.name: uris
Item.talkText: Stop punching me…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You are actually going to kill me…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Are you really alive!?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris… Can you wake up??

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Hehe… Lady Mariena…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You're alive…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Thank goodness… You're alive…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: What happened?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: The witch said she'd take you out of my body…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I am so happy…. that you're alive… Sob……

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: SOBBBB……!!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Oh my…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Did…did you share some of your magic power with Uris?
Item.label: 모카에게 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I guess he was strong enough to survive.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen…… I am really surprised.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You should've told me before.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Why did you save me?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I am just a burden to you if I'm alive.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I told you. Little Queen is changing.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Don't speak like you knew this. You were fooled by her too.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Haha……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am the ruler of the Ürphea. If there's a misunderstanding with people, I have to clear it up.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I will become your minion.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Uris. Will you not return home?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I don't trust her completely - not yet.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I will have to see if she has more hidden plans.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ethan. You should go back first and tell mother.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You fool. How can I go back alone?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I will also stay until the Little Queen's work is done.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hairball. So you did keep your promise of serving me, heh?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: He means to become your minion to watch you.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Then I will stay with Uris too.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Let's all keep our eyes on Miss Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why you…

Item.name: uris
Item.talkText: Eeekk! Eeek!
Item.label: 우리스가 드래곤에 깔려 벗어나려는 소리

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Uris!! Get up, will you?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Lady Mariena…hehe!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So that's what happened.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But they look nothing like twins…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I know, right?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I've been through so much.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I got my face broken while fighting a wild boar.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: His bones were so broken that it was quite a feat to put them back together.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You should have done a better job.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You sure have been through much, Uris…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What are you talking about?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I did my best.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What's the matter? What's wrong with my face?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You were pampered, that's all.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: But Lady Mariena. Why are you so friendly with the witch, all of a sudden?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Her memory has been erased, right?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She remembers up till the time you were struck by the Tobra poison.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She has no recollection of Cecilia, so do not worry.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: There is no witch anymore.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: She promised she won't harass our village.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Then can we pick the fruit anytime we want to?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Of course~

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: So, witch…I mean…queen. What is your goal now?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Playing queen is surely not the end?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: The Pope is no more…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You don't mean to invade Vavelia, do you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't care about the Vavelian continent anymore.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I recruited soldiers because Cecilia said we needed wage war…but now I don't need them any longer.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Cecilia… Sister…

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Ugh, my head hurts.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you sure her memory is erased?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Do not worry. Even if she does remember, she will only be a minor nuisance.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So, now that you are all my minions, I will reveal my plan.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I plan to grant eternal life to all.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then nobody will die, and nobody will get hurt.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: All of this is possible with the magic power I gathered!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What do you guys think? Isn't it amazing?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Is that even possible?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My father, Agamo, planned this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I collect all the magic power from the springs on this continent, it will be possible!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Agamo…the primal deity who was called god…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: But why didn't Agamo create that world himself, then?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I've heard that he possessed unimaginable magic power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There's someone called Ida. He says all of the world's magic power is his - so you can guess what he's like, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Although he inherited Agamo's power, he didn't follow the plan.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He has returned, and is obstructing my plan.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Our enemy from now on is not the Pope nor the Warriors.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's Ida. The first deity who took away father's power.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: He must be incredibly powerful…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Can we even stand up to him?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Indeed. He is far more powerful than I.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He was so powerful that he could erase all the power I gathered for a decade in an instant.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I found his weakness through hard work.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There is a way to seal him in the Ancient Land.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I've never heard of that place.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because it was hidden.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We will go there by ship from Rubid Village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since it's hidden, there must be dangerous things there too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Everyone, get ready and let's go!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This place is so cold… Ugh…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We'll freeze to death if we stay here any longer.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The cold… It will be near impossible to withstand it without these clothes.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A small island. A suspicious Magic Power Stone and a Golem…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That Golem. It looks small, but it has immense magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Something very important is hidden there.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, show me what you've been hiding!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The water level has gone down a bit.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So this sealing stone had been raising the sea level.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's explore the other islands.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: What is that…
Item.label: 가이아 제네시스를 보고 놀란 모카모리

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That humongous giant is maintaining the seal.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida's body is sealed…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even inside the sealing stone, his aura is overwhelming…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm no match for him yet.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The seal has been loosened slightly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So Ida's magic power trickled through the crack in the seal and gathered, then reincarnated as a child.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is this made from Ida's magic power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's over. Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ancient Temple Lords were amazing. How did they make this?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good. I'm going to seal this tighter with my magic power.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Success! Ida can't use his power now!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Things are going very well! Let's go to Lunata Spring!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… The ship keeps rolling…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Sail smoothly!!!!

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: The weather is very bad in this area…

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: We can't do anything about it, so please endure.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek… I'm gonna throw up…

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: This ship has been docked for years. We had no work.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: Yes… I am the sailor that found the island…

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: But do you really have to go there?

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: Ha…

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: Yes… I found the island.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: But do you really have to go there?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course. It's very important to me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But why are you so scared of it?

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: Because there is heavy fog around the area.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: I managed to get out by retracing the route with my amazing talent…

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: But I dread going there again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What happened to the other captains?

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: They're hiding. No one wants to die because of a single mistake.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why didn't you run away?

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: If we all ran away, you'd start hunting us down, yes? This seems important to you.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: Then we will be forced to sail, so it's better to comply when you're willing to pay gold.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: We discovered a total of three islands.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: I know the routes very well because I heard it from the fleeing captains.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good. This is your chance to earn the other captains' keep as well.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: It's 10,000 gold for a one-way.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, that's a rip off!

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: I am putting my life on the line.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: But traveling from an island to another island is free.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: The routes between islands are not that dangerous.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So I shouldn't touch this sealing stone?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you do this all by yourself?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You adapted to the deity power faster than Uris…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Are you ready to pay for your sins?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am truly sorry that Pieberry had died!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't plan it, but I deeply regret what happened!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …But you won't forgive me, will you?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Forgive…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I can't even accept the fact that you're asking for forgiveness.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Justice! I was worried when you suddenly disappeared.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I shall avenge Lucia.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Don't think that you are the only one who loved the master.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: I raised my master since she was a babe. My fury is a hundredfold greater than yours.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Nonsense. I grieve a thousand times more than you.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I will kill her myself.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori, are you all right?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: We will help you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Don't push yourself too much.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You're not alone.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Justice…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Why, Ethan? Why are you with that witch?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: You can find your brother with us!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I found my brother already.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But I cannot leave the Little Queen…not yet.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I will return as soon as I see her realize her goal.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: A true witch among the deities…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: You truly tainted Ethan's mind.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: We shall execute this witch with our lives, here and now!

Item.name: eirudy
Item.talkText: Got it.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Everyone, protect the Little Queen.

Item.name: varon
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: shucreena
Item.talkText: No need to tell us.

Item.name: uris
Item.talkText: You have my word.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… Let's stop it here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (What to do? I can't wield the power of the spring fully yet…)

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Mocca. How long does it take to proceed with the ritual?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can start as soon as I get to the Soul Stone.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Then we will buy some time for you. Are you worried that you might lose magic power again?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Leave this place to us.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No. You're no match for those deities.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I know. But at least we can slow them down.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Go and begin the ritual.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: So…I can meet my dead father and mother soon…right?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: And my hometown will soon be restored, yes? I am actually quite excited by that prospect.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: So as long as we stop them, there will be no reason to fight anymore?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You can do it, Miss Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Everyone…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then I leave this place to your hands.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought I only needed to defeat the guardian…didn't think the kid was more powerful…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is frustrating, but I should come back when I find a way to defeat the kid.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: It's you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you a deity from another continent?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you here for?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I can sense very powerful magic power… I guess I was right.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Not many can kill Pieberry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am sorry for what happened to Pieberry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't intend for that to happen, and I regret it as the ruler of this continent.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Regretting makes it better, then?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Then can I kill you and regret later?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was being polite, you arrogant fool!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm quick. There's no way you can hit me with that huge staff.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek…I've never been hit with ice magic…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Try to move fast, then.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Once you're hit with my ice magic, you can never escape.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: How can I make it more painful for you…?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Should I tighten the ice?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eeekk…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (How do I break away from this?)

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Embarrassed that you can't do anything?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: This power comes from my mother.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Taste the ice I brought back from hell.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Curses…!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: You broke the binding…!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: No more games. I won't let you go!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She's about the master's age, yet quite competent…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We should investigate the deities of the other continents.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think she borrowed the magic power of an adult deity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I barely managed to break the ice with all my power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The problem was, I spent too much magic power trying to break the ice that I couldn't fight right away.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You were probably flustered because it was your first time.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You will be able to free yourself easily when you get used to it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When I get used to it…? I don't think the enemy will volunteer to be my ice magic sparring partner till then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I could see the rage in her eyes, wanting to kill me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I understand the loss of a friend, but this misunderstanding has gone too far.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Cecilia is still a pain in the neck, even after she is gone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I trusted her too much.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just need to do better from now on.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, in order to board the ship from Rubid Village, I have to pass by her.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What can I do?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: There are many magic books about ice magic.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Which means there are many solutions. You don't have to worry too much.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: However…as there aren't many ice magic ingredients in Ürphea, finding a countermeasure can be a bit inconvenient.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me the surest way.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. We may be able to craft gear that can resist ice magic with the talons of Brinicle.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've never been there… There won't be a problem, right?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It is a unique place. It is a plateau completely frozen by the touch of a spirit named Brinicle.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You will also need some clothes for the ice plateau.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Furthermore, Brinicle also uses ice magic. It may be as tricky to face it as the deity you fought.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Call Mariena.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: How can I be of help?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena. Is it possible to engulf the body in flames?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: My flames cannot block Brinicle's ice magic directly. But they can resist the nearby cold.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That would be fine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I heard Brinicle is very big and slow.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even if we get hit with ice magic, we can make some preparations first.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll face Brinicle from the front. Mariena, stand behind me and gather the magic power I release.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When my magic power is added to your high-level fire, it should work on Brinicle.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: If I'm getting your magic power, we can do this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good. I'll summon you from the Ice Plateau, so practice your fire magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro. When I can get the clothes for the Ice Plateau?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If you don't mind, could you get me Lambragon leather and Belion's hair?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I shall prepare the rest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Got it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Won't it be easier to fight with fire magic?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's not that easy.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Your specialty is lightning magic.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Of course, you CAN use fire magic, but its quality will not be on par with Mariena's.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you talking about? My fire magic should be much more powerful than Mariena's!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: True. The power of your fire magic is far greater.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is because your magic power is greater than Mariena's.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: In short, your fire magic is akin to wrapping a thin layer of fire around a powerful mass of magic power.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: While Mariena's fire magic is almost pure fire itself.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: In Lunata Village, Mariena was able to refine even rare metals with her fire.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then should I bring Mariena?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: As I told you before, Mariena's magic power is less than yours, so I don't know how effective she could be…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Warm clothes are completed.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've researched a recipe for a necklace made from the talon of Brinicle.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That was fast. I will bring the ingredients.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can feel the freezing cold.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You've endured much. Wear this to be free from the binding power of ice magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You seem to have been waiting for this moment.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: You're finally here.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: The villagers told me you'd be back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you for waiting peacefully.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'd like to talk this over, but you don't have any intention to do so, right?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I am sorry… Pieberry…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I wanted to avenge you…sob sob…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Will you listen to me now??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… Ha.
Item.label: 루나가 사라진 뒤 모카모리의 혼잣말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't feel good…
Item.label: 루나가 사라진 뒤 모카모리의 혼잣말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will go to the Ancient Land later and just rest in my room.
Item.label: 루나가 사라진 뒤 모카모리의 혼잣말

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Sob……
Item.label: 모카에게 패배해서 분한 루나

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Again, congratulations. Master.
Item.label: 이전에 축하한다는 말을 했다.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I am so proud of you.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: So this Ida fellow didn't come for us?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida can't receive the magic power leaking from the sealing stone anymore.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He won't be able to stop me now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe Ida disappeared completely.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You defeated someone more powerful than you…amazing.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Do not forget that it was I who tirelessly gathered information on your behalf, master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay okay. Well done. Libro.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can always count on you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Did you hear that, Ethan?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh. Yes Yes. You are the best.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: So now, do we wake this Agamo from the Soul Stone?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. Now I can awaken my father with my magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My father is incomprehensibly more powerful than I.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Everyone will receive eternal life!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: So my dream will finally come true?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I can really meet my deceased father and mother, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: All the forests will become fertile, and there will be no more fighting, yes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah yeah. I told you so.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: After we see this, we can return to Vavelia in peace.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If your goal was such an amazing thing, I wonder why we tried so hard to resist…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: We shed too much unnecessary blood…and was deceived so much by Cecilia.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Right, Uris. We can finally return home.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: It's okay. We were able to recognize how precious we are to each other.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: The bond between the villages was very close, for we had to face Miss Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Haha. Great friendships were forged thanks to me, then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, I will heal all the pain from the past.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: My Queen!!!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey. I'm in the middle of an important ritual!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… That… That is… That…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh. Tell me already!

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: The castle…

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: The castle has been destroyed!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Even with its special walls, it fell?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The castle has been reinforced with the master's magic power - who could have done it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who dared to attack?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who dared to interrupt this sacred ritual?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You've waited so long. My father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It took longer because of Ida, but in the end, I was able to gather more power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now wake up and make your dream come true.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You… You… How…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I heard from Laura. You have to stop now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your magic power is stronger. What happened to you!!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Laura saved me with using all the spring's magic power that she had been saving for a thousand years.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: My mother almost passed out from gathering my magic power, which was scattered all across Ürphea.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: It cost my mother a thousand years' worth of time and immense magic power to revive me.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: So it's impossible for all deities and humans on this earth to receive eternal life.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You required a lot of magic power, because you had so much magic power to begin with!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If we can share the magic power with everyone, we can all receive eternal life.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No. Sharing the magic power will not enable eternal life. We will just live a bit longer.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Besides…even immortals like me can die and feel pain.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is my business! Don't interrupt me!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No. I feel like I need to help you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then just give me your magic power!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: You can't know what problems will arise from ideals made real with forced sacrifices!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Don't be fooled, Moccamori!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What would you know?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: An immortal pure deity like you can have all the time in the world!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you afraid that everyone will become immortal like you?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master….!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I could feel the clash of great magic power from here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pieberry's friends came here for revenge.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But their magic power is still very active. How can this…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My minions are buying time.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are you…going to begin the ritual?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Wouldn't it be better to begin after you take care of them?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. Since I am more powerful.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But…my powers are unstable because it hasn't been long since I gained the magic power from the spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And if my magic power explodes once again during the fight, it's all over.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There is no magic power left to absorb from the spring.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Everybody get up. We're going to fight again!

Item.name: blackJoe
Item.talkText: Yeah, you're right!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: Of course!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Very tenacious, aren't they?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (What if the magic power explodes like when I fought Ida…)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Don't worry and trust us.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My minions are buying time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's head to the lobby and being he ritual.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Eeeek…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Father took away your power! But why are you still this strong?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are just weak. That's all.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So stop backstabbing other people and know your place.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You're so arrogant!!!! It's so annoying!!!!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You're just an incompetent girl who got lucky and was chosen by Agamo to be loved!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: If I were his successor, I would have become so much greater than you…!! Not like this!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you blaming father right now? Are you saying his decision was wrong?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're just full of contradictions.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: No… NO!! I was not!!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I…I could have been a good daughter…I mean…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then stop bothering me and tell that to father.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ugh…….

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I was waiting for you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me honestly. Father didn't call me, did he?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Well, you can't even tell him that. You are going to die here.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Shh~ don't tell father that I called you here!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You do whatever you want even with father's power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was going to come here anyway, regardless of you calling me.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Do you still think you're the best?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I have more magic power from father than you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: My current magic power is incomparable to what you received before!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Why are you so confident?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. Why, I wonder?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Cecilia……?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Cecilia!! It's me, Edis!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I can recognize you now!!

Item.name: cecilia
Item.talkText: Go away!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So annoying. Ugh…

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Ce…Cecilia…

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Has your heart changed because of Agamo…?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I simply needed allies to defeat Mocca.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Don't get your hopes up about me.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Sobbbb……

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: What… What is happening?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You're confused, right? I'll explain it to you later.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Don't tell me she has actually changed?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I think there was a misunderstanding.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: And it's too dangerous for you from here on.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Can you wait for me patiently?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ha, your confidence comes from those pawns?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yet you were defeated by Libro, who you looked down on all the time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It will be the same this time.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Shut up! I'm not going to lose to anyone!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: ……Huh? I've never seen her but she looks familiar…?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Phew…
Item.label: 부활의식을 시작하기 전 모카모리의 심호흡

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Do you know what this means?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Your dream is just an illusion.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Spring's root….?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's fight here.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I know we are pressed for time, but this is too dangerous!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That pillar of light can absorb deity magic powers so much more faster than the Pruto sap!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If we fight up there and break the Soul Stone, all the magic power that I've collected will disappear.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is my best shot. Also, I can fight freely.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master! Then I will hold her off. You should head up and…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pieberry. I am so sorry about last time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But if you keep disturbing my plan…then I can't let you be.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Moccamori…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's finish it here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is the only place nearby where we can fight.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Actually I was a bit worried… that the power might explode. hehe.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eeeeekk… What is it!?????

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I'm sorry. I needed something more than my power to overpower you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Fight with your own power! This is cheating!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: You're also borrowing your father's power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I went through so much…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And now…just when I almost made it…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is this what Mariena felt?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master…you don't mean…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: That's no use. It will just use up your magic power!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Eek…!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are you going to sacrifice yourself?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You can't go any further.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even if you beat me up, I'll never step aside. Ever.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My loyal servant. You're the one, Libro.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I won't be distracted by your words. You can't pass here.

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: My… body…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro. I'm glad I bestowed the most magic power in you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: At first, I thought it was a mistake…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you saved me from Cecilia's trap…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And you are giving me the last power I need to go on.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Eek… Master… Please… Don't go…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: (He's overcoming the binding…)

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Stop it!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe… Who's the one getting scared now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just a few more steps…and it is done…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You know how tough I am, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let go of me!!
Item.label: 이전 대사의 화자가 파이베리->모카로 변경

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master! Your minions will be here soon!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Just hold on until then!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ethan! Ethan is a good fighter! We can win if we team up!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So what if you use up all of your power, as you did at Lunata Spring?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You can gather magic power again, and complete the goal later!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't be a drama queen. I am not dying.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm tired and I am going to take a nap. Don't worry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah, and Libro.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you for being my butler.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ah ah… No……………

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Moccamori…!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Did you absorb even your minion's power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I merely took back what I gave.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ma… Master…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Curses… my magic power is almost gone, because of the revival ritual.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I channel more power, it might explode again…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Are you giving up now?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Moccamori. Perhaps your dream has already been made real.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: You have your friends with you.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Didn't you overcome hardship together?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: So now, you won't be afraid even when you get hurt.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Because your friends will heal you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why I need to protect them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew…… Remembering Mariena's teleport magic really came in handy.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Won't she come up soon?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have a thought.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Where did you move her to?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Pruto Tree's root.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I couldn't transfer her far, because Pieberry's magic power is too strong.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Phew. I was worried.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And I was so worried that you might be hurt by the pillar of light…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will take care of the rest. Go up and continue the ritual.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I took out Duroc's blessing.

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Ahhhh….??
Item.label: 힘이 빠지면서 리브로가 쓰러지는 소리리

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: What is that?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: It doesn't feel right…

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: This is…

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: This magic power exceeds those of the Temple Lords…how can such a thing exist?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Where is the Little Queen…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Mocca's magic power has been disconnected. What happened?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: … We need to take care of this first.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: The magic power is too strong.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: … Also, it's getting stronger.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Oh… Finally…!!!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Agamo is coming back to life!!!!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: And what about Mocca…?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… Is it time yet?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What happened? Where is the Little Queen?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She's sleeping in the Soul Stone.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: What are you talking about??

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Didn't she gather enough magic power for the ritual?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: … Pieberry came back to life, and disrupted the master's plan.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The master was forced to insert all of her magic power into the Soul Stone.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Is this true? Lucia is alive?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: I'll kill you if you're lying!!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Wait… I can feel something…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Hello everybody!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Were you all worried?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: …. You fool!!! Do you know how much we worried about you!?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Did you think I'd be happy when you save me by sacrificing yourself?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: But Justice, you were hurt because of me.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Gosh… You are the worst master ever!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Hmph Hmph Hmph!!!!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Sob… Sob…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I'm sorry…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Don't cry. I'm alive now.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then what happens to the Little Queen? Is she going to come here?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: …… First, we need to keep an eye on that Soul Stone.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: According to the plan, the master should revive alongside Lord Agamo.

Item.name: Luna
Item.label: 파이베리가 다시 살아나고 엄청 걱정했다가 반가운 마음에 호통치는 루나

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Sorry to interrupt but we don't have much time for the reunion.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Now Agamo is going to come back to life soon.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen!?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Where is Agamo…?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You came back!!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yay!!! You're the best, master!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You scared me…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: …. I guess she was in a hurry.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I did not expect to be revived in my daughter's body…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What? Where is the Little Queen, then??

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Where is Mocca?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Greetings. The Queen of Queens.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: We are the ones who prepared your way.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: You are my daughter's followers.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Worry not. My daughter sleeps deeply inside me.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: … Then take her out right away.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Don't say this is it!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Ethan. I'm sorry to say this but we can't.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: To materialize Lord Agamo's body, the ritual must proceed for a very long time.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I think Pieberry interrupted Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: It seems Lady Moccamori as forced to offer her body as sacrifice to revive Lord Agamo.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: As he has just been revived, Lord Agamo cannot exit from Lady Moccamori's body yet.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: On the other hand, the Little Queen won't be able to come out at all when time passes.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hey. Agamo.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You don't plan to let your daughter remain a sacrifice forever, right?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Give the Little Queen back. Now.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Lord Agamo.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: As time passes, the master will be fused with you completely.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Then we won't be able to see the master anymore.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Please think of the loyalty we have shown you…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I beg you to give our master back.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I have told you.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: My daughter is sleeping comfortably inside me.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Why do you wish to expel the one who has entered rest?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What… What are you talkin…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Do not be so impatient.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: When the new world comes, you shall all be together.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Perhaps…this won't be the dream we all hoped for?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Trust in Lord Agamo and be patient.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lord Agamo shall soon fully recover his magic power.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: We just need to wait until then.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: You are very loyal.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I'm honored by your words.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Gosh… His minion…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: He completely took all of the magic power…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I need more…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Offer all of your magic power to me.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Damn it! So it comes down to this…!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh no… They couldn't stop him…!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I don't think even Moccamori expected this to happen.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: This isn't good…

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: We are doomed…

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Fighting the Pope was nothing compared to this…

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: He is…already far more powerful than Lord Aramute…

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Grr…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I am surprised.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: That you can resist my power, if only for a second.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I got him!!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Good job! Luna!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I grant rewards to those who toiled.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Now rest in peace.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: That was the maximum-level magic…and it doesn't affect him at all…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ahh……!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Pieberry! That thing! Let's do it together!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Eirudy! Support me!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Got it!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: … How commendable of you, young deities.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… I've used all my magic power…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: No way…but I combined magic power with Pieberry…!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Had you been born a few centuries earlier, you might have been troublesome for me to handle.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Go to sleep.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What the…

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Lord Revgato…Help us…!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Revgato…?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: If that is true, then how is it that your magic power is so pathetic?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: It has been such a long time.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Merely a mass of magic power that has yet to form any personality.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Still, this is surprising. A child who can wield Revgato's magic power…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Much work did my daughter accomplish for me.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: To prepare such a fabulous feast for me to consume.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Please wake up…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is not what you wanted…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Your so-called father is absorbing everyone!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This can't be right!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Come back! Mocca!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Ha… Such pitiful beings, trying to disturb me…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Your magic power is negligible.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: You shall all disappear when I erase the old world.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Why do you resist your own father?!!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: This too, is a necessary process…!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen! You're doing great! Fight him!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master!! This is Libro! Your loyal butler!!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Don't lose yourself, Mocca!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Grrrrrrr….!!!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Away with you!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Please remember me!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You… You are?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Are you friend or foe?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Great work, everyone.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I will take it from here.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The same magic power as the master…a small child…then you are…?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It's been awhile.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Where have you been hiding?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I did not sense your presence.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Does that mean your magic power is pathetically small now?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Haha. Moccamori sealed me quite vigorously.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Thanks to her cutting off my magic power, I was able to hide completely.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: And what can you do now?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Another lecture, perhaps?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That is what I taught you once.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That magic power is not everything.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Don't call me by that name!!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I am Agamo! I have the name of a god!!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Are you still attached to the name Agamo?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: It is useless to regret it now!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: This is all because you gave me all of your magic power.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Behold. You are nothing without your magic power!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Yes. My magic power is gone.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: So this is a good time as any.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: What… What is that!????

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Have you been hiding magic power!?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It is Moccamori who is refusing you.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Their cries have awoken Moccamori ever so slightly.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You cannot stay in that body for long.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It is not yours.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Without a body, your magic power will scatter, and you will have to wait another thousand years.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: What will you do?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: However strong you may be, as long as the host refuses you, you cannot enter.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Know that there are things you cannot achieve solely with magic power.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: SHUT UP!!!!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Perhaps it might be possible, if you went into the body of a beast, with a weaker ego compared to man.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Although you will lose all intelligence.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: How does that sound?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Did you think I have no more plans?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I must divide my magic power…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: He's gone…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Ida…I too, have been preparing my resurrection for a thousand years…

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Wake up. The food is getting cold!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wanna sleep more…

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: I have grilled some octopus but I'll take it away!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Oc… Octopus!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I want it!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Yum Yum Yum Yum!!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Is it good?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yup. It's so good.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What about dad?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: I told you - he will come back after a few days in the eastern sea.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… Huh? Oh~ right!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wish dad catches the giant octopus this time!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Even Warriors can't catch those.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: They're too big and fast!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe I'll catch one, then?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can knock everything out with my magic!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Mocca, you can't swim.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I fall into water, I will just teleport!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: My, you've become so sure of yourself now that you know magic!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Mocca. Can you get me some king crab meat from the beach for dinner?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are we having king crab? Yay!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll come back with all the king crabs on the beach!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Don't wipe them out - just bring back what we need for dinner!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Get some king crab meat. I'll cook it for dinner.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: You've brought so much.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I took some away from a dragon!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: I'll cook it into delicious food. Wait at the table.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Yum Yum Yum Yum!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah, I'm so happy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am so happy you're here. Mom, dad.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Our daughter is saying such adorable things!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's weird… Why I am so happy?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Is it because you like the food?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think so!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Oh, a handsome tall guy came here earlier.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Are you close?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What… Nothing like that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What did he say?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: He said something that he couldn't finish the work that you gave him. And you guys should do it together.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What did I tell him to do… I don't remember.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: He said he will wait for you at the lobby.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. I'll go see him when I'm done with this!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: A tall good-looking man said he will wait for you at the lobby~

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You here?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What did I ask you to do?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You told me to bring a Brilliant Crystal from Stalie.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Did you forget everything because you're having such a happy time?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh……… Right. I did.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Being far from you, I can't use your magic power properly.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I couldn’t procure it by myself.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go together and finish this quickly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good job.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But why did I ask you to bring this?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… I think something happened here… But I can't remember…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's probably bad memories.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Forget about it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should, right? I'm only going to see happy stuff!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Everything is done~ I'm going to see mom~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mom… MOM!!!

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Oh, you're here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's going on!?

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: A Blue Dragon came to your house.

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: It's very rare that a dragon attacks people…

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Did you bear the dragon a grudge?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What about mom!??

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: She's probably crushed under the house.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wha… WHAT????

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: MOM!!! ARE YOU ALIVE!??

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Oh, are you going to touch the house?

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Don't bother - it will be more difficult to get the body out if the house collapses.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you think you can still breathe while you say such things?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: After I save mom, I'll kill you!

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Yeah yeah~ As you wish.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Oh no… The house is a mess.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mom! You're alive?

Item.name: mother
Item.talkText: Phew…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank goodness! I'll save you right now!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you hurt?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Of course not~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh… Right? You're okay!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: How can we clean that up… I'm more worried about that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's not important! It's important that you're okay!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Of course, I am okay.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: I was dead because the house fell down, and born again with a new body!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: My daughter gave eternal lives to everyone, why did you forget about that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah… Ah??

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Don't worry about me. Let's worry about the house…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha… Haha… Well then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You! I told you I will kill you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How can you say such things when mom was crushed under the house?

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Kill me, whatever.

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: I'll be revived anyway.

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Your mother was going to be revived, too.

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: And if you disturbed the house and it collapsed, your revived mother would have died again.

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: It would have been better to just pull out the body and wait for her to revive.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Still, I am offended.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Mocca. What is there to be offended by?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: He didn't say anything wrong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: B… But…!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: By the way, what's going on? Aren't you my husband's coworker?

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Oh, I have something to tell you.

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Your husband is dead in the ocean.

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: A giant octopus got him.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Oh, really?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: How long will it take for him to be revived?

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Well. He's good at swimming so he probably will come home soon…

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: But if he is in the octopus' stomach… you probably need to wait 200 years til the octopus is dead.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Dad… Dad died….?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: That's what he said.
Item.label: 남편이 죽은 소식에 동요하지 않고 무덤덤한 말투로 수정됨

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's wrong with you! Mom!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He might be alive in the octopus' stomach!

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: He's not going to die. Maybe he would be lonely. Don't worry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: MOM!! What's wrong with you!?

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: I'm home.
Item.label: 번역수정 불필요

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Oh, you home?
Item.label: 반가워하지 않고 오히려 의아해함

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: Oh, you heard the news?

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: Fortunately, a giant octopus appeared not long after we set sail.

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: I was able to come back early because I died near the land.

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: I'm hungry. Give me dinner.

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: What happened to the house?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: I was cooking dinner when a dragon attacked.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: You should have come later…I can't cook right now.

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: Ugh, it's going to take a while to build the house again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's going on!???

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Mocca. You're yelling. That is so rude.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What is wrong with all of you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mom, You told me!!!
Item.label: 프롤로그에선 아빠가 바로 죽어서 엄마만 말합니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even though we never see each other again… You said never forget that we love and care each other!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you are not worrying about dad at all!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If dad died in the octopus' stomach, we might have never seen him again!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I almost saw you die, too! Again!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's wrong!! Did you already forget the day we separated!?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Did I say that?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Well, that was foolish of me.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Forget about that.

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: Those are just bad memories?

Item.name: Mother
Item.talkText: They're useless in this current world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You. You are not my mother.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And you're not my dad.

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: You are being so rude right now…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Forget about it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How can I forget that day?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you know how much I missed you after that day?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We finally meet after all those hard times…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And now it seems you don't care about what happens to each other.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't need this type of fantasy!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't tarnish the precious memories that I have!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Isn't that why we have to care about each other?

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: You have no respect.

Item.name: Father
Item.talkText: I do not need a daughter that yells at her dad.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was happy for a second…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Right… Now I remember…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father took away my minions' magic power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When father became one with me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He told me I will be the one who sees the world of eternal life for the first time…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I guess everything was just an illusion…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What have I been doing all this time…?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Sob…

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Sob……

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The seal was perfect, so how did you get out…?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: This is but a part of the magic power that leaked out before.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: There is not much I can do with my petty magic power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Let me wake you from the deep sleep.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're being so annoying til the end…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't have any magic power… I can't do anything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just let me go to sleep…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Didn't you shout in your dream?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: This is not the world that you have dreamed of.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Your friends are suffering in the same nightmare as well.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: All life in this continent will soon dream of the same things.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Are you going to stay here like this?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You're the ruler of Ürphea, no?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……… Even if I wake up, I don't have any power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father took all the power from me.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I can give you back the power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's nonsense.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You barely have magic power too…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Pruto Lake is an enormous lake that gives all the nutrients to this whole continent.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And the Soul Stone in the Pruto Tree is a magic stone that controls Pruto Lake's magic power…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: …as well as the device to grant Adlai's magic power to all life in this continent.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I will give you the magic power that has been sleeping under this lake for a thousand years.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then… Then…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Pruto Tree's Soul Stone was not made by father for his resurrection…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: No. It is a Soul Stone with which the Ürphean Temple Lords sealed Adlai.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: As Adlai's magic power was too great, they decided to extract it for a thousand years using the lake.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Didn't the Temple Lords seal you??

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But since I gave my magic power to Adlai… I am not Agamo anymore.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: As soon as Adlai received my powers, I was sealed.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: In the place you call the Ancient Land.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That… That can't be true…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: We don't have much time…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Let's talk about this more when we meet Adlai.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I brought all of them here…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am sorry…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's all… my fault…

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Sob…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master! Are you awake?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you guys alright?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Don't worry about us! As long as you're okay, master!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I don't know what happened… But we all were sleeping here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am sorry, all of you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's all because of me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina. I wanted to bring back your family…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't think I can keep that promise.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am so sorry.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: No. Don't be.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: While I was asleep, I met my revived father and mother.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Everybody was immortal. I was so happy for a moment.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: But then the villagers no longer worked…and went crazy.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: As they didn't die when they break the law, crime was rampant.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: It was horrible…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: My father in the dream actually gave me advice.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Don't rely on false ideals, but be true to the responsibilities you have', he said.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: He also told me…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The reason humans have short lives…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: …is so that we can love and cherish each other all the more, with the short time we have.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I awoke abruptly, with him sharply scolding me to get my life together.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ah, I had a similar nightmare too.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: In my dream, a mother did not care about her child when he fell down from a cliff.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The mother said she's going to look for her child after she gets lunch. While the kid was crying under the cliff!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That's the side effect of immortality…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I am so relieved!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I was so worried that you wouldn't make it here!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I knew you would come back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro. Did you have any dreams?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ah… Mine was terrifying.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The humans who harassed me became more vicious with immortality.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: As I do not have any fond memories…I had no dream where I wanted to reclaim anything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But yet you followed me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I have already accomplished my dream.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: To guard you, master, at your side.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is what makes me happy.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What should we do now?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The deities from the other continents fought Agamo, but they didn't stand a chance.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then Agamo left something at Pruto Tree and left.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As you said, I can feel powerful energy radiating from the Pruto Tree.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's head to the Pruto Tree.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You actually escaped…incredible.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I was worried you would never come out.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Then you wouldn't have been able to see me in all my glory.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Golden magic power…you have been chosen by father.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I really wanted to look down on you from this seat.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Of course, I always looked down on you anyway, as you're so short, hehe.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And don't call him 'father'.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I'm his daughter so I am the only one that calls him father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……Okay.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Yes. I was told to keep an eye on you and Ida.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Come to the Ancient Land.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I want to crush you in front of father.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Let me teach you what the end awaits for a bad daughter who defies her father.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I will wait for you~!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What is father doing right now?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ha, you don't learn, do you? Father is carrying out a ritual for his true resurrection.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: As you couldn't finish off Pieberry and her friends, things became bothersome for father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He saved you to stop the intruders.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I am the true vessel to hold father's magic power.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But isn't this place too small to fight?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …There is a powerful barrier constructed around the Pruto Tree.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Someone intentionally made it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's annoying but let's walk to the lobby.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: We won't ever have to go to that land ever again, right?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: So the miracle of Agamo was just an illusion.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: An imperfect illusion, at that.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I somewhat expected to gain immortality, but this was a mess.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? You didn't care about my plan from the beginning?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You made the barrier just to make me walk all the way here?
Item.label: 순간이동으로 모카가 집에 오면 세실리아가 왕좌에 앉아있는 모습을 못 보기 때문에 세실리아가 순간이동을 못 하도록 결계를 침. 모카가 정문으로 걸어들어와서 세실리아가 앉아있는 모습을 보도록 함.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will go on my own from now on.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: We came all this way together, what are you talking about?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Right. We need to work together.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am not saying I'm going to do this alone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I know I can't do anything with my power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just want to see father alone.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: … If it gets dangerous, summon us.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am sorry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I think I'll be sorrier if I lose you, too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you. For being with me till the end…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Father… I am sorry… I could've stopped them…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I was a bit short on magic power!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Give me a little more, and I will kick them out!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: The magic power that I gave you right now is much more than what I gave to the first daughter.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: So how did you lose?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: That… That can't be!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I even gave you a spirit that guards this land.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: What was lacking, I wonder?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I think it's because I haven't fully adapted to the magic power you gave me!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: If you give me more magic power…!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: My first daughter drove off an ancient dragon when she was but a child, after receiving magic power.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: You have received so much more, so why are you so weak?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: No! I am more talented than Moccamori!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: If you had chosen me from the start, I would have been…!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Are you saying I was wrong?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: How arrogant.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Fa… Father!! I didn't mean that…!!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Welcome. My first daughter.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have made your body in a hurry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You look very unstable.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: This is because you defied me.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I lost so much magic power, just to come here without a body…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Was eternal life nothing but an illusion?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you… lie to me?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I never lied to you.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Can you be sure that this moment is not a dream?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: The reason you define this as reality is because you have been in this time for a while.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: But had you not awoken ever from an amazing dream…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: That dream would be your reality, and this reality will be but a dream of hardship.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Do not judge so harshly a world you merely glimpsed.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: My world is eternal.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You missed something, father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The dream you gave me was not the dream I wanted.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: …Did you not say that you wished to meet your birth mother and father?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I definitely created such a world for you.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: So why did you refuse that world?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because no one cared about each other!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: With immortality…no one was precious to another any longer.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I realized something thanks to the hard times…and my friends.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Humans are given short lifespans…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …so that they can live their lives to the fullest in what little time they have.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And so we try to accomplish meaning before we die.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And treasure one another, as we never know when we may lose each other.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It is heartbreaking when we lose something…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …but that also proves that it was truly precious, no?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Although I did meet my revived mom and dad in that dream…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The ones I love more…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …are my parents who loved me and each other - even though they are long gone.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: How sad.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I had thought you were a vessel I finally found in a thousand years, and wanted to give you the new world…

Item.name: Agamo
