Item.talkText: But why do you resist me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am not a child anymore. I have grown up enough to walk my own path, father.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: …… I am sad.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Give up, father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Using more magic power without a materialized body will cause you to vanish.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: You completed the power…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I was not wrong. How proud and happy I am of you.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I wanted to imprison you in this sealing stone forever, if nothing else.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: But I don't have enough time.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Ida. I am sure you wanted to reclaim your body inside the sealing stone?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: But it's too late now. Your body has been absorbed into my body.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Ha, that tiny thing will now be your body.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I had some work to finish beforehand.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Look at me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This value is only made possible through persevering long hardships.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: An instant illusion can't create anything of this level.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: It's time for the world to go back to the beginning.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Behold, as I delete everything you have left.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I believe in my descendants.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And my belief realizes everything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……… What is that?
Item.label: 가이아 제네시스가 놀랍지만 분노한 상태라 차분한 말투로.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Gaia Genesis.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: A guardian originally created to defend the Ürphea Continent.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I made this protection magic circle with all my remaining magic power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: This will withstand Gaia Genesis' attacks somewhat.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think we have a chance at this fight.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: This is not easy. Our foe's magic power is growing as we speak.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Looks like Adlai has been using it to protect my seal.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And now the guardian is used to destroy the world…how unfortunate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is the power of the Ancients…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This seems capable of destroying the world, despite its incomplete power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Here are the deities that will fight with us.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You…you're alive.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I was having a terrible nightmare in the lake.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am sorry about the last time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But we need to work together for now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If we don’t' stop this, the next target could be your continent.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Moccamori! You've regained your senses, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not that immature child anymore.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll fight with everything I have…for all the minions that sacrificed for me.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I still don't like her.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My wrongdoings against you will never be absolved…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I beg of you. I can't do this alone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Had I known I couldn't do this on my own, things would have never come this far…

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: It's okay.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Because you repented.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Yeah. I forgive you too.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: It's not Moccamori's fault.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Then I'll forgive you too.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Since Pieberry forgave you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you for understanding.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Alright, that dude. He's moving now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Why…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I took all your magic power…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: It's the power that the primal god had… Why did I lose…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Was my magic power lacking…?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Listen to yourself.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You took my magic power, and yet you still whine about more.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Even if you had several times the magic power you had, the result would have been the same.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Tell me… Why did I lose…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It was over at the moment Moccamori refused you.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Gaia Genesis did not accept you, either.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Because Gia Genesis is the guardian of the Ürphea.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I was…refused by a creature made with clay?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: There's a reason I call it the guardian.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Its name was not given without reason.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It's a name that holds the great meaning of the creation of this world.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The guardian may not speak, but it carries my will inside.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You merely tried to control its body with magic power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You could not defeat the will inside it.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Just as you could not do so in Moccamori's body.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Nonsense…the will of a lump of clay…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I…I had everything…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: …and I lost to…that…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You had already lost to Ürphean Temple Lords…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Even though they are no longer with us…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Their will has had endured, and stopped you once again.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It is also my will.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: … I still don't understand.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Do not call me father.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Besides, I am not Agamo anymore.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: The name Agamo was given to the one who has the power of a god…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: You were just a vessel to accomplish my goal…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why didn't you erase me when you were in my body?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I truly wanted to become your sacrifice.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why you could fully control my body.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you didn't expel my soul from the body.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You could have done so before I awoke.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: What do you want to hear from me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've trusted and followed you all my life.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When my real dad and mom were killed by soldiers…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …and in those desperate moments when I was being hunted down by the Pope, you were the light of my life.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why I wanted to revive you, even with my life. I truly wanted to sacrifice myself for you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even though this is not the situation I hoped for.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father, I… I hope you thought of me as your daughter, if only for a moment.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's why you hesitated when I woke up, right?

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: When the scattered magic power gathered and my will had been restored…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: A war broke out over the springs.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Then…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I saw a small girl being pursued by the Warriors, one of my blood…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: At first, she was too weak to use as a vessel, and I almost ignored her…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: …… But I felt pity for her.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: The way you were crying…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Somehow, I was unable to pass you by.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Even after I chose you…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I thought the reason that I chose you was…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I was afraid of my bloodline dying out.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: But then…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I never thought the bond we shared would stop me from my plan.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……. Thank you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Though I will once again become an orphan who lost her father…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am thankful that I was chosen and loved by you, father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you. For taking care of me.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: ………… How you have grown.
Item.label: 아가모가 마지막으로 몸을 구체화하여 모카의 머리를 쓰담쓰담하고 사라지기 직전의 대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have now even crushed my remaining pride.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Experience the world a while longer, then come back.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: We shall meet once more, Adlai.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's going on!?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Did you finally grow up?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The magic power that I left will disappear.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We won't be able to see each other anymore?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I know not when.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But if you are alive, we will meet again.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I have more things to tell you, but I am out of time.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: If there are some traces of my magic power left somewhere, they will tell you.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Why I have chosen you…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And why I had taught Adlai for a thousand years…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is it over?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Ha. It's done.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: We almost died for real this time.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: You already did.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Huh, you're right.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: No, twice actually. We fell asleep in the lake.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh right. We were defeated that time, too.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Then we all died at least once? Hehe.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you still have the strength to tell a joke?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How fun…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No…. I AM SO EXHAUSTED!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I want to go back and eat pie!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I'm going to see Adrian!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Will Robin be waiting for us…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And so my childish queen-play was over.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I had thought all of our greed^nstemmed from our short lives.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: That we wanted to have more during those short times…

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: And sometimes hurting others because of such actions.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: That is why I wanted to give eternal life to all.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I believed that then all of our misfortunes^nthat rise from our imperfections will disappear.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: It was a mistake.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Eternal life does not remove misfortunes.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: In fact, we may experience eternal misfortunes.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Because we have such a short time

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: that's why our time is so precious.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because we are imperfect,^nperhaps we can be merrier when we overcome our incompleteness?

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: My minions…^nthey complete me.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: I have new friends now.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You fall from such heights and are unharmed. Deities are amazing.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Ugh… I think I got a sprained leg! It still hurts!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Let me see.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: …I'll blow a kiss to make it better.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Ah, I'm okay now!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Is there magic in deity breaths?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Bah, Ida should've summoned me too. Why didn't he call me?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I wanted to help, too.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Agamo took all the magic power from you guys.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Ida restored us first and sent us in because he was in a hurry.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: If he waited longer, it might have been too late.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you going back?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yeah. I should.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Uris. Let's go home now.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Lady Mariena. I shall return to Vavelia, if only for a while.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What? Are you not going to live with our parents in Lalaque Village?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ah… Oh… Okay.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ummm… Then…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Would you like to go with us, Mariena?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You took me in and cared for me, so I'd like to introduce you to my real mother…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Yes. I'd love that.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I was hoping if you could live in Lalaque Village

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: …… with us?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I have to take care of Kabanes Village.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ah, Ah. Right. Ahem.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Thinking of leaving you here…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: This is also sad.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Are there no teleport magic between the continents?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: That's too much. Haha.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Do visit often.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Won't you be returning, Ethan?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Goodbye. Write me when you want to. You need not visit in person.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll visit you sometime.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can make time for a minion like you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I don't know. I might come here on a dispatch.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Since the war is over, I'm not sure if there will be a reason to come back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, I, Moccamori, just said I will make time!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then you should make time and come!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you think I have nothing to do? Huh?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh… Okay. Little Queen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You will be returning as well, right?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No~ We are just going to look around Ürphea.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: My mom is super exhausted because she used all her magic power.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: We're just gonna have a picnic until she recovers.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I should go and see how Lord Elysion is doing, as he seems ill…

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: My two masters are here, I should stay here too.
Item.label: 블랙조의 두 주인은 파이베리와 엘리시온

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I go wherever Pieberry goes.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Then me too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So everybody is staying.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good. I will build a nice residence. Make yourselves at home!

Item.name: pieberry
Item.talkText: Oh yeah~!

Item.name: luna
Item.talkText: BBQ Party! BBQ Party!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I have more work to do…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: Since I cannot be revived if all of my bloodline are gone…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I thought I chose you for a great cause.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I have watched Ürphea for centuries in search of a successor…

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: I understand.

Item.name: Warrior_0_boss
Item.talkText: Even in death, we shall keep our beliefs. Let us not shame what we fought for.

Item.name: Warrior_0_boss
Item.talkText: My companions! We are strong without magic power!

Item.name: Warrior_0_boss
Item.talkText: Let show them that our will is unbreakable!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Yes. Death with dignity.

Item.name: Warrior_3
Item.talkText: Yes…we are the Lunata Warriors.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me follow them to gain some information.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How did this magic power occur?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This seems sketchy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You…are you feeding the spring's magic power to this one?

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Yes. It gets stronger every time it stands up.

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: But you've lost all the magic power. What are you going to do?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But he objected to my ideals.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But he must have succeeded in resurrection before me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He probably came back to life with magic power he had hidden.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But Ida had to have used magic power to revive himself…but there was much magic power in the spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then he could not have infused himself fully with magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So do not worry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But there was no magic power in Ida's body! It was strange.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: You can never do that.
Item.label: 모카가 대륙정복하겠다는 말에 대한 저스티스의 대답

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Because we are strong.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 숲 시작시 집 워프 금지
Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't go to my room yet. Let me track the warrior that ran away to the north.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's sell the empty bottles after I make the healing potions.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can smell a whiff of magic power from their bodies.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My talons cannot puncture as well as before - perhaps the armor is enhanced with magic?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Mariena's fire is special so be careful not to touch it!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Hey, Luke. I told you to be careful. Give me that.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You got hurt yesterday too, Uris.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Luke was doing just fine. Just let Luke finish it.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I got used to it because I've been hurt.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Luke was about to get hurt. Weren't you, Luke?

Item.name: Ruk
Item.talkText: Yeah right…

Item.name: Ruk
Item.talkText: You just wanted to impress Mariena.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris. I told you not to bend down too much.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What. Can you tell?
Item.label: 재번역 불필요

Item.name: Ruk
Item.talkText: So much…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: If the fire sparks touch your hair, it will burn in an instant.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Haha. I'm not a kid, don't worry!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Hmm. It's pretty hot, did I work too much?
Item.label: 머리에 불이 붙은걸 모름

Item.name: Ruk
Item.talkText: Ha, you deserve that.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You ARE a child.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: ……… Huh?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ah… AHHH!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: LADY MARIENA!!!!

Item.name: uris
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You extinguished it slowly on purpose, didn't you?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Haha. You are funny and cute when you do that.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ha……. I am not a child.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Anyway, this is amazing. Swords forged with metal melted by Lady Mariena's fire feel different.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: The fire doesn't seem unique…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I burn each molecule of oxygen in the air with small bursts of magic power to create realistic fire.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: But this fire also contains magic power, so it is more powerful than normal fire.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: But be careful. If you put too much magic power in a single molecule of oxygen, it won't just burn - it will explode in a fury.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: So one must only inset magic power into oxygen quickly while maintaining a maximum magic power of 5%…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Oh… Yes yes. That's enough.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I can't use magic anyway.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You always explain to me about magic blah blah…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Haha, sorry my explanation has gotten longer.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh, Master. The White Dragon is known for its fast movement, so let's work on agility before you go.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No…Agility doesn't increase that much even with training.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Then why don't we use the ingredient from the east side of Pruto Forest?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've heard that Furqon's feather has a little bit of magic power and it works well on deities' agility.

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: Wit… Witch!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm. I've never seen that armor before.

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: Haha… We… We found this amazing metal!

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: Have you heard of Rare Metal!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nonsense. That metal is super rare, so how can you wear it?

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: Ha…Haha! We found this since long time ago!

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: Even though only our leader is wearing the Rare Metal armor, we are also pretty strong!

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: We found metal that can replace the Rare Metal!

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: So… So go away!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ouch. Okay, stop shaking.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, were you guys being quiet so I won't take it away? Until you guys successfully smelt them?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will test how solid it is!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew, they're just small fry but their armors are very hard.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My talons can't go through that!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They compensated for their frail bodies with gear…I can't underestimate them anymore.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow. I didn't know there was a place like this!
Item.label: 4883 대사랑 내용이 겹치는게 많아서 대사를 수정함

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Warriors' hideout is near Pruto Lake… It's pretty close to my hideout!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: The spear you brought once held immense magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel dizzy and nauseous… What is this?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This magic power that's flowing through this cave is so unique…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wha… WHAT???

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: My… My head…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Some weird magic power keeps trying to come inside my head… Is this hallucination…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will break… this hallucination!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… I know I'm awake but it feels like I had a nightmare.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've never seen this type of magic…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oho, so much gold!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Some of the items seem pretty useful…
Don't touch that!!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: That's my treasure…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A talking cat…?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: It's because I was a Temple Secretary. You are a deity, how can you not know that?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Is she too young to know this?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whatever. I will make good use of the treasure.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won't forget your work. Good job for collecting it.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: You seem pretty proud of yourself for passing through the path of hallucinations.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wha… What is this!? I can't see anything!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: This is my area. I can even cast hallucination on adult deities.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't breathe! Let me out!!!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Underestimated the cat, did you?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Don't mess with me.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I couldn't do anything even though I knew it was a hallucination…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're a Temple Secretary, so what are you doing here? Shouldn't you be at the Temple?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I'm retired now. I'm just a merchant.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Deities sometimes come to me to acquire items they need.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Do you want to trade?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you want fish?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Are you kidding me?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Give me gold. Gold. Don't you see the gold piles?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Does a cat really need gold?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: We change into humans and visit human villages. We buy things we need.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I bought this sofa at Pruto Village recently. It's very soft and squishy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What?? That has the same design as my chair!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Only the ruler of Ürphea may use that design!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Gosh, you're so annoying. Do you want to go blind again?

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: Now you're quiet. Are we going to have a deal or not?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I have many things that are good for deities.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Come again!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's a golden stone? Is this the reason the guardian became stronger?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It has mysterious magic power in it… Very intense, golden magic power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… Oh, I was so captivated just looking at the stone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Where did Ida go, and why are you the only one here?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did he disappear because the magic power supply has been cut?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Or are you hiding somewhere~!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Finally… I have succeeded!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don’t' think I can lose to anyone in this state.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wanted to fight Ida. Pity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go to father's Soul Stone and start the resurrection ritual.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Damn it!! You have filled up the spring's power!

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Aren't you using the power from somebody else, too?

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Show me more of your power. You're still hiding some, yes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: SHUT UP!!!!

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Are you going to die like this, here?

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Uverstan. Smash harder.

Item.name: NoName_ida
Item.talkText: Even though I enhanced the guardian quite a bit, you still managed to defeat it with a single blow. Impressive.
Item.label: 표현오류. 재번역 불필요.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: (She can't fight with a Warrior without using magic power yet…)

Item.name: shucreena
Item.talkText: Damn it!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: That cute bird was you? It was so cute, I should've pet you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It was horrible.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Well… I guess we can't underestimate old deities…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should've attacked and absorbed her when I had father's power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those old deities do not care about the world so I didn't care about them too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There are more problems to take care of. I'm already depressed because I lost my power…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It's okay, Mocca. You can do better. I'm with you!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You've overcome tougher times than this!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah. I feel better because you say so.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: How did you find that warrior?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: He's good looking, and kind of has a rebellious vibe?! I like him!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, it just happened.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ugh… Eekk… Eeekkkk…
Item.label: 오열하기 직전의 우리스

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I put all my magic power to Uris.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You can't deal with the queen right now, but it's enough to run away from her.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I am not going anywhere!! I will die with you!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Even though I disappear… I will be inside of you with my magic power and will.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait… Then I just needed to have lots of magic power?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Ahhhh…!!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You are talking like a god, and saying you are going to give eternal life to everyone.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But in reality, you are just a powerless being.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Answer my question. Are you a complete being?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: … I've heard your answer well.
Item.label: 살려달라고 애원하는 모카모리의 말 자체가 자신이 불완전하다는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eeeekkk…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: My mom had to make it right because I failed!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: You know what else I hate?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you talking about?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Those folks who say they're going to change the world.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: They begin to start up all sorts of things…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: And then they also destroy things precious to other people!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah…so there was a barrier. That's why the transport magic did not work.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Why are you letting the key go….? The magic power is leaving your body…!

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I want to… go with you.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Then let's go sleep in the spring forever, together.
Item.label: 번역수정 불필요

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Since Noa released it, there is no master for Mirac Spring's key.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Sleep well where you belong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oho, a truly magnificent bow!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: It is.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: It's not perfect.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then where is the rest of the power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's in the deepest spring in this continent.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nonsense. There are only four Temple Springs in this continent.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There is one more.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me exactly where it is.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A very deep place in Ürphea.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're not helping.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me, where in Ürphea?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go down by yourself. I need to save magic power to fight the dragon.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: Your Majesty! Do not leave me!!! Majesty!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: White Dragon is very sensitive to sound!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: So my answer is, BOO!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Let's check Mirac Spring before I go to the west.)

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: There aren't many deities left who can be drained of power.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: How about absorbing humans? If you absorb them in numbers, would that be any help?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eth… Ethan. I am sorry that your friend got hurt!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: … Nevermind. I was just getting slapped.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Crystal Cave… That's where I saved you last time! Are you trying to return the favor?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Haha! Now you know how important I am! You need me.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I beg you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You can't even handle peer deities with the most powerful magic power! Gosh! You're so pathetic!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Pruto Lake is just above the cave. You know what I mean?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I was going to burn the letter but it's better off this way.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Since I get to know you better!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: If the cave collapses, Mocca will be in danger as well, you know?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Phew! The… the sap…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: He is waiting for me to gather the power from the three springs.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The best way is to provoke master and attract all the power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We seal Ida in the Ancient Land!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If you don't restrict us…The villages of Kabanes and Lunata will not defy you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: But one of the Warrior leaders, Yvette, will continue to oppose you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: She was against allying with Cecilia in the first place, and went about independently.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: And now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just need to get the power that father had lost.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You guys just handle it yourselves!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, you are amazing. You must've been exhausted after the resurrection ritual…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who the heck is Adlai…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That's the one that you're calling 'Father'.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Agamo is just a name for a god.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then… the final fifth power… is at Pruto Lake?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I am the Primal Agamo.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. If you use the sealing stone, you can defeat Ida without fighting.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And Ida's body in that sealing stone might be the last power that the mirror mentioned.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I seal him, I can't fully get the power back that he took…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But we can retrieve that after father is revived!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Hey, I haven't had a guest for a while.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Talking cat… and by the body ornamentation, are you the Temple Secretary of Nova Temple?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Open the Temple gate.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: For what?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need the Nova Temple's spring.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: I've heard about you from Laura, you're so stubborn.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: If you can beat me, I will think about it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How dare you try to test me!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: This is enough. Pass!

Item.name: rimula
Item.talkText: Meowwww…

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: I had to test you, as the temple will disappear if you are weak.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you talking about?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: My duty is to transfer power to those who have the right to hold it.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: If an incompetent fool were to go up… That would be terrible.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: I've opened the gate. You will understand when you get there.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, it was an illusion?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wha… What… The power… is overflowing…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Perfect golden magic power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And my blue magic power still remains, without being dominated by the golden magic power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't know it was possible to embody father's power so stably…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, I can now summon armor that I couldn't use before!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whoa, so I guess I can't maintain this power indefinitely.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should be careful until I get used to this power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If the power explodes like the other time… Phew.
Item.label: 아이다와 싸우다가 마력을 한꺼번에 잃어버렸을 때를 회상하는 것.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is a transport magic circle, but it doesn't react to my magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I guess outsiders can't use this magic circle.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Oh, you are buying quite a lot?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Our trade volume has already exceeded 120,000 gold.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I think I can trust you now.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I've granted you access to our village's transport magic circle, so feel free to use it.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Phew… I am grateful that you frequent my services, Your Majesty!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: I wish to offer you a humble gift, to entice you to trade more often…

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: This potion is good for your health! Hehe…! My service to you!

Item.name: MerchantFairy
Item.talkText: Mu-Mumu (I only deal in Red Gems for trading.)

Item.name: MerchantFairy
Item.talkText: Mu (Please come again.)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you giving me your magic power?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Let us see how much of my power you can receive.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: If you cannot hold the power, then you shall be overwhelmed by it once again.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Let us find out how much you have grown.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: UGH!!! Stop it!!!!

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Are you struggling? Are you already breaking down?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Daughter. I praise your impressive growth.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: But you are still but a child in my eyes.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: There is still time. Trust your father once again.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Let us realize our dreams together.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Silly girl… Don't try to handle this all by yourself!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Give me a sword!! If you share the magic power with me, we can win this thing!!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If you don't, everyone will be in danger!
Item.label: 슈크리나 대사가 에단의 대사로 바뀜

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well, let's all die together then!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is this warriors' loyalty or something? Don't! You're just a human…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's really dangerous!! So leave!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Trust me.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: We've done well up till now… Right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But promise me you won't die.
Item.label: 에단에게만 하는 대사로 변경

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Gah…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan!!! Hold on a little longer!! I'll free you quickly!!!
Item.label: 에단에게만 하는 대사로 변경

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… We did it!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan! Are you okay?
Item.label: 에단에게만 하는 대사로 변경

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: I shall leave a final gift, as your father.

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: This may not be eternal life…

Item.name: Adelina
Item.talkText: But may this wash away the tears shed by my daughter…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I'm so relieved.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: That Agamo. I didn't think he would actually regard Miss Moccamori as his daughter…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I was surprised, too. I never thought he would save the dead.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: He was able to save us even as he disappeared with waning magic power.
Item.label: 우리 <- 리브로나 에단 중 한명을 지칭하는 '사람'으로 변경

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I guess the dream of giving eternal life to all wasn't that impossible.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But if the world became like what we saw in the dream, then it would have been a total nightmare.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If humanity kept piling up without dying, the world would have died a long time ago.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: All the resources of all the lands would have dried up in no time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But the last present that father gave me… I am so happy that my minions came back.
Item.label: 에단과 슈크리나 -> 에단 또는 에단을 지칭하는 '내 부하'로 변경

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: On the other hand, I think father finally understood what I really want.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So… I'm happy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wake up!!!!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Sob…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: This reminds me. You were also crying so when I first met you…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Daughter. Once again, you have lost your beloved ones.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Yet, will you still persist?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: It is not too late. Follow your father.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: You can meet them again in the world that I shall create.

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: You fool…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I would rather die fighting you, then meet my friends again.
Item.label: 이들을 -> 친구를이라고 수정. 복수에서 단수로 변경. (에단 또는 리브로를 말하는 것임)

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: Now I am angry…

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I have only shown you patience and mercy… So why do you disobey me?

Item.name: Agamo
Item.talkText: I cannot forgive you…any longer.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Eekkk…!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You should've come here earlier…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I am sorry…about your friend.
Item.label: 친구들 복수에서 단수로 수정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes! It actually worked!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What's going on!?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Are you going to lose your mind just like before!?
Item.label: 에단의 대사로 바뀜

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you here!!? If you know, then run away…!!
Item.label: 왜 왔냐는 내용 추가

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It might be risky, but it's possible. Let's do this.
Item.label: 에단의 대사로 바뀜

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon. You are alive.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought father had absorbed you completely… Perhaps he needed a gate keeper?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: … I did not know that I would meet you like this, milady.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You also saw the dream of eternal life, Varon?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I was on a picnic with friends in the restored Vavelia.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: The birds on the meadow… The deer sleeping next to me… The smell of green grass… Everything was perfect.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I did not wish to wake up.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori. Would you not reconsider?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My nightmare can also become your ideal, it seems.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If only we could all choose our ideals…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But if we all had to choose only a single ideal, I'll have to stop it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon. I have nothing against you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So walk away.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I still like you too, Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: The time we spent time together for our dream… was as joyful as the time I spent with my hometown friends.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So let's not fight.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We can't tarnish our memories.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I am willing to tarnish them.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: We will soon greet each other smiling inside the soon-to-be realized dream of Lord Agamo.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori! Forgive me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …. Varon.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You… You are as strong as I thought.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I knew it. I knew that you were much more powerful than I…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Please do not misunderstand me.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I truly lived as your loyal subject…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: And even now, I do not regret that…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I shall see you in the dream…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you for protecting me all this time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am sorry I have to do this…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey! Don't touch my food!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew, I kicked it out before it touched the food!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now that I have the ingredients, let's so back to mom!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Congratulations. Master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I knew you'd make it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This suffering is almost over. You've done well, Libro.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you want to see my new power?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Wow! It's so marvelous and beautiful! Master!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Amazing power… And you've transformed into a noble figure!!!
Item.label: 한글오타 수정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, I'm sorry to say that this power will probably disappear after the ritual is done.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wanted to show off before it's gone!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't think I can maintain it for long, as I'm not familiar with it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But it's much more stable than before.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You should use it carefully, as it is a power you gained through hardship.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: As you and Lord Agamo's powers are connected, your magic power may explode if a threatening situation occurs again.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Of course, I doubt such circumstances happening to someone who has become so powerful.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, when father is revived, I won't need to be powerful.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This power is meant to vanish, anyway.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will serve you, even if you lose your powers, master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You are my master, not Lord Agamo. You know this, yes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. I'll take you in even after father has been revived.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: By the way, how about looking around the continent before the revival ritual?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Now there are none who can stop you…so think of this as taking a deep breath before the plunge.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won't let my guard down until father is revived.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But if I gather more magic power, it will be more helpful for the resurrection, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……Elysion is on the other side.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No need to have this encounter.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You still look energetic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh…he's still a handful.

Item.name: ExceeedRox
Item.talkText: Grr… Destroy… Destroy…!!!

Item.name: ExceeedRox
Item.talkText: Destroy… You….!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, I'm your master!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I made you with my magic power!?!

Item.name: ExceeedRox
Item.talkText: I will destroy you….!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It still can't be controlled.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I failed miserably after attempting to create a guardian like the Temple Lords.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If it had more reason, I meant to deploy it to another continent…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What a waste of magic power. Bleh.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should I defeat him and take the Magic Power Stone? It won't be easy…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've put a lot of work to this… It's a shame to destroy him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sorry. You could have been a great minion…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is all my fault.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Greetings, Your Highness.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I always strive to supply the best weapons to you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Indeed. Keep up the good work.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My soldiers must have the best weapons. Do you hear?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The soldiers are too weak. Too weak, I say.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Crafting good weapons will not amount to anything if they lack the skill to wield them.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I am passionate about weaponsmithing. But when the pathetic soldiers cannot wield my amazing weapons, I get discouraged.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, are you saying you want to slack off?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Oh, nonsense.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: There is no such thing as 'sloppy work' in my life.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: But Your Majesty inspires me.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I wonder - perhaps if I craft the best weapon, you will be willing to wield it perfectly…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No need. I have the talons my father gave me.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Oh, I doubt my weapons can compare in power to the talons, Your Majesty.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: But, are your talons not made with Magic Power Stone, Your Majesty?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I wish to offer you something better, as you defeat your enemies with quick movements.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: If you attach the talons I crafted on to those talons made of Magic Power Stone…

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Then the hardness of the talons will be enhanced, aiding greatly in physical attacks.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Really? Then gave them to me. I'll decide whether they are useful or not.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Oh, I haven't made them yet.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I only have the designs…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What a waste of time.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Actually, it's very difficult to obtain the metal ingredients.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Good metals mostly come from Lunata Mines… But the Lunata villagers won't cooperate.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I can craft things for Your Majesty if I have the steel powder produced in the Lunata Mine… What a shame.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't care. I'm powerful without those things.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: My Steel Talon crafting will most definitely be useful to you.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I hope my weapon would have a true master!!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Oh my! You used my crafting method!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: This was made as sturdy as I, a weaponsmith, can make it. Is this the mystery of magic power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm… I think it's better than I thought.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Your Highness! I have devised another thing!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: If we can make such items with steel powder, the basic material…

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Using better metal will yield much higher quality talons!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you…just thinking things up as you go, without actually crafting them?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What if I tediously obtained the ingredients and you failed to craft anything?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Hehe, actually I am a genius.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I can make anything that I design!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: This crafting skill will definitely help you. Haha!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Of course…! I knew you'd succeed.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Shall we proceed one step further?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: The Neodimu metal is known for its hardness and is said to react strongly to the deities' magic power.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: It will help greatly with not only physical attacks, but also magic.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I will work hard on researching the next crafting methods!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Oh…how long has it been since I last saw the glow of Neodimu?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Metal… is just amazing.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Strong… And so beautiful.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think it works better with my magic power than I thought.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is there a higher level than this?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: There are talons that can bring out the greatest beauty of the Neodimu metal.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Last time, I had excluded some materials so the performance was a little bit lacking. But it's different this time.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: If you add the Neodimu metal with auxiliary materials, you can complete the perfect Neodimu talons.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: May the amazing talons elevate Your Majesty's dignity!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Woooow! Such brightly shining Neodimu!!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Beautiful! It's just perfect!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think it's quite alright.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I admit you are a genius.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is there a higher version of this?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Hi… Higher?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There's no more?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's it?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Of course not!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey. Who are you yelling at?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: You were ignoring my potential, Your Majesty!!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: It's only in my head but I will tell you!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: My ingenious designs have always been completed in my head, you see!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whoa, whoa. Are you sure about this crafting method?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How would you know the nature of Exceedrox's heart and put that in as an ingredient?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: It's the ultimate lightning magic power stone.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: You're mistaken if you think I only deal with metal.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Along with metal, I also study all the magic ingredients that exist in this continent.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: You'll find me almost on par with most deities regarding knowledge about magic ingredients.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey… But Exceedrox is very hard to deal with… Even for me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And yet you can calculate its magic power?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Trust me. Hehe.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Humans are weak but have been survived and grown beyond their power with imagination.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Limitless research and imagination! And infinite challenge!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: This is the strength of humans!!!

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: What!! You completed it!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you so surprised? I've made it as you said.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The magic power of the talons are quite stable. I'm impressed.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Was there a huge explosion during the crafting?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nothing happened.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: ……. That's weird.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: There should have been a huge explosion accompanied by an electric storm…

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: The harsh magic power should have been released once last time…so why…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey. Was it dangerous then? Why didn't you tell me???

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What if the Soul Stone was broken because of the explosion!? Huh?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Strange… It's very strange… It doesn't make sense that my calculation was wrong…

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: A successful result means nothing if the process wasn't proven…

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: I'll work all night to prove it. Then I can move on to the next level!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… That guy is mad at research.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: …. What brought you here?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Isn't this a weaponsmithing facility?

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: No… No! This is a carpenter's shop! We make support fixture for mines!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh~ really?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then why can I sense Mariena's magic power inside of the building?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you guys making weapons with Mariena's flame?

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: No… We are not!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I go there and find any weapons, I will destroy them all!

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: But we don't make any weapons anymore…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: We only have useless stocks… You can go and look at them if you want.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You don't make anything with quality metals?

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Only things we make are just armor and swords for hunting.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Those aren't threats to Pruto Village, are they?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, actually I don't care what you make.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The only thing that I'm interested in is…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Give me Rare Metal.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Huh? That's a material that no one can obtain!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you saying? Isn't the armor worn by the Lunata Warrior Commander made of Rare Metal?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My talons couldn't punch through it. It was really hard.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Act…Actually that armor is made with Rare Metal.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: But as you know, Rare Metal is only discovered once in a thousand years. I don't have any. I swear!

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: If you want similar metal, you should search for the Corona Metal in the mine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Really? So if I bring that commander's armor, can you craft it into talons for me?

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Oh… Well…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Rare Metal can only be melted in ore state. And only barely, with Lady Mariena's flames…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Once it has been forged, it cannot be melted because it hardens greatly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me anyway to make it! Stop telling me you can't!

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: I don't know!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I really wanted to not pick on Lunata Village…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I am not getting the cooperation I need. Nope.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Oh… Okay…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: I really don't know how to melt processed Rare Metal gear…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: But I do know that smaller Rare Metal fragments can be combined with other metals and melted with magic power reaction.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: I know this crafting method.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: But in order to get Rare Metal piece, we have to break the equipment. That will be hard.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Fool. I don't need it because my talons are weaker than Rare Metal.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My talons are incredibly strong, thanks to magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I simply wanted to enhance them with Rare Metal. Don't worry!

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: What are you doing here!?

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: There's nothing in here! Really!

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Rare Metal?

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: That's an imaginary metal. It can't be real.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: You have succeeded in Rare Metal crafting…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: It's amazing…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Although I am happy that my crafting method was a success…

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: To think that those talons will hurt my friends…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You fool. I told you I won't harass Lunata Village.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: Can I trust you on that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will collect taxes though.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey…I thought it went away completely after I crushed it, but its' back.
Item.label: 숲에 있는 베리온(몬스터)을 향해 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Has it also sensed that my magic power has decreased?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I fight it, it may shred my clothes with its claws.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If there is no reason, then I'll need to avoid it for now.

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Ahh!! Help me!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing here!?

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Your Majesty! Help me!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why should I?

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: A monarch should save her subjects!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you talking about? A monarch should rule over her subjects.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not a rescue soldier.

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Ugh… Ugh! I am an item collector!

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: I gather ingredients that people sell in the village!

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: If you don't save me, they'll have hard time making items!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh yeah?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It doesn't matter. I don't need anything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can easily solve anything with my magic power.

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: You! You are a terrible ruler!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Are you losing your mind??

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Does it matter, whether I am killed by the hedgehog or by you?

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: I will just say whatever I want before I die!

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Go away! You lousy monarch! I'd rather be ruled by the Pope!!

Item.name: Villager
Item.talkText: Oh my! Thank you so much! I knew you wouldn't ignore your subject!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I mean, the village shouldn't lack resources.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Stop saying embarrassing things, just go already.

Item.name: man_216
Item.talkText: Thank you so much!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Have you gathered anything useful?

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Oh, I have a shining blue hedgehog spine!

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: This is more difficult to find than the normal hedgehog spines!

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: I bet a weaponsmith can research this to create a better weapon!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm. It will be useful to my magic power.
Item.label: 한글오타 교정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Give me that.

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: What…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you want to live or not?

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Oh… Yes yes. If you promise me to save me…

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Eh… Thank you for your help. For now…

Item.name: man_216
Item.talkText: Welp…
Item.label: 모카에게 물건을 빼앗겨 아쉬워하는 평민

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Huh? My Queen!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, tool merchant! What's that chest behind you?

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Oh…this…this is…!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: I found this when I dug up the place after finding a secret treasure map in the forest!

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: But there was just an old book inside the chest.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: I hoped there might be some rare gems but it only endangered my life!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. See you.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Huh?! Are you not going to save me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will save you because you're useful… But you are a bit annoying.

Item.name: ItemCollector
Item.talkText: Phew, I can keep running my business. Thank you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Each time I save a human, I feel disgraced.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It might sting a bit, but try to get out by yourself.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: My… My Queen!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, you came out well enough. It might sting a bit, though.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My subject or not, it's still not appealing to help a human.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. What can you do for me?

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Eek… Do you really mean it in this circumstance?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you want to live or not?

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Then… I will give you a discount on a tent!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How much?

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: How about 1,200 gold?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: 1,000 gold. End of conversation.

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Then I will see you in the shop…

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: Please come often… Tsk.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? Where did the tool merchant go?

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: The tool merchant is on a treasure hunt somewhere in Pruto Forest.

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: He said he found a secret map that Ancient deities left or whatever~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I shouldn't travel far until I finish a new magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: First, let's take the Magic Stone Slab fro Poerta.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's teach Lambragon, who invaded the castle, a lesson.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh?? You!??

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Phew, here we go.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You ran away after being so rude to me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell all your friends to come out!!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: They are not here. They went out to catch the giant octopus.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? You guys are having fun in my territory!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then at least I should capture you!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Ah…this is a moment of crisis.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Stop it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, Ethan. Why are you here?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I was searching for my brother's tracks.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen. Don't harm him.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If you do, I just have to fight you too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan! You are being rude to me… Don't expect me to go easy on you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whatever. I will let it go this time.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Phew…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, Warrior.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me your real purpose. Have you come to drive me out?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: No. Our primary objective is to find the missing people dispatched here, and investigate your background.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Missing people… You mean those humans that came here often on ships?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They're doing fine in Rubid Village.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Are they safe? Did you harm them?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I did not. They're fine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just broke the ship so they can't go back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They seemed happy to be freed from the Pope.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Then what is the true reason for your rule as a monarch?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I told you. I'm going to give eternal life to everyone.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Is that all?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What do you want to hear from me?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Perhaps ruling humans souls for the price of granting them immortality…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, I won't!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Humans are too skeptical. That's why I'm suffering too much!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's actually because of those people who interfered with my father's plan in the ancient times that stopped immortality from happening yet!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because of people like you!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Then why do the deities stand against you, despite such a lofty ideal?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's easy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This work, it needs lots of magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: To do that, I need other deities' magic power too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They are against me because they don't like this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha! Aren't they so selfish? It's not like they're going to die!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Then you are after our members' magic power too, aren't you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course! As long as they're on my land, they all need to be ruled by me!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Ethan. Things might get bigger than we thought.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Let me teach you swordsmanship. It will help you survive.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Huh? We already mastered palace swordsmanship. Is there more left to teach me?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: During the witch-hunt era, the swordsmanship to fight the deities has been developed greatly.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: It will be useful to learn it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will teach both of you a lesson!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ugh…I can't stand her attacks even when I use the power the Little Queen gave me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey. You think you can stand up against me because you got some magic power from me?? Huh!???

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Ethan. Let's change places.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? I stabbed you much harder than before…?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh, Justice. What's that defense skill?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Palace swordsmanship has advanced greatly during the witch-hunt era, when we fought the deities.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I will teach you, so stand up. You'll learn fast.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Even though we can't hold her… Let's buy some time until Lucia comes.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yes, Justice.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha!? This is nonsense!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Phew, I guess this is it…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I couldn't find my brother and die without seeing my mother…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: I am sorry. Ethan…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: No. I just wish I could have stayed with your team… If I did, I wouldn't be in this position…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……Hmph.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan! If you fight against me one more time, you'll be dead.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm letting this go because you said you want to find your family. Got it??

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ugh… Thank you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If both of you die here, think who is the one that loses.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Think about it.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Please let us go.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You're being mean to humans who's way weaker than you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Forgive who!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh~~ I am still angry!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Both of you. Fight against each other until one dies. Then I will let you go.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That's nonsense…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then should I kill you both?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Let's do this. Ethan.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: We just need to buy some time before Lucia comes.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh. You're right.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Hyaa…
Item.label: 저스티스의 가짜 기합 소리

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Huh…? Your swordsmanship skill has changed?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: We had to change swordsmanship skills in order to fight with deities during the witch-hunt era.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Aha~ The skill wasn't fully developed when I left Vavelia!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: It was obvious that a Warrior will lose to a deity in a direct fight…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: So the defense shifted from blocking with the blade to deflecting the attack…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: And the attack advanced to aim for weak spots that can ignore the deities' defense.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I get it now. It's not bad.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Did you learn it already?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yes. The principle is simple.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I can attack faster because I don't use much power… This is nice.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Fight harder!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will keep watching until one of you dies, so go on.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: (…Ethan. When I hit you, pretend to fall down.)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (Justice. I told the Little Queen that I've never lost at the palace warrior duels… Wouldn't she get suspicious if you win?)

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: (Then what should we do? She seems furious.)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (You fall down.)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (We don't know what'd happen if she doubts us.)

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: (…Fine)

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Oh. No.
Item.label: 어설픈 연기 말투

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (Justice… That acting was horrible!)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (Did we get caught?)

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: (Damn it)

Item.name: playerObj
Item.label: 어설픈 에단과 저스티스의 연기에 웃는 모카

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you guys doing!!???

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Bahaha!!! HAHA!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't you guys have any ego?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will forgive you since you made me laugh.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go away, both of you!

Item.name: ethan
Item.talkText: Okay, we're leaving.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: (What are you talking about. You have lost to me many times.)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (That's when I was learning swordsmanship.)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (I've defeated you in real sparring!)

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: (I was being easy on you. If I truly fought you, you would have been injured.)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (What are you talking about? You had this upset face.)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (Huh…? Why are you putting more strength into your swings?)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: (Pull yourself together! Justice!)

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: (Oh… I'm sorry. I was thinking about the old times…)

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Phew… I can't find it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? Grandma Sugar!

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Huh…? This voice is?

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: You are Mocca~~~!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How are you!?

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Oh, Mocca. You don't even show your face ever since you became the queen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, I'm busy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I'm working on this thing for everybody. So please understand.

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: I know I know~ My Mocca was a good girl~ You must've been doing good things too~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, what were you looking for? Fruit?

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Phew… I was going to gather some turtle eggs on the beach but I've lost my glasses!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is not a beach. It's the Fruit Forest.

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Oh no… I didn't know because I can't see. Well, I thought it smelled very sweet~ I can't hear any sound of waves.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me find it for you!

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Oh my~~ Thank you. Mocca.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I haven't seen you for a while. Let me help you this time.

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Aren't you busy these days?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I was going to Rubid Village right now. The beach is close to there, so it's fine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (Would Pieberry and her friends be in the village…?)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But It's a relief that I found you here. It would've been dangerous if you went to Dark Stone Cave!

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Hoho, yes. It could have been a disaster if I haven't met my Mocca!

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Thank you. Mocca~ You can find me the glasses later~

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: I was so surprised when you disappeared! You were just a baby~ And now you're a queen!

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Hoho~ I am so lucky.

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: I know a girl like Mocca!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There are so many monsters these days… Don't walk around too far.

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: I wish you were my real granddaughter~~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, it doesn't matter!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, Grandma. Have you seen some deities that you haven't seen it before?

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Oh~~ Those deities from Vavelia?

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: I've heard they're healing people. I should ask them to see my back too!

Item.name: Mochamori
