Item.talkText: (I should come back to Rubid Village. They will come back again.)

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: I like Mocca so much~ I feel like you're a real granddaughter~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I like Grandma Suga too!

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: Who'd have ever thought I'd come from the beach to Dark Stone Cave! Hohoho.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek! Eeekk!! EEEEKK!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Leeeet's dieee togetherr!!! You devillll!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go… Go away! Ugh!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (I'm using too much magic power so fast!! I'm going to die!!!)

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Congrats on being the leader of the Kabanes Village. Sir Uris.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Why… Why are you using formal words to me?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You can talk casually, as before.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Your position is not a trifle one.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Especially in times like this, when the village has been conquered.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Oh…but you've always treated me like a child, until yesterday.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: But it's different from now on.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You are the leader of the village, and I support you.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Since I helped you grow into a leader, I will risk everything on you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: By the way, what is this Magic Power Stone?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: This is a symbol of a leader, and a Guardian Stone with my magic power.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What, I can't even use magic power…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris, you have a strong and fiery will that burns hotter than my magic power!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: As long as you have that will, this will help you one day.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If this holds your magic power, then…shouldn't it burn? Why put it on my neck…?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ha, so I finally get to see this thing fall.
Item.label: 악어마물 크록스를 향해 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why? Were you defeated by this thing all the time?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: This monster rules the Kabanes Swamp, and so the villagers are wary of the swamp because of it.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I've heard that in the past, it would barge into the village to cause a ruckus and eat all the food.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Then when Lady Mariena settled down in the village, it dared not come.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It was afraid of Lady Mariena's flames, which do not go out easily even in water.

Item.name: crox
Item.talkText: Grrr…
Item.label: 악어괴물 크록스가 쓰러졌다가 깨어나는 대사

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Its power of recovery is still strong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why don't you defeat it here, by yourself?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wouldn't it avoid the villagers even in the swamp, then?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I've never beaten it before…I'll try.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Even when I was weaker, I did fight wild boars with my bare hands.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Phew, I won.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Queen. Thanks for the pep talk.

Item.name: crox
Item.talkText: Eeeekkk…
Item.label: 크록스가 죽는 소리

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: How did you open the door?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There was a switch on the lower floor?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Phew, I thought you broke the door and came in.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why does this place look so dirty?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't you have any people that work for you?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The Rubid villagers hate my family.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The manager and workers are all gone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's the reason?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: When the Pope invaded this continent, my father was against the Pope.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: My father liked the deities.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The reason you could run away was my father was fighting with the Pope.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: My father was executed by Pope right away.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: In front of my eyes.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The Pope captured the villagers as slaves, decreeing it as punishment for rebelling against divine authority.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Some lost their wives, others lost their fathers or their children…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The villagers blamed my father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: They said they wouldn't have lost their family if my father was not against the Pope…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I lost my father… and village people… So I couldn't stay here any longer.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I promised myself that I will find all the lost families at all costs.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Except for mine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't you hate the village people?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you trying to help them?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: These village people… are the legacy that my father left me.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Also, they lost their family… Of course, they blame my father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You understand because you lost yours too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you can understand them?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even though you hurt so much?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: …… I get you too.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Honestly I… I am upset that people blame my father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: We have endured hard times together, built up the village and grew up…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I also lost my family in front of my eyes…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Why everyone is blaming me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… So?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …Shu…Shukrina?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are… Are you crying?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You… don't express your feelings like this!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Calm… Calm down!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: ……I won't cry. I am a ruler who needs to be responsible for these people.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: If I abandon this place, I will lose my connection to my father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: This was everything to him.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Also, this is the village that my father loved… I will take care of this village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you came to me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: To rescue other families from the Pope…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Yes. I needed power because I've lost everything.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: This house… I will fix it when my work is done.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Everyone will be happy when they find their family… And they will fix this place and miss my father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are not weak.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I had magic power and even received power from Agamo, the strongest deity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I had the power to do anything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you lost everything.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even the village people hate you, so you must be out of your mind.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you came to my castle with nothing and said you wanted to be my minion, without hesitation.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: At first, it was funny. What could a mere human…and a kid at that, accomplish?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have such a strong spirit.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't expect this from humans… You amazed me.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Don't try to comfort me.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I will smile when you kill the Pope and resurrect all the dead people.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. I will make your dream come true.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So don't whine like a kid.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you're a strong kid but you're crying!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Stop crying!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I did not!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I just thought of the old days!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, what is this room?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: This is where I had sword training with my father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: All the swords and shields are my father's belongings.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I've only locked this room so they won't get stolen.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Those armor are too big so I couldn't use them.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: It was my dream that I get my father's armor and use them just like my father…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Now, I can just about use the knight gauntlets.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Those are a bit big for me though…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That flower is resisting so hard.
Item.label: 정화의 꽃이 공격을 하도 심하게 해서 하는 모카의 말.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Ah…that's the flower I planted as I left my hometown.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't know you had a hobby of growing violent flowers.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't plant this near Pruto Meadow. It's gross.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: This flower absorbs dark magic power from its root and purifies it into its own magic power.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But since this land is too tainted by Dark Magic, the purifying skill won't work.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you planted this to purify your hometown.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: So I put my magic power into this flower.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I had hoped that if this flower can withstand the dark magic for a long time, perhaps its surroundings may become purified.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The flower seems to have become strong enough to survive without your magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But it could not purify its surroundings.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Yes. I think the amount of Dark Magic that comes out to the ground is much more than the flower absorbs.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I believe I will need to plant enough flowers to cover this land in order to see the effect.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then we won't be able to set foot on this land. The flowers will keep attacking us.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Yes… Also, we might need lots of magic power. I put all my magic power just to create this one flower.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Sadly, I should reclaim the magic power I gave to this flower.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Your rage hasn't been put out - it's still burning.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Sleep now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did you just absorb the bird?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since the bird was spewing flames, it seems you raised it…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: The bird grew up inside me.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I was destruction incarnate in the past. The bane of Kabanes.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? You were?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you're such a softy! How were you an avatar of destruction?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I was, when the bird was inside me.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I took the bird out of my body.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Why I took it out… How I did it… I can't remember…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: But my rage was gone because of it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait, so since you absorbed the firebird, are you back to your old self again?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Well… Maybe…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh… It will be painful to patch things up if you go nuts.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your flame doesn't go away easily!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I was joking.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You were making a jest? You think I'm easy now, huh.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: No need to worry about that.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: In the past, the firebird may have been the master of my body, but no longer.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Thanks to you, Miss Moccamori. You overpowered the bird, I was able to absorb it safely.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Thank you. Miss Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, you will be more useful then!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena…so you're not just an ordinary deity.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Sniff!! Sniff sniff!!!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Isn't… that catnip?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What… What's wrong with you?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: It's boring…

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: My duty to keep the gate is over now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're acting like a wild cat. Hey, get yourself together.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… My suppressed instinct just exploded.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: I was so bored in this cave but I saw the catnip, and…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you protecting this place?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Because I was chosen to be a Temple secretary?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you have any duty?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: It's to guard the power sealed in the Temple!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: …… Huh?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: You received Nova's power?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: It was a smart choice to open the gate for you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah. So are you free now?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Phew, I can't choose that!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: My mission is now to become your minion.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: My duty is to guard the master's power.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Since you now have the master's power, I have to protect you!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: So you!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: You be my master!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, I got a nice, free minion for getting Nova's power.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Give me the catnip!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Phew, even though it was a hallucination, it looked so real.
Item.label: 크라운 환상이랑 싸운 직후 고양이 신관의 말

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Or… Is your trauma that strong?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah. It was but a moment that I saw him but I can remember that day vividly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will never forget that day. Even if it's a hallucination, I will kill him every time he is in front of me.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: It's both.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Ma… Master!?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: You… You haven't been a Temple Secretary that long, and you're already out?!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Oh… That… That is…!!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Shut up! You lazy brat!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Go back now!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: I am on my mission!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: This one right here! She got Nova's power!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Are you crazy? Who can take Nova's power… Huh?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Haha… What is this? She does have Nova's magic power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ahem, I was able to get it because I'm special!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: So because of this little girl, we made Meowood Tribe as a Temple Secretary?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Haha, I knew what she was so I opened the gate.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I was worried to make you my successor, but you succeeded.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I am so proud of you… Hahaha!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Good work. How are you doing?

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: It was a bit boring, but everything is good.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Let me see your claws.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Tsk, tsk…you haven't taken care of them.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I told you - even if you use Nova's magic power for strength, it's important to manage the claws that are the medium.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Put on the talons I've been using.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Master, you wore these? Why didn't you give them to me before?

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I forgot.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I was going to give you but you left already, so I was going to give them to the next successor.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Take this now. It will help.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Hehe, thank you. Master!

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: I sensed familiar magic power and came here…it was indeed you.

Item.name: MerchantCat
Item.talkText: Mission? You just got caught running out and yet you try to lie to your master?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I absorb all the magic power in the spring, will that break the sealed power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm. Or…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: They… Took Noa's necklace too…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I had to save her.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You. You sealed your body with the temple.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well. Without the Temple Lord, the spring will be destroyed eventually… You are at least trying to do your duty.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: What is going on?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Why am I alive?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I, Moccamori saved you!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I sealed myself into the temple…?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: How could you break Mirac's seal?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: No, how do you have Lord Mirac's magic power in the first place?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your master approved me so he gave the power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Arkas, I am your savior. Also, I am your master and the one with the power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So become my minion! You seem quite useful!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I can't say no since Mirac's power has been transferred to you.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Lord Mirac must have some thoughts on this.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Could you do me a favor?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're asking a favor as soon as you become my minion… What is it?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Please save Noa.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? I thought you gave up on her!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought she's going to give up and be sealed.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I only gave up my life.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Since I'm alive, Noa has to live, too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How can I? I can't give any of my magic power!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: We don't need your magic power.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Noa's life was maintained not by the magic power of the spring, but by her fairy necklace.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Thanks to the necklace, a fairy's lifespan is similar to a mixed deity's.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: But because the humans took her necklace…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you saved Noa with the spring's power!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good. It's better to save a life that matters to you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Humans deserve to have the tainted land. But how dare they take the fairy's life?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So if I find the fairy necklace, Noa can maintain her life, right?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Yes. It hasn't been too long since Noa gave up the power of the spring. It's not too late.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Where is the fairy necklace?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: That… is…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: … I don't know since the land has changed a lot.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: But that is something that won't disappear easily. It's definitely somewhere in Varnado.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: According to my last memory…a charlatan priest stole Noa's necklace, promising eternal life…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: This is sad… You have become like this…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't say… This dragon… Is it your guardian?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Yes. Because I was a Temple Secretary who doubled as a Temple Lord, I kept a guardian.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I thought you would have been free after my death…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: You waited for me here, and was tainted by the dark magic.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I am truly sorry…truly.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A dragon that waited for its master but was consumed by the darkness…how sad.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I will purify you once when the Mirac spring fills up again.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Just wait for me until then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Didn't it just react to your voice?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: It's in pain…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Why don't we follow her together?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Yes. Though we are both ragged beings, let us at least be together from now on.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, it's the dragon that I met at the Hill of Wind!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Laura seemed very upset…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: You are still alive. Very lucky for such a small deity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Small deity? You do remember that I beat you, right?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I merely restrained myself per Laura's request. Pretentious little deity…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha? A dragon, calling me pretentious?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey! You seem pretty long-lived, so you probably heard the name Agamo, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am Moccamori, the queen of this continent, and the successor of Agamo!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Agamo. Yes. The primal deity, the most powerful one.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: And so?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: His successor you may be, yet you are but a small child right now.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: After the first Agamo had vanished, I ruled this land for a while.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Now I simply remain, having lost interest in ruling…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You talk as if you can become a king anytime you want, if you desired so.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So, so very arrogant.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: But not as arrogant as you, truly. A mewling deity who barely lived a few years…
Item.label: 모카와 말싸움하는 드래곤. '아주아주'를 그대로 받아침.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well? Even with using all of your power, you're still no match for me!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Impossible…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Grr…… I am ashamed… To be defeated by a juvenile deity…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I should die of shame…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, you lost to Laura too, right?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Did… Did Laura reveal this to you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? I just guessed it, but apparently got it right!!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Gah…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You seem like a proud dragon, but you were very obedient to Laura.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So I was wondering - and it was true!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: She is quite terrifying.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Besides, she is his herald as well…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Anyway, I had never lost to anyone besides Laura… Phew…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why did you fight her? Laura is fond of dragons.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: There was a time when dragons ruled the world as kings.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: As the ultimate creatures, dragons had no need to actually rule over humans…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: But when a group of Warriors began to hunt smaller dragons, we decided to rule the humans.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Well, we had no plans to exterminate the humans. We meant to scare them.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Then one day, while I was away, the humans abducted my new hatchling.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: A plan to threaten me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can guess what happened next.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Believing my progeny to be dead, I intended to destroy the entire continent.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: As I was rampaging, Laura appeared.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: She was very strong.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: All of my kin charged at her, but it only led to more causalities.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: After tremendous losses, we surrendered to her.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So that's what happened between Laura and the dragons.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Laura felt sorry for the sacrificed dragons, and so protected us since then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why would you need protection? You have the power to protect yourselves.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Dragons do not lack power, indeed.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: But there are things is this world from which even power cannot protect.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: You will know eventually, when you live long enough. About what those are…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Whatever, but now you have to obey me, too. You lost to me!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Did you think I would tremble when I heard that name?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, look at you. Are you still upset that you lost to me?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Let us fight once more. I shall channel more power this time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Sure. Do your worst!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm guaranteed a win if we fight now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Challenge me after some more training!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Grr… A definite rematch, then.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Are you here to capture me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm just hunting. And you're the unlucky game.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Come to think of it, you're a talking dragon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Which means you've lived a long time, or you're the guardian of a Temple Lord - which is it?

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: …I was the guardian of Lord Mirac, a long time ago.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? So why are you so weak?

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I do not have Lord Mirac's magic power anymore…

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: And the guardian is not obligated to be powerful.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: The unyielding will to guard the spring without lusting after its power is our first virtue.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: But you have recovered tremendous amount of magic power recently…

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I am nothing compared to you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll let you live. Instead, give me something nice to use as aa magic ingredient.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Uh… Umm…

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I do not possess anything…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Give me your horn. The horn is the source of a dragon's magic power, right?

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Ah… Without a horn, I will have to live in seclusion due to shame.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: How…how about this? It is a piece of my leather.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek, is it okay to take off your leather?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not into these kinds of tortures…

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: My leather is made of several layers. They grow more as time goes by, so this is not a problem for me.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: It is suitable for keeping warm. My leather is good enough to let me go about as I please in the snowfield.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Deal.

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: I shall never challenge you, ever…

Item.name: Lambragon
Item.talkText: Thank you for sparing me. I shall part with my leather gladly, should you need more.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, my clothes got wet as I rode on the raft.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe we should camp for a while, since we have an upcoming fight with the Kabanes?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You can't go to sleep, can you?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Since your hard-earned power is gone, and those around you have begun to notice it, I do not blame you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't care about others. I can beat them anyways!
Item.label: 한글오타 교정. 재번역 불필요.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's that kid Ida that keeps popping up in my head - can't sleep.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Don't worry.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You have come such a long way, did you not?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course I did.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can overcome these hardships many more times, if that's what it takes to give everyone eternal life!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I knew my master was strong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aren't you going to sleep, butler?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I have to keep vigil beside you until daybreak.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How can you keep me safe when you're so weak?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You can't even fight a swamp crocodile.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have a safeguard device installed with my magic power around my bed, so don't worry.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If I can do naught but light a fire beside you, that would be an honor for me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is nothing compared to the grace I have received from you, master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And that grace was a mistake, I told you!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are you saying…it was a mistake to take me in?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So…this is the cairn that Ethan said his brother used to raise before wishing for luck.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It should topple, but it doesn't.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Uris… You have quite an interesting hobby…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Narrel. They say it's the largest dragon in the world - and it is indeed, humungous.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wonder what magic ingredients this dragon can give me?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Hmm… Has it been a century already?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: It seems not, as I do not hunger…

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Or perhaps I ate too much before I slept?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Did you wake me?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: A tiny deity dares… And you are prepared to die?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Which part of you is the most useful?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: A mad child, perhaps…?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Bah, just go. What do I gain from eating you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm, I heard that Narrel's meat can greatly increase one's stamina…maybe it will be good eating?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: I meant to spare you, yet you persist…

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Gaaaaah…

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: I am awake and hurt…this is problematic… Perhaps I should go out for a meal…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, I own this continent. I won't let you destroy it.

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Ha, damn it. There were no deities who could stop me a century ago…

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Do I have no choice but to hunt sea octopuses again?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: I am sick of seafood now… Bleh.

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: The continent of Derkarr would be too dry for anything to eat…

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: Perhaps the deities in Vavelia are weaker?

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: No, no. My older brother did not make it back after he went there.

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: I bet there are powerful deities there.

Item.name: Nar
Item.talkText: … The sea it is, then.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It really likes talking to itself.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: By the way, I saw unfamiliar gear when you covered yourself in golden magic power, yes?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Was that golden armor also gear left by Lord Agamo?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. Actually, that armor plays an important role in magic power awakening.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It controls the wild power of other weapons so that I can wield them.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I was designing a new outfit, and it gave me good inspiration!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A new outfit? What's that?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I have heard good news from Uris and Mariena.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Recently, a metal called Corona, which is almost on par with Rare Metal, has been discovered in Lunata Mine.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: After I heard this, I thought that wearing armor will make you look more dignified.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eh, I don't like suffocating clothes.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When I see the Warriors' heavy armor, I feel like I'm suffocating!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Haha, I already know your taste very well.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will make it light and comfortable to move, so trust me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I had a true inspiration when you just showed me the golden armor.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Make it when you get all the materials.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This is trivial, but…it seems your clothes have changed.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I've never seen this outfit, either.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Haha, it looks like you are all blown away by the master's dignified looks.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I wanted to emphasize the master's dignity the more they resist against her.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Without Mariena, are not their forces practically nothing by now?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then would those clothes mean much?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But of course! This shall commemorate the surrender of the fools who dared to rebel against the master!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Magnificence is paramount to a monarch! What would you know to babble so?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Incredible. You look stunning in white!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It's pretty~! You look more like a leader!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Does it look good on me?
Item.label: 새로 입은 지휘관의 옷을 입고 하는 말

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh, I'm sorry. I wasn't trying to look down on your work.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You can also view these clothes as the celebration for the master's recovery. What seems to be the problem?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I've begun working on these clothes the moment we spotted the movements of the Kabanes and the Lunata.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Well…

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: May I ask you a favor?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? The Lunata Village Chief is asking me a favor?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're too shameless, you know?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Well… The thing is…

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: This village has been run by the young Warriors…

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: It is not my will to rebel against you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you're the chief! You have a responsibility for this!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Please forgive the youngster's insolence…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, what were you going to ask?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I pray that you have the heart to listen to me.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: There is a terrifying dragon called Murgav in Lunata Mine.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: It used to live in Plano Plain, but has fled to the mine after being chased away by another enormous dragon named Narrel.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Murgav used to only attack the miners in the mine. But sometimes it comes out to see the sun.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: To make matters worse, it comes down to our village and causes all sorts of mayhem.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your village, your problem.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: This is beyond our capabilities.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: The young Warriors only busy rebelling against you, and have no interest in running the village.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Yesterday Murgav snatched away a child, but the youngsters were busy playing Warriors.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: The village is in shambles… And it is difficult for an old man to reinstate discipline. So please…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You got what you deserve. Take care of it yourselves.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Then I will give you all the red gems I've collected in my life!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You do know that red gems are rarities that even the legendary fairies delight in, yes?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I've collected them in my days of adventuring, and are they are everything from my youth.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: How about it? Will that be enough for negotiations?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You… You mean witch!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How dare you try to make a deal with me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You should have offered that before. Then I would have granted you mercy!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: When I die soon, I will appear in your dreams and scream forever!!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You little devil!!!!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: When I die and become a ghost, I swear to haunt you!! Forever!!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: If you show me the spoils of war from Murgav, I will immediately offer you these red gems!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Oh my… That's Murgav's horn!!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Thank you. Our village can now feel safe again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I couldn't find the child that Murgav took.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: The child climbed out of the pit, thankfully.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: He must have been hiding in terror.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You only have two red gems to show for your entire life?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Of course not. I have more.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I'd like to ask one more thing of you…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? Are you trying to make a bargain with me?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Please understand that this is the only bargaining chip this old man has left.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Narrel, the dragon who chased off Murgav to the mine, sleeps for a century after each meal.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I don't think it will wake up within my lifetime, but it will be a mighty gift for our descendants if you could defeat it beforehand.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Would it not be best for a mighty ruler to use her great powers for a cause?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're so annoying.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Narrel is in Plano Plains, where you can reach by climbing the rocks at the edge of the mine.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: This is… Why, you are so small, yet you've managed to hunt down the world's largest dragon!
Item.label: 나르에르의 전리품(혀,살점 등)을 보고 놀라는 촌장

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You are amazing.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Perhaps you are a kinder, gentler savior than expected.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're giving me so little each time! This isn't impressing me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And what else are you going to request, baiting me with the red gems?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You know everything, Your Majesty.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I wish that you would look beyond this village and into the future of this continent.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: They say a long time ago, Sierra, who lives in Ice Plateau, froze this continent entirely.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: It is said that the Ürphean deities, who were not familiar with ice magic, faced great difficulty in handling it.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Defeating Sierra now will ensure that it will not covet this continent for generations.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, you're thinking too far!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why are you worried about the future and humanity?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you want to play Wise Man because the youngsters won't let you play Warriors with them?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I simply desire so, after witnessing your greatness.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I wish to leave the next generation something good before I pass away soon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're not the one leaving this legacy, I am!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: In any case, I humbly beg of you. Please return with the loot from Sierra.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Oh, my! Does that ice horn belong to…?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You have managed to survive an encounter with Sierra!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's up with you? You sound as if you expected me to die?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Ahem, of course, I knew you'd win.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I must have misspoke because I did not expect you to defeat Sierra in such a short time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And is there another quest?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You are keenly observant.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: This will be the final one.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Terrenord. It lives somewhere in Dragon Valley.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: It is a war criminal, having waged war on the deities of this continent in ages far before the time of Sierra, over the rule of humans.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: It will definitely become a grave threat to your dominance someday. I am sure of it.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: You don't need to bring me any loot this time.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Just show him your majesty! You will be victorious for certain!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Hehehe, this old man has done what the young'uns could not!

Item.name: Kids
Item.talkText: Wow~~ How did you do it!?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Praise someone as royalty, and they will become elated with pride. Manipulate that, and even the most powerful can be swayed to do our bidding!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: That brat is probably squished to a pulp by Terrenord by now.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Do you see? Use your wits, and you can do everything, even in your old age.

Item.name: Kids
Item.talkText: Grandpa, you're amazing!

Item.name: Kids
Item.talkText: But she's come back alive, though!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Wha…what!!??

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: She even defeated Terrenord!?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: But I heard that even adult deities are overpowered by Terrenord!!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: How can a small deity like you…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because I'm the best, that's why.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me ask you one thing. I helped you. So why did you try to kill me?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Ugh… I do thank you for defeating Murgav.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: But still… You're a threat to our village! That will never change!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I know that the pitiful young Warriors can never be victorious against a powerful deity like you.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: So when you defeated Murgav, I had an idea. What if I pitted you against more powerful foes…?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: And I was successful in herding you to those powerful beings.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me know if there are other powerful monsters. I'll go face them anytime.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: There…there are none, now…

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Who will defeat you?

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Here is the final gem. Kill me if this is insufficient - I care not.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: In front of the kid? I'm not that cold-blooded.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now that you know I'm the best, don't mess with me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No matter how wily your plans are, my power will surpass them infinitely!

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: Very well. I will pass that down to our descendants…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Didn't the workshop owner daydream here everyday?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't find him today.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Oh, the workshop owner went to the Kabanes swamp.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Sometimes he disappears when he gets inspiration.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: But this time, he hasn't returned in a while. He must have been greatly inspired.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Well, passion is always good.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Research is always delightful.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: I feel rewarded when people are awed by the items I craft.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: In that sense, Barnell and I have much in common. We tend to research new materials together as well.
Item.label: 바넬은 무기상 이름. 이름 목록에 있음. WeaponMaker

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing there?

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Hehe, I'm so lucky.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: I found some nice research material, but I was afraid I couldn't make it back alive.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: I was more afraid of not getting the chance to use the precious material than dying, actually. Haha!

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Since you are here, Your Majesty, the monsters on this path are now all gone, yes?

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Since you are here, Your Majesty, the monsters on this path are now all gone, yes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How bold for a human. Will you learn your lesson only when you are burned to death by the monsters…?

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: I must thank Your Majesty for saving me. Please, feel free to take this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You gathered all of this here? That's a lot.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Haha, and we needed more hands to carry the Flame Stones. Now that you are here, not only are we safer, but…haha.
Item.label: 모카에게 필요없는 물건을 넘겼다는 늬앙스

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Ah! I risked my life to find this!
Item.label: 모카가 화염석을 빼앗자 서글퍼하는 공방주인

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go then.

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: Thank you!

Item.name: Maker_purto
Item.talkText: I was fleeing from a monster…and got stuck between the rocks.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The farmer is not around here today.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: Purto Meadow's soil is the best.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: The crops are growing plentifully, enough for all the villagers to eat well!

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I'm thinking about planting more crops these days.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aren't you the village farmer?

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: Oh, what brings you here, Your Majesty?

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I'm here to find some new seeds to plant in the village.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: The fruits of this forest are very delicious, but their large size makes it difficult to carry them.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: In addition, the bridge that leads to this region is old and narrow, and dangerous for transporting goods.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I think this tree will grow well when planted within the village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How will you move the tree? Will you pull it out of the ground?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Or plant a seed and wait for a hundred years?

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: Haha, of course not.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I chanced upon a sapling. I can handle a small one like this.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: The Pruto soil is unusually fertile, so it will grow to be as tall as this large tree here in a few years.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: Maybe it will also be more fruitful, too.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: By the way, would you like to try a rare fruit I found?

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: It's a fruit that falls on this forest occasionally, but I can't figure out what tree it belongs to.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: Eh? I want to taste it, too! It was difficult to find this!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I want it all. Give me everything!

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: You're so harsh! I even offered you my generosity!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It tastes better than I thought. Yum yum yum!

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: Wow, you sure eat with a passion!

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I actually have two more. Have them!
Item.label: 농부가 준 열매가 최종 2개가 되기에 2개로 대사 수정

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aren't you going to eat?

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I'm content with seeing you eat with such gusto. Haha.

Item.name: ethan
Item.talkText: Okay… FINE!?
Item.label: 모카가 에단에게 고문을 하려는 줄 알고 오해하여 지르는 에단의 말

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: (…… Wait, that is….?)
Item.label: 모카랑 다투다가 물 속에서 무엇인가를 발견한 우리스의 말

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm looking for my brother because of my mother.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: When I told my mother I was being deployed to Ürphea, she didn't worry about my safety - she told me to bring back my brother.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It was maddening to listen about my lost brother for 10 years, but then she wanted me to go find him as well!

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm searching for my brother, so that I can tell mother for certain that he's dead.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm going to find a keepsake so that my mother can finally let him go.

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Damn it, you had to use the mother card…

Item.motherEventName: 루나타 연합 퇴치 후 왕의 방에서
Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: When you give eternal life to everybody, leave my brother out.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You like to play people against each other. I've seen your kind frequently in the palace to know you well enough.
Item.label: 에단이 세실리아에게 하는 말

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I thought about leaving… But then I was worried about the aftermath of you ousting the Little Queen. Perhaps you might gather an army to invade the continent of Vavelia.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You and the Pope have so much in common.
Item.label: 세실리아에게 하는 말

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Brother. Did you miss me much?
Item.label: 에단에게 하는 말

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I wished you were truly dead. I merely searched for you to confirm the fact.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You searched for me because of mother.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yes. She talked about you for 10 years and it drove me crazy.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Damn it! Our colleagues were defeated already?!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Justice!! Wait! Let's talk for a moment!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ethan… Was everybody defeated except you?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Varon held them off with a barrier, but Justice made it out.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Our friends are helping Varon maintain the barrier.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff… Even now it is not too late.
Item.label: 모카가 부활의식중일 때 도착한 저스티스. 의식이 없는 모카를 죽이기 전에 하는 대사.

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Gaah…aaaah!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ethan! Protect the master!!!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Ethan! I sense emotion in your blade. Have you fallen completely to this witch?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You are the one who's emotional right now! You always told me to be rational!

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Will you come to your senses only when I strike you down with my sword?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well, bring it on! You have never defeated me in sparring!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ethan! You can do it!!! Do it!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ethan!!! Get yourself together!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Quickly…wake the Little Queen!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's dangerous to wake her up right now…!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: SHUT UP!!! NOW!!!!!!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: TIME TO EAT CHICKEN!!!!!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huf…. Huff….

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's happening right now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why did the resurrection ritual stop?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You were in danger…so I woke you up… I am sorry…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ugh, I didn't know they came here already.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's okay. I can restart the ritual. Just a little longer, and it's over!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eh….? What's wrong with Ethan!? Did they get him?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: He just passed out. No need to worry about him.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: By the way, did the resurrection ritual fail completely?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Ah, the first follower in ages.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A follower? What is this rotting corpse saying?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: You are not a follower…?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Then listen to me.

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: I can make you immortal.

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: If you offer me your life, I shall awaken you in an immortal body.

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Behold! My immortal body! The power of this statue, imbued with immortality!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you a fool? That's obviously a body tainted by dark magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You still cling to reason, despite being human.
Item.label: 원래 검은 마력에 오염되면 이성을 잃는다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you the priest who has been deceiving people with claims of granting immortality?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You look hideous. A fate deserving of a human who mimicked deities.

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: I told no lies! I proved my immortality, so I spoke the truth!

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Behold, even though my body is imperfect, my soul is completely attached!

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Without the need to eat, I can live forever subsisting only on the magic power rising up from the land!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And what about the followers? Didn't they just sacrifice themselves for you?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: That is Arkas' fault! The foolish Temple Secretary who was smitten by a fairy and neglected this land!

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: This land became tainted as he handed over the spring to that fairy, and all humans, including my followers, perished!!

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Only I, who relied on the power of this statue, managed to survive…

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Tragic, is it not?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Still, who would want to live as a corpse like you?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Why you… My accomplishments seem petty to a deity like you, yes?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Humans are short-lived and cannot wield magic. Do you know how difficult it is for us to attach a soul like so?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Arrogant deities… I'm going to kill you!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? He looks like he is conscious, but he doesn't move at all.
Item.label: 어둠의 제사장이 서 있는 걸 보고 하는 말

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You! You would hand over the master's gift so easily?
Item.label: 에단 회유하기 이벤트 추가대사, 모카가 준 검을 리브로에게 넘기려는 에단의 말에 발끈하는 리브로. 리브로는 에단이 무슨 말을 해도 질투하고 미워한다.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What do you want me to do…?
Item.label: 에단 회유하기 이벤트 추가대사

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: This one has taken Noa's necklace.

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: No… NO!

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Noa's necklace has so much life force!

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Without it, this eternal body I barely managed to create will crumble!!!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Fool, Noa's necklace does not grant eternal life.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: The fairy necklaces increase your lifespan the more you collect them - but they don't make you immortal.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: If you had not taken Noa's necklace…Varnado would not be in such a state.

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Wrong! If you were not smitten by that fairy, Varnado would be fine!!

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: You were supposed to protect the humans! Was it not the duty of the strong to help the weak!?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: And yet you took th necklace from Noa, who was the weaker one?

Item.name: DarkPriest
Item.talkText: Weaker one? Fairies enjoy long lives - what is wrong with us humans trying to have a taste of that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Arkas. Stop arguing, and let's go save Noa.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Debating with a crazed fool will get you nowhere.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: …… Yes. We need to save Noa first.
Item.label: 대사오류 수정, 아르카스->노아

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: If we go to the fairies' resting place in the North of Varnado, we can save Noa.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is it the pond where the fairies' magic power is pooled? Similar to the deities' springs, yet quite different.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also, this pond isn't even tainted by Dark Magic! I guess fairies are very special indeed.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Fairies are born and die here.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: When their time comes, they return their necklaces to the pond.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Then a new fairy is born here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then the number and lifespan of fairies are limited?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Yes. If a fairy cannot return the necklace to the pond, it will eliminate one new fairy.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Sometimes, fairies are almost driven to extinction by humans who covet their necklaces.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I will bring out Noa's soul that was sealed in me. Then I will return the necklace to the pond once I put her soul into the necklace.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How will you bring Noa back?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Since Noa was not able to live out her lifespan, the pond will return her to us.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh right… You were a fairy.
Item.label: 노아가 사람이 아닌 요정의 모습으로 나오자 모카가 어색해서 하는 말.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's awkward to see you in blue.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I shall revert you to your human shape.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why did you give a human shape to a fairy?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Noa was supposed to be my Temple Secretary.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you're a Temple Secretary.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A Temple Secretary's Secretary…

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: As I was the de facto Temple Lord when Lord Mirac was not available, I needed a Secretary.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: As a Temple Lord, I felt that I needed to listen to the fairies as well.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Varnado is a land that we share with the fairies, after all.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ah-ha! So you shaped her to look human, so that you could talk to her!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aren't Secretaries supposed to have deity-like forms?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: They are…but fairies are mysterious, even to us deities.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I failed to transform her into a deity form, so I have her a human shape.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: … Thank you so much. Thank you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Stop saying that. It's annoying… Oh. Nope.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ahem, are you thankful to me!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then Noa, you should be my minion too!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Please… Let Noa go free. I beg you.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: No! I actually like this! I can stay with Arkas!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She says yes?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: If Noa says so…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Arkas listened much to the affairs of the fairies.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Thanks to him, the fairies were able to flee from the harassment of humans.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: This was probably when danger encroached upon Noa.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Because I forbade the humans from collecting fairy necklaces, the priest tried to kill Noa.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Humans, always the same…!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: You found me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I never imagined your hideout to be this close. This is ridiculous.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's all over now. I'm going to destroy it all!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't harass your village anymore. Are you still going to fight me?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I don't care if the others surrender!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I needed more time to prepare… Oh well.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Uris is on my side too!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: You have the potential power to destroy a village. I know you well! You're a disaster waiting to happen!!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Gah… How could I lose, with Rare Metal gear?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Is Agamo's power that powerful…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That Rare Metal… It's impressive.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I had been attacked right after I lost my power, I might have been done for.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: What…?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Damn it… I thought you were hiding your magic power on purpose to bring us out…

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: … Did you actually lose your magic power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. More's the pity for you, eh?

Item.name: sena
Item.talkText: Damn it!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That one won't give up after losing once.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They will regroup, then threaten me again…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But as long as they've settled here, they can't move their hideout too far immediately.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They're probably be confined to the Lunata region.
Item.label: 루나타 숲, 루나타 마을 등 루나타 이름 들어간 지역들을 말하는 것임

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wish I can find them before they complicate things…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I knew you would be nearby. This place was just set up, right?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Don't panic, and focus!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Of course! We risked our lives on this!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Come on everyone!!

Item.name: senaWarrior_1
Item.talkText: Al… Alright!

Item.name: senaWarrior_2
Item.talkText: Let's go!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Gaah…!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When will you stop rebelling? Can't you feel the difference in power?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I won't forgive you for what you did to my brother! I will come at you until I die!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your brother didn't even die. I simply absorbed his magic power - is that so infuriating to you?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Denny is very weak! He couldn't wake up for months because you drew out all his magic power!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: You basically killed my brother!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I will gather more magic power, then return for you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Running away…again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since their temporary hideout was revealed, the only place in Lunata they can go to is…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, I guess your minions ran away?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: They were a nuisance, so I told them to leave me be for a while.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You've gathered much magic power in a short time. I can feel you've become powerful.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Come out!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're mind-controlling that big dragon?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I can dominate any monster.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I guess this may be surprising for someone who knows nothing except bluntly unleashing Agamo's magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Stop blaming it all on my father!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Not everyone can handle my father's magic power, given to them or not!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know, you lost even after partnering up with a dragon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You removed your minions because you thought might be embarrassed like this, right?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: SHUT UP!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There's no other place in Lunata to hide now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe she'll leave the Lunata region?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Ugh…I haven't fully recovered my magic power…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I guess they were in a hurry. I didn't think they'd be here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even the village people didn't notice them. Did they cross the mountain?

Item.name: Warrior1
Item.talkText: Captain… Is it over now…?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: What are you talking about!?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Focus, men! Don't show your weakness!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Ughhh?! Nobel!! What are you doing?!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Please… Forgive me. Captain! But you will never surrender!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: What?! Surrender!?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: You bastard… This is all you've got?

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: You can't see it, captain, because of your need for vengeance.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Captain. This is our limit.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Even if you become more powerful, that witch will be ahead of you.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: So let's give up. If we don't, we are going to die.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Bah…!! That's nonsense…!!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: We all decided to surrender. You just need to let go of your ego and vengeance, captain!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: You… We spent all this time together… How can you betray me?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: You better watch out…I will kill you…Ugh!!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Help… Help me.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: You see? I stabbed Yvette… So…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So pathetic. Humans, disgusting…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I shouldn't be surprised. This is natural for you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go. I have no business with you.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Thank… Thank you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh yes? Then let me make this clear.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Spare me. We will never rebel against you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How did you enter the village?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My soldiers are not doing their jobs. Have they grown complacent after Uris' gang surrendered?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, why aren't you giving up already!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I've lost my colleagues. Now I have nothing to lose.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: This ends here.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: So, it ends like this.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I should have worked alone from the start…how foolish I was.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I didn't know they would betray me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you hold a grudge against them?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Yes. Those bastards… I will kill them when I see them!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow, you're really selfish, huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They sacrificed all for you, but that amounts to nothing now?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Everybody made sacrifices!!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: The villagers suffer, but still send the Warriors supplies… Should we endure any less?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I don't harass the village anymore! What's there to endure, then?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You just want to avenge your brother, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And your pride can't stand giving up now, because it will deflate your ego!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your men betrayed you, because you just rush into things you want without any plans!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Shut up!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Wit… Witch. Please don't kill Captain Yvette.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow… You entered the village, too? My guards are doing nothing, it seems!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: How dare you come here!?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Go away!?

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: We… still want to blame you when we think of our sacrifices!!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: But… We can't throw away the friendship we've built!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're saying this after you stabbed her?

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: You don't die even if I stab you.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: I just didn't want you to fight.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: I was too tied back then…and we had no choice, if we wanted to live.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Captain. Please understand.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: How dare you ask me for mercy!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Go away!!

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: … Thank you. Captain.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: ……. What?

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: You want us to run away.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: We know your tone.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: You know how we feel.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Is that why you fought alone in the mine?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: ……And yet knowing all this, you stabbed me?

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: You don't listen to us because your ego is so strong.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: I am sorry I hurt you. In many ways…

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Hmph…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I know. Did you come here to die all alone?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Just get over this.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: I'm shameful to say this now, but kill me too.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: After we left you, everyday was like a nightmare…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, applause, applause.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then die together~

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Cap… Captain…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow, you hugged your minion. Cool. Yvette?

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Captain…I never knew you felt this way about me…

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Gaah! Stop this ridicule and just finish it now!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My punishment is extremely harsh. Are you ready to receive it?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Just me. Please… let them go.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good! Then Yvette. Be my minion from now on!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: What!? Are you crazy?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No? Is your ego more important than your colleagues' lives?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I know your type find it easier to throw away their lives.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But this is karma! I won't let you off the hook so easily, after all you made me go through!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So, repeat after me. "Great Lady Moccamori!"

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Gr…Great…

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I can't!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, well. Let the execution begin!!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Great Lady Moccamori….!!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: …Your Majesty…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehehe!! Sounds very nice!

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: You… You are!? *Cough Cough*
Item.label: 이베트 동생 데니. 모카에게 마력을 흡수당한 뒤 한동안 누워만 있다 이제야 나옴

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I haven't seen you a while, where have you been?

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: I couldn't wake up after you absorbed my magic power…

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: Don't say… Are you here to absorb my power again…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Such pitiful magic power won't even make a dent.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was surprised you crumbled so easily after I absorbed so little magic power from you.

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: For you…my magic power might have been nothing, but I suffered hellishly because I lost it!

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: Even now it is too painful, but I had to get out because I couldn't stand the bed any longer…

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: So…please give me back my magic power. Please…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There you go. You look awful.

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: Thank… Thank you!

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: I couldn't even breathe… Now I'm alive!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Be honored. You have contributed to Moccamori's grand plan!

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: Ee… Eeeeeekkk!!

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: *Cough*… Give my power back…

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: I feel better now. Thank you for giving my power back.

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: I never thought my sister would work with you.

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: But you promised that you won't pick on the village, so I forgive you too.

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: Oh, I don't need magic power now. My sister has been giving me much…
Item.label: 모카가 뺏어간 마력을 돌려줄 필요가 없다는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Bah, why do I need to suffer because of the Kabanes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There are many annoying creatures tainted by dark magic in the Black Stone Cave… Let's rest here for a bit.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You even summoned a bed.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am precious. Did you think I would sleep in one of your lowly tents?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And you, that side is dangerous.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you sleep on that side, a Warrior tainted in dark magic might ambush you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Thank you for worrying. I will sleep on the tree up there later.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're going to sleep later? What are you doing now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Sniff sniff, what's the smell?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I caught a sleeping bird while I was gathering fruit on the tree.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Smells like it's cooked well. Do you want some?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am a queen. I only eat what my butler cooks for me. I don't care for such plebian food.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh yeah? Then I'll have this alone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't look at me! I'm not hungry.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh, alright.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: *Glurp Glurp*

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This is annoying.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No! Nono!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I… I only eaaat foooood that bootler mad…!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: (What… Wait… It's actually delicious?!)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Now you're quiet.

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: You…! You drained us last time, and now you're back again?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Wow…you make it sound like we're the bad guys!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Do you take us for bandits who rob travelers?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: We just want you to donate to the Lunata Warriors - so what's there to be so frightened about?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Do you know the hardship we Warriors endure to fight the Witch?

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: Are you real Warriors? I've heard of runaways who fled after receiving their gear - are you them?

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: I will report to the Warriors if you keep doing this!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Ha? Report?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Unbelievable. You want to report us, the donation helpers?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: I guess the Witch favoring Rubid Village made you pretty arrogant, huh?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Hey!! Watch your mouth!

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: I… I am sorry! I didn't mean that…!

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: Oh…Your Majesty!!!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Kekeke… Hey, did you think we'd freak out if you say that?

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: The Witch flies around. Why would she walk over this shabby bridge?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Idiot. Flying costs a lot of magic power.

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Eek… EEK!! You're here!?

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: Your Majesty!! Save your loyal subject!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Stealing in my land? You will be punished!

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: Thank you. You saved me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who are they anyway?

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: To be honest, because you are generous to our village, other villagers are jealous of us.

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: We don't mind the eyes of the other villages, but when those Warriors come here and draw their swords… Phew…

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: But since you taught them a lesson, the bridge will be safe for a while.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I shouldn't deal with small fry.

Item.name: Villager_rubid
Item.talkText: Oh…Your Majesty!!!

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Phew, I was surprised.

Item.name: Warrior_0
Item.talkText: Gosh! You scared me! You! You better be prepared!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Go away!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. It's time for the chicken.
