Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Yum yum yum!!!
Item.label: 모카가 치킨 먹는 소리

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: How did you sleep?
Item.label: 잠에서 일어난 모카에게 건내는 리브로의 인사. 모카의 이불을 바꿔줌.

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: I'm done!
Item.label: 치킨을 다 먹음

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Oh yeah~~~ Chicken!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. You should have vegetables too.
Item.label: 모카가 치킨이랑 같이 준 샐러드만 남겨서 리브로가 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I told you not to put vegetables! Why do you keep adding those?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Next time, I will put thinly sliced vegetables in the chicken.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will make sure you eat vegetables.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you do that, you'll pay for it.
Item.label: 한글오타교정. 재번역 불필요.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Hehe, let's see who wins.

Item.name: justice
Item.talkText: Eek…

Item.name: ethan
Item.talkText: Sigh…

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Eeekk! Go away! Go!

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Whoa!! The Queen, in this mine?

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Your Majesty! Help me!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, so I'm' Your Majesty' now, huh? Don't you usually call me the Witch?

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: That's…only the Warriors!!

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: We Lunata villagers don't care who rules us! Only the proud Warriors dislike you!

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Eeek! Please help me!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's that chest behind you?

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Ah…probably a hidden stash of the thieving Warriors. I tried to open it before, but it won't budge…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh? Let me take care of the annoying bugs.

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Thank you for saving me.

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Since you helped me… could you also take care of those bugs under the mine?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you trying to take advantage of me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go away! The chest is mine!

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: I am so sorry!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know you have to offer gifts to ask a favor from the queen, right?

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: Oh… I don't have much but take this…

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: This is a red gem that I just dug up. Take it as my life money!

Item.name: Villager_lunata
Item.talkText: The bugs live beneath the mine! Please take care of them!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are these the bugs the miner mentioned…? There's so many of them!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Everyone… I will see you soon.
Item.label: 샘에 자신을 던져 희생하는 모카의 마음.

Item.name: MerchantRubid
Item.talkText: Oh, it's an honor that you've come to our port, Your Majesty.

Item.name: MerchantRubid
Item.talkText: I have some rare items from other continents - would you like to see them?

Item.name: MerchantRubid
Item.talkText: We only deal in red gems. Please understand.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So weak! I have no more need to fight those below the average.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is not Kabanes Village. Let's cross the bridge beside the torchlight.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina!? Why are you here?
Item.label: 모카가 슈크리나를 처음 영입했을 때 (같은 마을에 살아서 서로 알고 있는 상태)

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Take me as your minion. It will help.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What use do I have of a pampered child?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I want to get my revenge on the Pope.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Whatever it takes, I'll restore my village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……I like the spirit.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What happened to your clothes? You were always neat.
Item.label: 모카의 부하가 되기 위해 먼 길은 온 슈크리나

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: On the other hand, if you try to forge weapons with your fire, your powerful magic power will destroy the materials.
Item.label: 마리애나와 모카모리의 화염마법 차이에 대한 리브로의 보충설명

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Do you understand the difference between your flame and Mariena's flame?
Item.label: 마리애나의 불과 모카모리 불 차이의 부연설명

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh, and Master. I found some useful books that summarized Ice Magic - I hope it will be of help.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's travel by the raft.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The village entrance must be where the torchlight is.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Help yourself!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I find your ordering tone irksome, but I'll let it pass because of the chicken.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Whoa! Wow! I've never seen such a huge chicken!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Wow…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro, are you making the next dishes?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I am cooking an even bigger one with different spices. It's extremely tender. Wait and see.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The octopus is almost fully steamed. I swear to never let your dishes stop coming.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good work. You're my loyal minion!

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Black Joe. Look at Libro.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: You should also follow orders without complaining!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: You think I'm a slave when I raised and carried you on my back?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: And I don't make these kinds of cheap dishes.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Cheap? Then what can you make? Is there anything of higher level than this?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: I can put on strawberries and whipped cream on a pie.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ha, mere child's play.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Child's play? My master loves it the most.

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: The dish that the supreme being of Vavelia loves is surely the best dish of all, right?

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Am I right, Master?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Wow! This chicken is amazing!!! How did you make it?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Black Joe!! Stop making pies and make this!

Item.name: BlackJoe
Item.talkText: Hmph…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Haha, what to do now? Even your master favors my cooking.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: This… Is… I've never tasted this in Vavelia before!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Haha… I made this with my special smoking skill. It's not greasy, so you won't get sick of it even you eat this everyday.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Naturally, my master desires this dish everyday, so it's become quite a chore, haha.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And so my master orders this dish everyday. Thus, every morning is quite a chore, haha.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: They're so loud. And it's only been so long since they've made peace…

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: They're always like that. Don't mind them.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Ethan, will you be returning right away?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Then reinstate yourself as a Palace Warrior. I'm suffering due to your absence.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You have many Commander Warriors, though.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: We went through personnel restructuring after the witch hunt. Most of the Commanders were re-selected from Warriors who did not submit to the Pope.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Which means we're short of Commanders. And the High Commander seat is empty.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You need to pass the test for that. I won't do those tedious things anymore.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Just come. I will make you a High Commander.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ha, with what authority…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Huh? Wait…you mean…you've become the Supreme Palace Warrior?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: And that…that's the Supreme Palace Warrior epaulet on your shoulder?

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: So, now you notice.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But you lost even to me during sword training! The Supreme Palace Warrior must be the strongest.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: What are you talking about? You lost to me when we last fought here!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Why don't you say that after you remove the magic power mark on your cheek.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: But you've also received magic power from the Little Queen. And I hear your weapon was wielded by the supreme deity of the ancient times?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hey, I thought you'd be more reasonable than this. Just admit it.

Item.name: Justice
Item.talkText: Let's spar again right after the banquet.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Like I said, remove that magic power mark on your cheek first.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You guys are too loud - go outside if you want to fight.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Elysion, you have to give me something. The magic power I had gathered for a thousand years is gone.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: My daughter died because of the child you looked after. Be thankful that I am not holding you responsible for this.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I'm just the herald of Lord Agamo. Why blame this one me?

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: I'll have to take this up with Ida when I see him.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: He used my daugther for his plan without my permission!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You're the one who threw your daughter to the wolves. In Vavelia…

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: Hmm… Let's stop it here.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: By the way, tell me how to dispel the ugly bird magic.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: My slave constantly begs me to dispel the bird magic, and it is driving me insane.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Huh? It should undo itself with time.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: What do you mean? He has been like that for over a decade. I think something went very wrong?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: If the magic is not dispelled, then it's one of two reasons.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Either he's always excited…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Or he prefers that form…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: But if he has been excited for over a decade, he should have been dead quickly…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: And he wouldn't want that form…so that's perplexing.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: …. Yeah?

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: Huh, Arc… How commendable of him.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Lady Mariena, please try this too.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Try this. And that. And that too…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I don't want to eat anymore.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Please give this to Edis.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Bah! I'll eat it.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Hmph…. You are so cheap…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I'm just hungry.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Good work. Noa.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I was little bit scared at first when you brought me back.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: I was worried that we might be seperated again.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: But now, we can make our dream come true.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: We couldn't achieve it when we obsessed about the dream…

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Yet it came true when we gave it up! Isn't that amazing?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: We've found the true value when we threw away the wrong obsession.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: We may have been dead inside the spring, but I was more at peace than ever because I was with you.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: We had already achieved our dream since then.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Yes, we have.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Nothing scares me anymore.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I was invited, so I'm here…

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: But I don't feel good.

Item.name: WarriorSubBoss
Item.talkText: Let's just have a drink.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I see that it is good.
Item.label: (하나님 보시기에 좋았더라 인용. 의역 없이 직역)

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Dishes cannot be interrupted.
Item.label: 리브로에게 요리를 연속으로 준비하라는 말. 직역 부탁.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Moccamori has become the true queen of Ürphea.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She is a deity with a kind heart.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Ürphean people sincerely respect her.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even though she is not a queen who grants immortality.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She promised herself.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She will be a queen who teaches more valuable things than immortality.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Ürphean people do not fear Moccamori anymore.

Item.name: Elicion
Item.talkText: Moccamori became the queen of Ürphea after rising above all hardships.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, everyone is rejoicing in the peace you have brought to us.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I think it is time that you appoint the lords of the villages.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They're happy about the peace that I've made?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha~ They are just pretending.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If I show them even an inch of weakness, they will start scheming in no time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wouldn't you say nice things too, when the times are SOOOO nice?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: True sincerity only shows in times of temptation and trials!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You are absolutely right.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won't appoint any lords. I cannot fully trust humans.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll decide everything as it is - let the humans obey me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But I am a bit worried about one thing…as you're taking on the burden of all the lords, you are unable to leave the throne at all.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I hope you can rest in leisure now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, worried that I might become a tyrant?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't worry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've learned from father that you can't achieve everything just with power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But…if I don't have power, then people like the Pope will take away all the hard-earned precious things.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So everything has to be in balance, whether it's power or bonding.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: In conclusion: I, Moccamori, shall protect your precious 'bonding'!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You are absolutely right.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nuuk!! Fly faster!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: MASTERRRR!! We have important things to take care of!!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You take care of that!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But you're the queen!!! Please stay on your throne!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll be visiting Vavelia, so take care of things for a few days!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She became a free queen.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Although she let go of much of the weight of the crown…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She traveled all around the continents to see, listen and learn of many things.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Her mind was still growing, and striving for more.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: She is the supreme being of Ürphea.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even without Agamo's blessing.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Her power and the strong bonding that she has achieved…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Those will protect the continent of Ürphea forever.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Oh… There it is. The octopus came to Rubid.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? I cut off a few of its legs yesterday. Did it come for revenge?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Oh, it has eight legs. It's different one.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: You do not need to go there. I shall go and feast on it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Bring one leg though!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wow…now that the water level has gone down, I can see lands unseen before.
Item.label: 고대의 땅 주변 섬 세 개의 퀘스트를 마치면 바다 수면이 낮아져서 새 섬이 보입니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Something amazing that required an entire island to be hidden? I can't wait to see it.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Uris!! Aren't you coming on board?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Lady Mariena… Sob sob sob……!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Shhh! Stop crying and get on, will you?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Eh… Mariena, your tone has changed…!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: What? You're no longer the leader of Kabanes. I can talk informally now.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I'm way older than you, I don't have to use formal words!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: This will need getting used to…haha.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I thought you wanted me to be casual…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Well it's so sudden…!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You have grown up a lot, kiddo.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Thank you for making it through the hard times.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Are you really not going to leave with us?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Yes. I am really not going to go with you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Sob Sob……

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Instead….

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: When you come back, return with your mother.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What… What does that mean!?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I'll tell you when you bring her, so just get on the ship for now.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: If you don't, I won't see you again!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Yes!! Yes, yes, yes!! My Lady Mariena!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I'm on board!!!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Phew, he's gone now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have to come again and serve me. This is an order.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Please don't come again. I wish your forever happiness in Vavelia.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Haha! Now I hear this from both of you, I should never come back!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It was a pleasure to work with you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You are much better than most Warriors.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You even sacrificed yourself for friends… I've learned a lot from you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Are you complimenting me?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It seems you weren't irredeemably hopeless.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Please take good care of the Little Queen. Be careful when she throws her tantrums.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Don't worry about me.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen. Be a good ruler.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey. Stop calling me 'little'!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh! Come to think of it… You've grown little bit taller!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Do deities grow up fast?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So don't call me 'little'!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the time you return, I'll be much taller. Then you won't be able to call me little!

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: Time's up~ If we don't leave right now, the storm will block the sea route. We might need to wait three more days~

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Ethan! Come quickly! Let's go and bring mother here!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I won't call you 'little' anymore.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Great Queen, Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You should've called me that already!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Say that again!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Great Queen, Lady Moccamori?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'll come back when I finish the Warrior training in Vavelia.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: …It won't be bad to become a Warrior who protects you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……What?

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Gaaaah…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I need to help mom prepare the dishes.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's get Stalie.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't remember why I asked Ethan to hunt Stalie together…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go home to get some rest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We don't need to go to the hideout yet! I'm going to stay with mom.
Item.label: 워프를 시도할 떄 막는 스위치

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's do what I meant to do with Ethan.
Item.label: 집으로 워프를 시도할 때 막는 대사

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Hey!! How many times do I have to tell you!?

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: I said we can't have same stocks! Did I or did I not tell you!

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: Gosh, give me a break. Your items are popular these days, so I brought some as well.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Ha! You've grown some stones! You used to cower before me without a word!

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Do you wanna die!?

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: Damn it, that hurts.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Has your common sense returned?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey!! What are you guys!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: WHY?? You killed him!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What do you mean, 'so'? And you dare commit murder in my presence?

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: I killed… Who?

Item.name: rmNPC_0
Item.talkText: Groan…
Item.label: 쓰러진 상인이 일어나는 소리

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Wow…now you stab me with a sword…scary…

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: Keke, my fists may be weak, but I can beat anyone when I grab a blade!

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: If you want to get stabbed again, try me!

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Whatever… You've gone crazy after we became immortal.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those guys are weird. Let me just go home.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: What are you doing here in Rubid Village, Your Majesty?

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Don't tell me you came to buy mere food?

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: I wish a monster would take the guy next to Broce…

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: Stopping me from selling popular items…that's not normal…

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: As nothing happens when you kill someone these days, many people started to wield swords.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: That fellow used to be very timid, but now he's become a madman.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: Or maybe he was always a murderer at heart, but now he can reveal himself…?

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant1
Item.talkText: I should move my trade to another place. This is too scary…

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: Oh, I have been tolerating him until now.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: But I stayed calm because I knew what I'm capable of when I get really angry.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: But the days have finally come for guys like me.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: Thanks to the immortality you gave us, Your Majesty, I am now stress-free.

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: I will just stab people who harass me from now on!

Item.name: Villager_rubid_merchant2
Item.talkText: What's the big deal? They don't die anyways!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm…There is no sign of them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina. Since this is your village, please search around this place.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Find the deities that showed up in Rubid village.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Got it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm……. That way is… That's Shukrina's house!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Come to think of it, i've never been to Shukrina's house, even though I lived near her.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe I should leave the search for Pieberry's crew to the Rubid villagers, and look around Shukrina's house?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah. She must miss her house after leaving the village for so long.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No, no.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I saved you because you looked really pitiful being chased by a bear…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But then I injected too much magic power in you by accident while trying to heal you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha… I couldn't control magic power because I was so young!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will be your slave as long as I use all the magic power you gave me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Just be loyal to me til death!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So much magic power, that his face is engraved with the deity magic mark!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey!! Hey!! Stop absorbing my magic power!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh…the divine light of heaven…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Thank the Divines…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I… I am sorry.
Item.label: 모카에게 마력을 너무 많이 받아서 죄송하다는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Never mind. But don't try to run away with my magic power. I will chase you to hell!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.label: 리브로에게 실수로 마력을 너무 많이 줘서 비명을 지르는 모카

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Thank you, Divines…hehe.
Item.label: 모카에게 마력을 받아 살아나면서 자기도 모르게 중얼거리는 말

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: My friend died because of you!
Item.label: 모카와 싸운 뒤 루나의 대사

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: And you want me to listen to you?!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That wasn't me, my minion did…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I know!! I've heard from the villagers!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: But she died because of what you've done!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Isn't this your responsibility?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: You are the worst!! A monster with all muscles and no brain!!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: If I can't defeat you, I'll crush you - even if I have to ask my mother!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: How was it, Master?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You won easily!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Is something bothering you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I felt bad when Mariena died, but even that wasn't as bad as this time.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Indeed, Pieberry wasn't antagonizing you, as Mariena did. She was actually serving the Rubid villagers…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You must have been criticized by that deity who came from Vavelia for revenge.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is it really my fault that Pieberry died?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Perhaps you should accept it, just this once?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You also think it's my fault, don't you?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even you can make mistakes. But that is not what concerns me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Whatever happens, you are my master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even if you destroy the world, I will still follow you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, all great men made numerous mistakes.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The great men of history refer to those who overcame their mistakes with great deeds.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You are standing on the precipice of overcoming the threat.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I am sure those great men also had followers like me who believed in them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aren't you serving me blindly? I don't want that! You sound like you have no thoughts!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. I can do this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank you. Libro.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Would you like to learn how to dance?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek!? What are you doing?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I learned this dance in the palace.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: When you are stressed out, do something else like this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's… It's hard!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And the posture is weird. It's embarrassing!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's okay to make mistakes.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Just follow my steps, one at a time.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Haha, yes. You're following it well.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Just like that. Don't be impatient… One step at a time…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Am I doing it alright…? I still feel awkward…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You will soon adjust to it. Do you see?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay……

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, I've tried using new spices - why don't you try some chicken?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? I just had a meal at home, I'm full now!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Sob… You don't even look at my dishes…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You liked chicken the most… I am a bit sad.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No, no. I'm just full.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I always clean your room. Please come by often.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I make breakfast everyday as well.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, just make it when I'm here…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen. Let's go, if you're not going to eat.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Come back safely…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm….

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan, I want to have chicken - it's been a while.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When I'm in the lobby, the magic power will be well-connected, so you'll be fine on your own.
Item.label: 스탈리를 잡으러 가라고 에단에게 하는 말

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Please eat before it gets cold!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Okay….

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sorry Libro. I will have the chicken later.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Very well. Come back soon!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Should we go now?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Uris, the great hero who saved Kabanes.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: May he rest here^nand teach his courage to the descendants.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Don't worry. I'm the original owner of that power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I can manage Gaia Genesis when I stand on the magic circle I created.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I told you not to come!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Is…is Agamo's magic power attempting to control you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you know that, run away!! You'll all die!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We will all die anyway if you fall!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will rather die here with you!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing!?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You know I'm tough, right? I will lessen your burden!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You fool!! Stop absorbing so magic power - you'll die!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are not even a deity!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ugh…say no more, and just break Agamo's binding!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then bear it a little longer!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Little Queen, why are you crying so?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek… FATHER!! Don't play tricks on me!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What's wrong? I'm Ethan from your memory. Lord Agamo brought me back.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I thought you'd be happy when I'm alive…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are just a hallucination!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I remember everything that I shared with you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I even remember us saving each other in the Crystal Cave.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What if this is indeed a hallucination?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Isn't it enough that we can see each other?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You told me at the Crystal Cave. That you will realize a world of your dreams.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …. Do you remember what you said?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You told me when I do make the dream come true, do not bring you back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan- who I promised to keep him safe- is dead, and you think I'd be happy just looking at hallucinations?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My happiness is not everything!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Go away! You are not Ethan!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ha, I didn't worry about you!
Item.label: 수정굴에서 에단과 추억 회상 대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you die, my grand dream gets tarnished.
Item.label: 수정굴에서 에단과 추억 회상 대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you can't be dead until I make my dream world!

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Ethan….?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…. I made it!!
Item.label: 아버지의 속박을 이긴 모카

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro! Are you okay!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wake up!! I will hit you if you don't!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Libro….?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No! I keep making mistakes!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's okay to make mistakes.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Just follow my steps, one at a time.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: See? You are much better than before.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… Really?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Of couse, master. You're amazing.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Don't cry. I'm here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eek… FATHER!! Don't play tricks on me!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I am that Libro from your memories.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This time, even my feelings for you have been reproduced.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Let's be happy in our dream.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The world of dreams is what you taught me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: In that world, we can be rewarded for all the hard times we've been through.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You were right after all.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: See? So ask Lord Agamo for his forgiveness. I do not want to see you in danger.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No. That's not what I'm saying.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Huh….?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You told me, "One step at a time".

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will gather magic power and bring you back in a complete form.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It might take a long time, but please wait for me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Could you wait for me?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Yes. Master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Come… One step at a time…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will wait for you gladly.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yes. You're right this time.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You've become a good ruler, Little Queen.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Is everything okay?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So the Kabanes…they're using Mariena's fire to forge weapons?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm certain that the ones who attacked our soldiers were the Kabanes.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Hmm…it's evident that they're up to something.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But it wasn't the Kabanes who attacked our soldiers this time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then who?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We've captured the one responsible and brought him to the lobby.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: No…no! Master! You're not wearing your crown!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There's a reason for that. Let me tell you later.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Kabanes lies to the south.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I was surprised too. I didn't know he'd save me….

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: It's gotten a bit quiet. Can I come out now?

Item.name: boy
Item.label: 폭탄 터지는 걸 보고 놀라는 소년

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Gah!! I should run off to the caves once more!

Item.name: MoccaFather
Item.talkText: Phew, he wasn't a Warrior. What a relief.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Arrrgh!! It's a child deity! Something worse than a bomb comes this way…!!

Item.name: MoccaFather
Item.talkText: Please. Kid. Please pretend you didn't see my daughter.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: The bombs are approaching because of that deity! Please go away!

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: We had no choice because there are Warriors on the other side. Can you pretend you didn't see us?

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Oh, gosh… The Warriors are coming….

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Then come follow me!!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: I got off the supply ship because I was really seasick, and the bombs began to explode.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: So I've been hiding here. You will be safe.

Item.name: MoccaFather
Item.talkText: You… Are you from Vavelia?

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Yes. I volunteered as a supply specialist because I needed the gold.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: But don't worry. I have no interest in reporting someone.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: I just need to receive the gold that the Pope promised.

Item.name: MoccaFather
Item.talkText: Damn it… We should have moved when we heard that the Pope was starting a witch hunt…

Item.name: MoccaFather
Item.talkText: I didn't expect the Papal Army to land on Ürphea this quickly.

Item.name: Girl
Item.talkText: Mom… What should we do now?

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Don't worry. When the bombs stop, we will move to Lunata Village.

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: It's in the deep woods, so we won't have to worry about getting caught by the Warriors.

Item.name: WarriorPope
Item.talkText: I FOUND THEM!!!!!

Item.name: WarriorPope
Item.talkText: WITCH!! I FOUND THEM!! I DID!!

Item.name: MoccaFather
Item.talkText: Please… Please let my daughter go!!!

Item.name: MoccaFather
Item.talkText: You probably have a family too!!!

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Hon… HONEY!!!!

Item.name: WarriorPope
Item.talkText: Yes. I have a family as well.

Item.name: WarriorPope
Item.talkText: I will go back to my family with rewards!!

Item.name: Girl
Item.talkText: Ah….

Item.name: WarriorPope
Item.talkText: They've lost their minds. Looks like things will be easy.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: You fool!! Get yourself together and MOVE!!!

Item.name: WarriorPope
Item.talkText: My…my bounty!!

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Mocca… I'm sorry… I couldn't protect you…

Item.name: Girl
Item.talkText: Mo… Mom…

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Though we may be apart…

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Or never see each other again…

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Remember that…

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Mom and dad… love and care about Mocca…
Item.label: '아끼다'가 중요합니다. 영생을 얻은 후에는 서로를 아끼지 않는 모습과 대조를 이뤄야 합니다.

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: Just remember that…

Item.name: MoccaMother
Item.talkText: We love you… Mocca…

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Ha, gosh. Why did I get involved in this?

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: It would mean nothing if I die here…

Item.name: WarriorPope1
Item.talkText: Hey!! You're the supply unit kid!

Item.name: WarriorPope1
Item.talkText: It's dangerous here! Run away!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Oh… Yes… Yes!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: (Listen. Kid.)

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: (I heard that captured deities aren't killed, so cooperate nicely if you want to live.)

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: (Got that? I will see you… If we can.)

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Sir! Where should I go to!?

Item.name: WarriorPope1
Item.talkText: There's Vavellia Supply Ship number 14 at the back! Go there!
Item.label: 바벨리아 보급선 14호는 talkList의 2659번 세실리아 대사와 일치해야 합니다

Item.name: warriorIt
Item.talkText: Now move it! She's mine!!

Item.name: WarriorPope1
Item.talkText: Wow… The Supreme Palace Warrior and the Pope!

Item.name: Pope
Item.talkText: Strange…she's but a weak, young deity, so why is Lord Crown so wary of her?

Item.name: Pope
Item.talkText: … There must be a reason.

Item.name: WarriorPope1
Item.talkText: They were here, then suddenly gone…
Item.label: 교황과 크라운을 말하는 것

Item.name: WarriorPope2
Item.talkText: Perhaps they left us to do the work because she's insignificant?

Item.name: mocca
Item.talkText: Please help… me…
Item.label: 모카가 살려달라고 말함. 목숨을 구걸하는 것이 아니라 아가모에게 엄마 아빠를 다시 살려달라는 말임.

Item.name: WarriorPope1
Item.talkText: Hey. I'm capturing you alive, so you better behave. If you try using dangerous magic, I'll kill you!

Item.name: WarriorPope3
Item.talkText: Hey!! Don't touch her! I found her first!! I missed her because that supply unit boy interrupted me!

Item.name: Girl
Item.talkText: Please… help…

Item.name: Girl
Item.talkText: Mom… and dad….

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I shall answer your prayer and show you mercy…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Become my daughter, and I shall be a father to you.

Item.name: Girl
Item.talkText: Please…save mom and dad…

Item.name: WarriorPope1
Item.talkText: What… What… is… that?
Item.label: 아가모를 보고 놀라는 왕궁용사들

Item.name: WarriorPope2
Item.talkText: It's… GOD……

Item.name: WarriorPope2
Item.talkText: The Pope's god…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: My poor descendant…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You shall inherit all of my magic power.

Item.name: WarriorPope2
Item.talkText: …was a lie…
Item.label: 7090 다음에 이어지는 대사, 교황의 신은 거짓이었어

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Humans desire more than they can have in their short lives.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And so arises hate and strife.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wars break out.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And their beloved are slain.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I shall collect all the magic power in this world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I shall bring back mom and dad with the magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I shall grant immortality to all, and end this cycle of agony.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master. Is something wrong?
Item.label: 모카모리가 뭔가 해야 할 일이 생각났다는 듯한 표정을 지었을 때 리브로가 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm going somewhere.
Item.label: 에단과 똑같이 생긴 프롤로그의 아이가 생각나서 해안에 잠깐 다녀온다는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The boy who helped me was on this ship…
Item.label: 해변에 부숴진 배를 보며 프롤로그에 나왔던 소년을 회상하는 장면 시작

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This ship was wrecked because of me…

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: (Got that? I will see you… If we can.)
Item.label: 7070 대사와 동일

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That boy… Is he Ethan's twin brother?
Item.label: 과거회상에서 그 소년이 에단의 쌍둥이 형이라는 것을 알아챔

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh… That was really an accident…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Forget it. They might just look alike!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Just forget about it and let me go and see how Ethan is doing well.
Item.label: 마을에 침입한 용사를 퇴치하라고 에단을 푸르토 마을로 파견을 보낸 상황임

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: See? Just concentrate and do this! and that! Then you have an awesome weapon in your hands!
Item.label: 우리스가 마리애나에게 허세 부리는 말. 프롤로그에 나온 어린 우리스의 대사(7052번) 라임과 맞춰주세요

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is Shukrina's house.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought her house would be very fancy, but it's really creepy…It seems Shukrina left this house for a long time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Come to think of it, I remember that Shukrina's father collected weapons as a hobby.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe there are some weapons that Shukrina might use in this house. Let me find some.

Item.name: Navigator2
Item.talkText: We can't sail because of that damned octopus.

Item.name: Navigator2
Item.talkText: Not only does it destroy ships, but it also gobbles up all the items on board.

Item.name: Navigator2
Item.talkText: Trade has been hit hard…ever since we lost the whole red gem chest we were supposed to deliver to the Derkarr smugglers.

Item.name: Navigator2
Item.talkText: And that's why Donald only deals red gems, so I hope you understand.
Item.label: 바르나도는 상인 이름(id MerchantRubid)

Item.name: Mazer
Item.talkText: Oh… It's finally here…

Item.name: Mazer
Item.talkText: A strong soul that can fit into this mask…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who are you?

Item.name: Mazer
Item.talkText: I was a deity like you once…

Item.name: Mazer
Item.talkText: I was trapped in this mask when I fell to a fairy's trap while searching for Mirac's spring.

Item.name: Mazer
Item.talkText: In order to escape this mask… I require a soul to replace mine…

Item.name: Mazer
Item.talkText: Come here…! Come here…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oho, it's already recovered its power.
Item.label: 예전에 마력을 빨아먹은 마물 마로니에에게 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me absorb the magic power again!

Item.name: Maro
Item.talkText: Grrrr….!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's wrong?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Marronnier is my friend!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Apologize to Marronnier right now!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why should I?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: You've picked on Marronnier!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Fine, fine. I'm sorry. See?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Ugh… Just give back the magic power you took from Marronnier!
Item.label: 에디스가 모카에게 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, stop it already! Why should I do that for a monster?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't test me - I won't go easy on you just because you're young!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Marronnier is a sacred creature. it can only exist with magic power!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: It barely recovered its power, but if you take away the magic…Marronnier won't ever be able to wake up again!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Then…then my friend will be…!!!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Sob…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Okay.

Item.name: Maro
Item.talkText: *Groan…*

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Marronnier. Why? You got your power back.

Item.name: Maro
Item.talkText: *Grrr……*

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Ah….

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: … You don't want me to leave?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: But I have an adventure to go on, with this evil girl.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh…

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: When the adventure ends, I'm only going to hangout with Marronnier!

Item.name: Maro
Item.talkText: *Honk! Honk!*

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Hmm…

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Then I will visit you often when I'm bored.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I will summon you when I'm in trouble!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: How does that sound?

Item.name: Maro
Item.talkText: *Purr……!*

Item.name: maro
Item.talkText: Grr…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sorry about the last time.
Item.label: 모카가 에디스의 마물 마로니에에게 하는 말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm ashamed… But I will go to Kabanes after I make the healing potion.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is the way to Kabanes Village. I will go later.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Tale of Moccamori the Little Queen

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? That was so weak.

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: Was it successful…?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Well, we'll have to wait and see.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Once again! Do it with courtesy and manners!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: O Great Queen, Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I bow before you in sincerity and awe.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wha…whawhawhawhat was that?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: This is the protocol for a Warrior swearing the oath of fealty to his monarch in the palace of Vavelia.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can sense Ida's magic power strongly around here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me materialize this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I knew it…

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You traced my magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your magic power was too strong to pass by.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I guess that's because this is where your body was at.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So, tell me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why you had to teach Adlai for 1000 years… and the reason why you have chosen me.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You must have been very curious.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, the trace of magic power disappears fast… We don't have much time.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Right. Let me explain it to you while I have time.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: First, deities existed when the world was created.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: And I am the primal deity and the Primal Agamo.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: I have existed for a thousand of years.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? The primal deity only existed for a thousand years?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We do not consider the time after a thousand years.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: When I say 'a thousand years' it means a very long time or eternity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I see…

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Us, the primal beings were very unstable.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We had great power that can create or destroy the world,

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We also had desire that we'd like to use the power whatever we want. Just like humans now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought an adult and pure deity has flawless character!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Deities had 'desire' just like humans??

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Yes. So we thought our existence is the most dangerous beings in the world.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: So we have completely separated our desires from us.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You're looking at it right now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How did you separate the desire?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We had sealed our desire using an enormous stone as a magic power medium.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: To do that, we needed so much magic power you can't even imagine.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: However, our prediction totally missed the mark, and the stone brought about great calamity to the world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't say…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A stone that contains desire… Dark Magic Stone…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You had no idea that stone would cause so much problem!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because of that stone, Varnado was tainted and the Pope started the witch hunt!

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We thought our power could control the Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: But the Dark Magic Stone's magic power was so evil. I, the creator of the stone couldn't even purify the stone.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: A darkness that can never be removed…

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Only then did I realize there's something that I can't solve with magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is that… What you had wanted to teach Adlai…?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Afterwards, the sealed stone began to take root in the world.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: The stone tainted the land rapidly, and began to turn all living things that exist in this world into dark predators.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh my… How can the primal deities… make that type of mistake…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So what happened?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We had destroyed the unpurifiable stone. Then the shards of the destroyed stone scattered into the world.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Fortunately, those shattered Dark Magic Stones became weaker and did not taint the surroundings… By then we could purify the tainted land.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Dark Magic Stones that the Pope tried to collect… were made by deities…

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Evil resides in all creatures.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: And we live on by controlling it with our conscience.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: But the Dark Magic Stone makes people lose control.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I see.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The reason the deities protected humans was… because they felt responsible for the Dark Magic Stones, right?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You're right.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We have protected humans for a thousand years.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Even when a war broke out and humans aimed their blades at us, we did not resist.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because you felt bad for them…

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We carry the guilt and responsibility for all living things that exist in this world.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Until all the Dark Magic Stones disappear.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We have ceaselessly researched the way to purify the stones.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: And the desire we had separated, that dark magic power… We have discovered that it was the 'insecurity' that all the beings have.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: In other words, the inner darkness that all life has…

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We called it 'Shadow'.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: And for a thousand years, we tried to defeat the Shadow.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: But even now, we have not found a way to eliminate the Shadow.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That means… Do deities have to live with the guilt regarding humans forever?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: We found a clue to defeating the Shadow.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Now there's no magic power to materialize my body anymore.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Search for the traces of my magic power that are scattered about.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Then the traces will show you the next way.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is it because I got the power from Ida?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I could feel Ida's faint magic power from the Soul Stone.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You have found a trace of my magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm used to your magic power now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you disappeared before, lacking magic power - yet now you just appear as if nothing happened…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You pure deities are just astounding.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I am visible to you for but a moment. We do not have much time.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Don't you have things to ask? Ask me anything before I disappear.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm… I have a lot… What should I ask first…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Right. I can still use the Soul Stone's power and magic power awakening, despite the absence of father. How is that possible?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It's simple. I have planted all the magic power of Adlai I had diverted to Pruto Lake inside you.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Now you do not need to rely on the power of the Soul Stone, Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There was that much of father's magic power diverted to the lake?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Let me tell you again what I told you at Pruto Lake.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: After my disappearance, there was Adlai, who tried to gather all the magic power in Ürphea, and the Temple Lords who tried to stop him.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: After intense battles, Ürphea's Temple Lords managed to seal Adlai.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But Adlai was too strong, the Temple Lords knew the seal wouldn't last a long time.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Eventually, the Temple Lords created a huge tree to extract the magic power of Adlai.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That is this Pruto Tree. This tree absorbed Adlai's magic power and redirected it to Pruto Lake.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It weakened Adlai as time passed.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Even if the seal weakend, Adlai would be the same, making it difficult for him to escape on his own.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I see how I was able to revive father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Refilling even a drop of father's power enabled him to break the seal on his own.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You refilled Adlai's magic power as the seal of the Soul Stone weakened.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I see.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I thought father made the Soul Stone for his resurrection.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But that magic power stone was made by Temple Lords to seal father…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Well, it worked out as those Temple Lords planned.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You Moccamori unsealed the Soul Stone and make Adlai disappeared.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What… Ida. How can you be happy when your child disappeared?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Don't worry. To a pure deity, death is just a time to look around the world.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: My time is up.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Another trace of me will tell you the rest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Amazing. Being able to materialize a body with just a trace of his magic power…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Another trace of magic power… maybe Ida's trace lies in the Ancient Land?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Did I tell you about the clue that can defeat the Shadow?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I guess you magic power avatars can share memories, hmm?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's the clue to defeating the Shadow?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I have found a gate to the Shadow World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Shadow World?? Is it something like the 'World of Desires'?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: When you enter that gate, you will meet someone that looks just like you.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Indelible dark magic power, or abstract concepts such as desires become visible as physical forms in the Shadow World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wa… Wait. Ida. Didn't you say you had taken out all your inner desires?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you saying you could see your shadow even after that?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: What I separated from my body during the primordial days were desires similar to those of the humans.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But the Shadow World defined even the 'pursuit of perfection' as a desire.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: At first, I couldn't admit it.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I believed that the form that mirrored my own was merely a trick conceived by the Shadow World.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And I was convinced that I can defeat it, as I had discovered the true identity of the Shadow that we could not touch from this side of the world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……You couldn't win, huh?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: No, I could not. No matter how many times I brought it down, the Shadow did not vanish as it did in our world.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: If you defeat the Shadow, you will surely get a clue to purify Dark Magic Stone of the outside world…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But I failed. Not only I, but also the other primal deities as well.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Then Ramuel, the primal deity of Vavelia, looking for the ways to fight against shadow, decided to divide himself into five bodies.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is that even possible?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It is the only true death permitted to a pure deity.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: To remove oneself from the world… and to create an entirely new life with all of one's magic power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Ramuel divided himself and created Elysion whom you met, along with Aramute, Arua, Aimhard, and Durok. They are the Vavelian Temple Lords.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So the birth of a pure deity… is the division of another pure deity!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But why did he create them by erasing himself from existence?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: He believed that if he dies, the Dark Magic Stones he created would vanish as well.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But even his division into five beings did not change the outcome. Interestingly, the descendants had gained emotions that we did not possess.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Durok was reticent and Aimhard was cheerful as some humans. They possessed personalities.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: These beings, created thus, also entered the Shadow Gate and fought their Shadows as we did.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And… what happened?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: They lost.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But those Shadows were slightly different from the one I fought.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: They had confronted Shadows who had identical personalities as themselves.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Identical enough to have conversation with, that is.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And there were times when they almost won against their Shadows.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: In the end, they all lost to their Shadows… but they showed more promise than the primal deities.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: My Shadow showed no weaknesses… yet the Shadows of the pure deity descendants did.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then why didn't you continue your attempts?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The Temple Lords are much more powerful than our generation!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It is true that the Temple Lords were able to pressure their Shadows more than the primal deities.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But there existed a greater threat to them upon defeat to their Shadows - one that was not present for the primal deities.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: They would be controlled by the Shadows. Akin to humans becoming addicted to the Dark Magic Stones…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Fortunately, by their own power of will and the help of other deities, they barely managed to escape the Shadows' control.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What do you want me to do then!?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Do not be too hasty.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You have made great progress by resisting an entity that you could not defeat, however little it may have been.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Besides, you managed to defeat Charlie's Shadow in this place, yes?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You mean… that two-headed black dog?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That black entity you fought was a part of the Shadow Charlie barely smuggled out of the Shadow World as he exited that realm.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It was? The Shadow I fought here… it seemed too weak compared to what Charlie had to go through.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Charlie was much stronger than you, but was unable to defeat the Shadow.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Why do you think that was?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Umm…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Does it mean you can't defeat your own Shadow?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Maybe it's too early to know the answer.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Our time is up, so let us continue this tale later.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Ah, much of Charlie's magic power lies around this place.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It seems you were not skilled enough to absorb all of Charlie's magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah… I haven't been able to fully manage the magic power of the Temple Lords.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Then… let us speak more of this at Mirac Temple.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I heard your story up to the part about Charlie's Shadow.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So why couldn't Charlie defeat a Shadow that I could?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: First… Charlie was not the only one who brought the Shadow's fragment into this world.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Mirac also brought out a part of the Shadow and sealed it in the mirror.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The image of yourself that you defeated here - that was the Shadow sealed by Mirac.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The descendant deities of other continents also sealed the Shadows in various ways.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Mari from Derkarr continent created a 'Room of Patience' to seal the shadow, and made it as a training area for the descendants.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Elysion of Vavelia also created a Room of Mirrors, similar to the one made by Mirac.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Interesting, is it not? You defeated a Shadow that even the Temple Lords could not.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Do you know what this means?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, speaking of Elysion, I have a question.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Isn't Pieberry Elysion's daughter?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Didn't you say a pure deity is born from an ancestor pure deity by division? Then why Elysion is still alive?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You're right.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The former Elysion already died once to create her daughter.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: She divided her magic power to create a 'mother' Elysion and a 'daughter' Lucia.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Just as I made Adlai.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I see…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Adlai was special. I bestowed more magic power to Adlai than to my own form.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Did he want to achieve greatness, because he was given immense magic power…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why did you grant more magic power to my father?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I wanted to try something new.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Since the Vavelian deities showed promise through their struggles against the Shadows…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I wondered if dividing my magic power by two, instead of five, would result in a more powerful descendant who could defeat the Shadow.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That is how Adlai was born. He was incredibly powerful, and had great aspirations.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: He proposed using 'Gaia Genesis' that I created to fight the Shadow.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: He suggested that we seal the souls of all living beings inside Gaia Genesis, as it was a powerful magic power medium.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why…why did father suggest something so terrible?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That was the 'World of Dreams' you tried to realize.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: We feared that this world would someday be devoured by the Shadow via the Dark Magic Stones that were scattered throughout the world.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And so Adlai argued that we should evacuate living souls into Gaia Genesis.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: He must have determined that protecting them in a single place was more efficient than when they are spread around the world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: In terms of efficiency, I'd agree. Then all you'd need to do is protect Gaia Genesis, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So in truth…rather than the World of Dreams, what father truly wanted was a world where the souls would live on.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why did you oppose the father's plan?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Because I had experienced darkness that could not be removed by magic power.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Adlai's dream had a fatal weakness.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: What would happen if the power of Shadow dominated Gaia Genesis?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Something that can't be undone, I guess…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Adlai's method would have been very ideal, but too risky if it failed, resulting in losing everything.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But Adlai was confident after gaining godly powers, and despised me for opposing his ideal.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Then one day…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I divided myself and created the next generation deities, who were Charlie, Mirac, Nova, and Lunata.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And thus, I had no magic power left in me to be called Agamo.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: So Adlai sealed me immediately and began to carry out his ideal.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So father made the sealing stone in the Ancient Land.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I can finally understand all the conflicts…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why Ida and father had been sealed… and the cause of conflicts due to the Dark Magic Stones…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The intention was noble, but it brought about unintended consequences.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you hadn't separated your desires, that would also have caused problems.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: So what path should we take?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm not sure…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: We have waited more than a thousand years searching for the answer.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Along the way, we sometimes exposed the dark side of humanity.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: To erase the dark side by exposing it.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Each time, we let go of our magic power and offered the humans generosity and sacrifice freely.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Yet those miracles only tempered the conflicts for a moment, and could not erase their inner Shadows.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Still, we saw much potential in them, and hoped for the coming of future generations that will defeat the Shadow, bit by bit.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I believe that this current generation, your generation, is the one I have been waiting for.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …Why? I haven't exactly done anything special against the Shadow.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Our time is up.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Let's talk more at Nova Temple.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: A quiet place, is it not?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Here I cheered for the descendants, observing how they fared against the Shadows.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Moccamori, you were able to defeat your inner darkness - the Shadow in the real world.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Sometimes you were wrongfully framed, other times you were reviled despite your good intent to grant everyone eternal life.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But… despite all, you never gave up on trying to break the chains of conflict that were caused by imperfection.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Although the process was aggressive and you faced great resistance…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You began to change and let go of your stubbornness thanks to your friends.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: And through such pain, you discovered something. Something more important than eternal life…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I think that's the power to defeat the Shadow.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well… it was a rough ride.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Mirac's mirror was not simply an object for sealing the Shadow.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It was a mirror that could materialize the Shadow on its reflection by analyzing the principles of the Shadow World.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: One might even say that Mirac's mirror is a part of the Shadow World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So…since I defeated Mirac's mirror, I have a small chance of victory inside the Shadow World?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I am sure that you are capable of victory.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Of course, your ancestor deities also had that chance as well.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is there a reason you're especially counting on me?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Moccamori, you were able to persuade Adlai to abandon his plan - something that I, his father, could not do.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That was when I was convinced once again that there are things magic power cannot solve.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: A being so much weaker than I… a broken being was able to accomplish what I could not.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I was happy beyond words.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I had created Adlai by dividing myself… and then I created the Ürphean Temple Lords…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: …and now, my thousand years of toil was finally rewarded.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I have faith in you, Moccamori, faith beyond expectations.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey… Don't pressure me too much.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even the Temple Lords were defeated in the Shadow World, so I'm not overly confident.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, where is the gate to the Shadow World you found?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Oh, before that…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Much magic power that you overlooked remains at Lunata Spring.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Let's wrap this up at Lunata Spring.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Perhaps you were successful because you were scarred.
Item.label: 7442번 아이다 대사 다음에 나타납니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Seeing you… reminds me of old memories.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So many times, you beat me here…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: You once told me something here.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: A world that an imperfect being dreams about is also imperfect.'…
Item.label: 1528번 대사 참고

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: That made me question myself - 'Then am I, the Primal God, also an imperfect being?'…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: After all, even I, born with all the magic power of the continent, had not experienced a perfect world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Bah, I don't care much for difficult questions.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What if it's not perfect? You just need to fill it out when you need it.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Lunata researched the origin of creation.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Lunata wondered if Shadows were born from the creation of life, or during its survival.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The result of Lunata's experiment was 'Uverstan' whom you fought here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Right. When I fought Uverstan, he summoned something tiny and black.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Was that the fragment Lunata brought here from the Shadow World?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Yes. Uverstan was a guardian of Lunata Spring, and also an avatar of Lunata's Shadow…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Lunata spent much power to suppress Uverstan from vomiting Shadows.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Interestingly, after the defeat at your hands, Uverstan no longer spews out Shadows.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Got it. I will go to Shadow World immediately!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, wait. I haven't' heard anything about Nova.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Nova was a Temple Lord who resembled Adlai in many ways.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: However, despite craving power like Adlai, Nova did not believe that power was everything.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But…

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: It was Nova who was endangered the most among those who entered the Shadow World.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Nova began to be devoured by darkness after his defeat to the Shadow…and was only able to escape danger by the assistance of other Temple Lords.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: As you can see… The Shadow World is similar to the Dark Magic Stone, in that the more power you desire, the further you descend into darkness.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can see that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know what's going to happen in the Shadow World…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll be careful not to fall to the temptation of power!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Oh, before you leave for the Ice Plateau, would you like to meet Adlai?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You mean I should find the trace of father's magic power, right?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: When you're ready, go to the place where Adlai vanished.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can definitely sense the trace of father's magic power…

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Why did you call me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just wanted to see you one more time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have heard a lot about you from Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I also heard that the fight between you and Ida stemmed from the difference in the method of realizing the ideal path.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You just wanted to protect the world from the Shadow, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But no ordinary plan could defeat the primal Shadow. Now I can understand your dream of wanting to create the World of Dreams.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And I have inherited your heart.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll go to the Shadow World and try to defeat the Shadow.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: You are a mixed deity, thus you possess strong human desires.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: If you are defeated in the Shadow World, your existence will be completely erased.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Rather, leave the fight to the Temple Lords who yet live.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: It is not too late for you to enter the Shadow World after you have grown into an adult deity.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No. Ida told me that I can do this now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I even defeated the Shadow fragment the adult deities couldn't defeat!

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Ha… Ida…

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Manipulating young descendants…how devious.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You used me too, father.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Ahem. But I never wished to put you in danger.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: In fact, you were the most powerful being in the continent with my magic power, and danger only approached you when Ida began to interfere.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: I see through all. This is how Ida trains his descendants…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thanks to that, I'm able to talk with you comfortably now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: To be honest, before I realized that the World of Dreams was an illusion, I was a bit afraid of you, father.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Hmm…? But I never scolded you once before you betrayed me.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Why were you afraid of me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't want to be abandoned.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You may have called me your daughter, but to me you were Agamo. A god.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was terrified that you might discard me if I made a mistake!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think that's why I harassed the other deities - to fulfill your dream in any way possible.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: This I did not know…
