Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Those painful days… made me what I am today.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am so very happy now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This would have been impossible if you hadn't chosen me.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Everything was devised by Ida… you can leave me out of this.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Come to think of it, you never showed me such a relaxed smile in my sight.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Because of your fear of me…

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: I am sorry.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: But I see that smile now - you smiling at me…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe…

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Yes. My daughter will most certainly overcome this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Father… This is…

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Though I cannot be with you anymore, I have given you all the blessings I have.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: Take care.

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: My daughter… Moccamori…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. Father!

Item.name: Adelina2
Item.talkText: …I am pleased.
Item.label: 모카모리의 미소를 보고 말하는 아델라이의 말7529번 다음 말

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The gate to the Shadow World lies at the Ice Plateau.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why is the gate in a place like that? Besides, there was nothing there…!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: The Shadow World is too dangerous, so I had Brinicle completely freeze the entire region.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Then I created Sierra to guard the gate.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Find the trace of dark magic near Sierra and materialize it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Got it!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can feel the dark magic power's energy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I had thought there were some Dark Magic Stones nearby… but was that the magic power of the Shadow World seeping through?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Found it!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So this is the gate to the Shadow World that Ida concealed…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew… I feel a bit nervous!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: A world with full of deep darkness…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should get myself together.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ce…Cecilia?!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing here…!?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mocca. How have you been?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've heard this world is where your darkness is hiding…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought there would be a reflection of me, like in Mirac Spring.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida? You can appear here, too?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: This is where I tread for a long time, after all.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: The Shadows that appear here are indeed your inner Shadows.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: The Shadows of you and those who are connected to you will begin to appear.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: This is because the bonds you have made with others reside within you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But Cecilia betrayed me. There's no bond there at all!

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You say so, but you feel a pang of guilt for Cecilia, do you not?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: I am sure Cecilia did not hate you in the beginning.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You have memories with Cecilia.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Look closely into her heart.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You might find out things that you didn't know in the Shadow World. The Shadow World is also connected to the outside world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I see…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So the reason the magic power I wield here is identical to the outside world is because both worlds are connected?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: In some ways, the Shadow World is the same as the outside world.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: It is merely a place that enables us to reflect upon the inner darkness that we normally cannot perceive.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: However, there is one condition for you to wield your usual powers.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: One condition?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: In this world, your powers grow much weaker than the outside world as you are devoured by the darkness.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't feel any different from the outside world yet!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Except that I feel a bit grumpy because it's so dark here.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: That is because you have grown stronger through your trials.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Contrarily, the ancient deities had no use for trials, and so were lacking in the inner strength that you have gained.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: That is the difference between us and our descendants.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You will overcome this, Moccamori.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Are you guys done?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Come to think of it, something about you bothers me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should listen carefully to your story.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Since we went through hell and back together.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Oh, I understand you completely, Mocca.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You were so busy facing Ida, so how could you make some time for me?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: That's what I call 'efficiency'. Good job! Mocca!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The reason you betrayed me wasn't only because I frustrated you, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tell me the reason you exist in my deep inner world.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Well, since I'll be devouring you soon, I'll tell you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: The night the witch hunt began… My family hid in the Fruit Forest to avoid the Pope.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mom and dad… and sister and I were shivering in the bushes all night.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: We were looking for an opportunity to flee to Lunata Forest…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But we were surrounded by Warriors on all sides!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I thought my family was going to die there.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And you know what my mom told me?

Item.name: CeciliaMother
Item.talkText: Cecilia. Sacrifice yourself for the family.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: …Mo…Mom?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mom said that the reason my family was being hunted was because…I was a deity.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: She told me our family would live if I sacrificed myself!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Then she pushed me out of the bushes.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: The Warriors founded me…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And as I was surrounded by the Warriors, I watched as my family fled.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: That was when I learned a lesson in life:

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You have to resort to anything for survival…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Love? Affection? Humanity…?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I realized those things are useless for survival!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Mom only took care of my sister.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You were the only child of your birth parents…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And chosen as the first by Agamo, right? You can't understand me.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I didn't hate you from the start.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But as time passed, I found you too frustrating. You avoided killing, and only strove for your dreams!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You were so relaxed because of your excessive magic power, weren't you?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Because you were the first 'chosen' daughter, weren't you?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I always had to remedy the shortcomings of your relaxed attitude from the sides.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And one day, I even took care of the pure deities, who were our greatest problems - and what do I get?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Everyone was saying I was wrong? Too cruel? Too severe?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And then I'm punished, even!?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ha, used and discarded once again, was I?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Now it's your time to be punished. Mocca.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I'm stronger in this Shadow World.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Nobody can take advantage of me anymore.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I will rule everything.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ughh…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Why can't I control you?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But…darkness should always win…in this world…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I heard the fights here in this world are about internal struggles.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't we have unfinished business?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is the world of desire, right? So tell me of your true desire.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: …… What do you think I really want?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It wasn't your true desire to dethrone me to become a queen, was it?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And you probably wasn't yearning to avenge your family.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you did, then you would have gone to see your family the moment you received my magic power.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ha. I've already erased my family from my memory.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: They're not even worth avenging.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You didn't even want to be Agamo's first child, did you?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: No. I did become Agamo's First by driving you out, but I was immediately abandoned when I failed to stop you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So being his First isn't my desire anymore.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia. So what did you really want?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It's just…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I simply…

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: …wanted have a new family.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: A real family that… doesn't abandon me.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I wanted you to become my new family.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: After all, we're basically of the same bloodline, as we both received Agamo's magic power.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Me, I wanted to protect my family in my own ways.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So I didn't care when I harassed other villages.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Because I thought it was only natural to it for my family.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: But my companions despised my methods, and even the Pruto villagers began to fear me.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And when even you began to reprimand me…I really hated that.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I thought you…you would understand why I was doing what I had to do.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And then I was suddenly frightened, you know?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Was it because I was accused of being a bad companion? Nope.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: It was…"What if I'm abandoned again?"

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: "No That can't happen. I won't get hurt anymore. This time, I'll be the one to abandon them!"

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: "And then I'll find a new family!"

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And yet, I was ditched by Lord Agamo, whom I rusted, and now look how pathetic I've become! So stupid…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I was even abandoned by a god - so I'm done for.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's fortunate that I got to hear your story now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Things wouldn't have escalated so much if I tried to listen to your hidden thoughts a bit earlier…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Forget it. We were both scarred, so we didn't have the leisure of understanding each other, did we?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: So we sought the dream in different ways.

Item.name: Cecilia
Item.talkText: Besides, you were the queen! Unlike me, you probably always had to worry about how to make everyone happy.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: And now that all of my methods have failed…maybe your seemingly naive ways were right?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Not that I want to acknowledge it, but…I could have been wrong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know I made lots of mistakes like you at first, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I would have also failed if I didn't have help from others.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even now, I'm just an insignificant being who needs help from my friends.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Now I know why I couldn't devour you in darkness…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: You weren't alone. Unlike me.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: …I envy that.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I'm going to give up, since I know I can't beat you.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: If I get a second life…

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: …then I wish I can be loved like you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So this is what Ida meant when he said that I can't win with strength alone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I have another reason to thank to my friends.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't know you considered me your family.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am so sorry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When I get out of this world, I will bring you out from the sealed stone and apologize to you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I hope it's not too late.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Ugh… Stop it!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: I've confessed my thoughts to you, so I won't be able to bear the embarrassment when in the outside world!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Just…do better from now.

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: My clumsy little queen, Mocca!

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Got it!?

Item.name: Cesilia
Item.talkText: Nope. I sure won't forgive you.
Item.label: 지워진 대사

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thanks for understanding my selfishness.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Cecilia. Let's make up in the outside world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori. You came this far.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're upset about me as well?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Yes. Honestly, I was very disappointed with you.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You had given me a new dream.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I thought we were in this thing together!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But why did you, our monarch, abandon us?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It seems I've inflicted you with unbearable pain.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: No, you hurt everyone who dreamt.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Just because you did not like the dream yourself.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You hurt everyone who had been chasing the dream.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What… do you want me to do?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: …Your magic power has increased.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Then I shall devour you and fulfill the dream you could not.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: For my homeland Varnado… and for my lost friends!!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Sob…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: My flowers…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: My friends…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We forced too many sacrifices on others to seize our dream.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course, there may have been those who, like you, were happy in the Dream World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But not everyone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because an illusion is not real.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I do not care if it is an illusion or not… I…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon. Then let's save Varnado.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's save the real Varnado, not the illusionary one!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: …How is that even possible?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I was too busy fighting with father… I didn't realize what you really wanted.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you were just obsessed with the Dream World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But what you really want is…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Not just an illusion, but the actual Varnado returning to life, right?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: But that is impossible! I have even planted the flowers of purification…!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Did not Ida say that even the ancient Temple Lords were unable to purify the Dark Magic Stones that were spread across the lands?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We may be able to do things that the primal deities couldn't.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: What nonsense…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You are much weaker than them!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: All the Dark Magic Stones are actually the medium of this place, the Shadow World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So if we can figure out the Shadow World's weakness…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Perhaps we can purify the Dark Magic Stones that exist in our lands.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's the clue uncovered through the research done by Ida, the Ürphean Temple Lords and all the ancestor deities.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They handed this clue to our generation. That's why I came here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So Varon!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If you would let me pass, I promise to try reviving the land of Varnado!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'll release you from the Soul Stone and show you the purified land of Varnado!

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: …Truly?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As a queen…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As your friend, I promise.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: ……Friend?

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: You are still my queen.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I shall place the hope of my homeland on your shoulders once more.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Nay…

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: I thank you for planting that hope in my stead.
Item.label: 바론이 심은 꽃은 희망이었습니다. '심다'의 비유를 번역할 수 있다면 가능한 선에서만 반영해주세요.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: My queen… Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Varon
Item.talkText: Please grant me my wish!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. Varon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now that I've heard your wish…I, Moccamori, will grant it for sure, this time!

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Yes… Lady Moccamori, you have power that we do not.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Am I… doing it okay?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's nice for me to make up with shadows… But how will this affect the real world?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Your small progress and results are already making rifts in the Shadow World.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You are doing well.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shukrina…!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I don't have any grudges against you… Why are you in the Shadow World?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Everyone has a Shadow.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The reason you can see my Shadow is… because you and I have a bond.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing!?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: This is my inner world that you don't know about.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I've never forgiven my villagers.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Peace may have arrived, but they were still betrayers of my father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: The only reason I take care of the village is…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: To maintain the village, my father's legacy… Not because I care for them.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: But…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I truly hate protecting those who betrayed my father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Are you going to get rid of me too?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Just like you did to Cecilia and Varon?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't fight Cecilia and Varon to eliminate them.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just… wanted to talk to them, and make peace.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Then are you going to just leave?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I'm the shadow you need to get rid of!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes. I'm not here to fight you.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Then will you neglect my inner shadow?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You took care of Varon and Cecilia's shadow!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even if I get rid of you, it won't heal Shukrina's broken heart.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because your pain is not from me but from the problem with the villagers.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But Shukrina, you can take care of it on your own.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I believe in you, Shukrina.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are strong.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And… you have a warm heart that you inherited from your father.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Thank you for believing in me. Mocca.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: To be honest…

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I really needed a friend who can trust me like you.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I will try.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Thank you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are already doing so great.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Thank YOU for believing in me, too.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You made it here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is there anything we haven't solved yet?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: The past between you and me… is all cleared.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then… Do you have any painful memories like Shukrina?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: It's about the past that Kabanes villagers know of… but which I haven't told you about.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I was once called 'The goddess of destruction' by the Kabanes villagers.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: A long time ago, I misused a Dark Magic Stone and brought disasters to Kabanes Village.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Countless people were sacrificed because of me…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris was the last Warrior who fought against me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? This is a tale about the far past?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: If this is a time that I don't know about, then that hairball must have also been a child!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: The Uris you know… his real name is Kauris.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Long ago, there was another hero called Uris in Kabanes village.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh… So you call the hairball Kauris 'Uris' as a shortened name!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Yes. Also he looks like a lot like past Uris.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Blazing courage, heroic character and physical strength…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: As Kauris stayed grew up in Kabanes village, he began to resemble Uris from the past more and more.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: So the villagers truly believed that the hero Uris was reincarnated as Kauris.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you saying… The hero Uris is dead because…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: In the past, I once lost control due to dark magic and greatly hurt Uris.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: But he shouted my name with all his might…and I regained myself for a moment.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: After I recovered my senses, I extracted the dark magic power with all my might.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You mean…the bird that was sealed in the Fire Forest was the dark magic power you drew out?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: The dark magic that controlled me was completely fused with my magic power.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: When I drew it out, it formed as fire.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Then the firebird started to attack Uris and I.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: But I couldn't move at all because I had drawn out too much magic power suddenly.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris tried to protect me and eventually…

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: No, I… killed Uris.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is that why you resisted me so hard and tried to defend Kabanes village?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even risking your life?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I wanted to uphold Uris' will…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then what are you going to do with that hairball?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Looks like he's really into you!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I've raised Kauris like a little brother.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Other than that… I don't have any special feelings for him.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hairball, did you hear that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Mariena doesn't have any special feelings for you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I don't care. I already know about this.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I understand Lady Mariena's painful past.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Really? I thought you'd be devastated.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: You probably have friends who forgive and understand your past.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I do, too.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I understand Lady Mariena.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: And I love Lady Mariena.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I will always stand by her side until her pain goes away.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Lady Mariena can keep calling me Uris.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If that helps to heal Lady Mariena's pain.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: …Kauris.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Call me Uris. That's better.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: …… I am sorry.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I think I… used you to fill my empty heart.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It's okay! That's what I want!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: If I can fill your empty heart, even just a little bit, then I am happy!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Please don't say it like that.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You remind me of Uris. He was a fool just like you!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Then maybe he really did reincarnate as me.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Although of all places, I was born in Vavelia… and so I had to go through a lot to get to Ürphea.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It doesn't really matter!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: As long as I get to like Lady Mariena!

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: ……Pfft.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: You are… such a child.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: How are you like this? Don't you have any pride at all?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: My pride means nothing in your presence.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: What's more important is, you finally smiled.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: In this Shadow World of never-ending darkness, even.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Fine. You win.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Thank you. Uris… Well,

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Kauris. It will be much better to call you by your real name.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's strange. Love works in here too…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't expect to see you here at all??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you here because I beat you up too much!?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'm the obsession towards you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If you get rid of me, my loyalty for you might fade.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So for your own good, you should probably leave my shadow be.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Well, I also probably won't disappear even if you beat me up.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So tell me. What kind of pain do you have?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Haha, I got stronger to protect my master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I carry no pain

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Only loyalty and obsession for you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …Libro. I know your obsession started in the palace.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Tall as a tree but weak in body, you were always picked on since childhood, you once told me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your only pride was in your cooking skills, I believe?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You were able to work at the palace thanks to your cooking skill!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I heard there was an accident because of your obsession for cooking…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That's true.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: At that time, cooking was all I had, and all I was.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Until I met you, master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Alright. How did it feel when you became the Palace Chef?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I felt on top of the world.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: When I became the Palace Chef, no one ignored me and everyone was happy to try my dishes.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Those who were less competent than me were so jealous, but couldn't do anything to me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I felt like I had the ultimate power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why were you kicked out from the palace?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Well…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The Pope was criticizing my dishes while he was eating.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Bah…what would an old fool with dead taste buds know about food?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So I took away the dishes that he was having.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That was pretty gutsy, Libro!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Was the Pope okay with that?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The Pope boarded me on a supply ship to Ürphea right away.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I had to make low-quality food every day in that little dirty supply ship… It was painful.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The starving Warriors were asking for better food…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What could I make with those rotten ingredients…? Ughh, it's nauseating to think of those days.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why didn't you go back to Vavelia?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I didn't know what other punishment the Pope would mete out should I return.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So I ran.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: In some ways, that led to my encounter with you, master. How fortunate!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You don't have to show me such excessive loyalty.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are a minion that never betrayed me and also my friend.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What are you talking about!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I finally found someone that I can rely on for everything, even more so than cooking!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It's you, master!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: FRRRIEND? I am your minion forever!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: At first, I thought you were loyal to me because I saved you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You see… I was thankful to you but also felt sad for you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You know, I think you're too obsessed with loyalty.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Of course! This is all for you…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now you should think more of yourself.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you remember what you said to me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That I'm still your master even if I don't have Agamo's power?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Honestly I… was so touched by that.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You… You are my true minion. Back then, everyone came to me because of my power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So now it's my turn to give you a reply.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are still my friend, with or without your loyalty. Libro.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So you can be at ease.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because I…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Won't discard you like the Pope.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: …Master………………

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I was SO SAD when I was kicked out of Vavelia… Sob sob!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I was so loyal to the kingdom, I did everything perfectly and I worked so hard…!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That one mistake had me kicked out of the Palace… Wahhhhhh!!!!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It wasn't fair!!!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So I didn't want to let you see a single mistake!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I thought that was how I would not be kicked out! Sob!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You fool. I won't abandon you!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But the trauma of the past probably made you what you are today.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now relax… And be at ease with me.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Thank you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I always thought I gave you advice…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But now I'm learning grander things from you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You have grown a lot.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You are indeed my master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But master. That was not the only reason I was obsessed with you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You were different from the Pope.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Not only did you save my life, but you wanted to grant immortality to all beings…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You are my true queen and master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Haha! Even your Shadow is ever-loyal to me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You are finally here. Warrior.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You must be the Shadow from my inner self.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You… You are?? That boy…!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew, I can't get used to seeing a hairy guy turn into a cute boy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why did you show up?

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Mom cried every day when she lost my brother.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait… Are you Ethan?

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: I fought with Kauris every day… But it still broke my heart when he disappeared.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: So I comforted mom who cried everyday because of my brother.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: But…

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: When it was decided that I would be exiled to Ürphea, mom was so happy.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: She told me to find Kauris… that I HAD TO find Kauris no matter what…

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: It just…made me so angry.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Mom was so sad when he went to Ürphea in secret…

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: But she was so happy when I was sent to Ürphea… I am so angry.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Why does she only care for Kauris?

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Why doesn't she worry about me? I'm her son, too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh no, you must have hurt a lot, kiddo.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Yes. A lot…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you met so many nice friends here, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also you found Kauris, too.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: What's in it for me, even if I did find my brother?

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: It will only delight mom!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now, your mom won't give you a hard time because of Kauris.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Oh…I guess?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you made up with your brother but you were still holding back feelings!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I thought you had a strong heart!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I didn't know you had a soft spot in you!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Hmph, NO!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: I… I don't have any grudges against my brother! I am not fragile!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: I am an awesome Warrior, so I can easily ignore this sadness!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Well, mom won't give me a hard time anymore, so I'm okay.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ooh~ That's amazing~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan. So you saved your brother AND your mother!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Hehe, I guess!

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Thank you. Big sis.

Item.name: Boy
Item.talkText: Now I can FINALLY get out of this kid's body.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Gosh… I am embarrassed… I showed you my younger self.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I can't believe I called you 'big sis'.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Haha, you were so cute!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You were so handsome, even when a boy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Huh…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ahem, no. Just cute. You were such a confident kid.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Well, thank you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I can tell, you are much stronger. Not just in body but also the heart, too.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I'm sure you can defeat this Shadow World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: All thanks to you guys.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you really Terrenord? Or did you change your looks?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I thought my horn grew a bit… It wasn't just my thoughts then… My body definitely has been changed.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Well, my talon has gotten harder.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I think my body has changed as I battled you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Have you evolved?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Well…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: My parents' body color were black. I am turning into my parents.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What, is your body still changing? I thought you were fully mature?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Well, I thought I had fully grown as well.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: But thanks to you, my hidden power has awoken.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Shall we test our powers?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Be careful. You might actually die this time.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Ha…why can I not defeat an immature deity?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Shame on me… Shame, shame…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey, if you're not fully mature either, doesn't that mean you're still young in dragon terms?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then we're both still kids. Stop acting like an adult!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: No… Nonsense!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: The only dragons older than me are Narrel and Ancient Dragon, at best.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: The oldest dragon in Vavelia is… Well, Temar is probably younger than me, too!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I heard that dragons die not from old age, but from battle wounds.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So maybe you guys still don't fully know the limit of your species' powers?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Hmm… That sounds plausible. We all die before the end of our lifespan…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Maybe dragons become more powerful than deities when they reach their final stage?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eh… I don't think so.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? Who are you?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Boule! I told you not to come out of the nest.

Item.name: Boule
Item.talkText: Grrr…?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Go back inside.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: You're still too young - you'll be in danger if you ever meet a larger dragon.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is that your daughter?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Yes. She's my daughter, Boule.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: She's my precious daughter who was almost lost because humans stole her when she was an egg!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Fortunately, I got the egg back and was able to hatch it safely.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: She's very strong, too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But why does she look like a human?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Umm… Boule's intelligence is still a bit low.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: She broke everything, everyday…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: So Laura transformed her into a human.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: That lowered Boule's violence, but I still couldn't take my eyes off her.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I let my minions guard the nest so Boule can't go out too far.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: But how did Boule come out from the nest?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Maybe Boule beat up your minions, too?

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I doubt it. They are strong.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Boule may be the spawn of the strongest, but she's still a baby dragon.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Hmm…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Could you do me a favor?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You're not asking me to find your daughter, are you? You find her yourself.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Well… If I searched the continents with my enormous body… It would be a disaster to all creatures.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: It seems Boule went into a cave… She's completely out of my sight.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: But if I leave my daughter like that… You'll be in trouble if she goes to those villages you rule.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm… If you say so.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Laura tied a bell on Boule's neck.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: There's a bell in the nest as well, so if you use it you will be able to find Boule.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: You will find Boule's nest when you go over the hill behind me.

Item.name: blPoint_0
Item.talkText: You'll see Boule's nest if you go behind me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Terrenord's minions? I haven't seen them before!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why didn't I see huge guys like you before?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Aha, you guys don't have wings! You must have challenged and lost to Terrenord.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I heard dragons tear off their opponent's wings to fully dominate them, right?

Item.name: zirconiaDragon_1
Item.talkText: Grrrr…
Item.label: 드래곤의 으르릉거리는 소리

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey hey, I came here because your boss asked me to. Do you really mean to fight me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Can't you hear me? Maybe these dragons can't speak yet.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: You must have found Boule's bell.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I'm sorry but please bring her back. If not, the continent will become quite troublesome.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: She's humanized, but still unable to speak…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well then, I have to use my power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I beat her down, but she gets right back up and runs away? No wonder Terrenord has his hands full.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let me use the bell to find Boule.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There're two of you! Did you replicate yourself?

Item.name: Nar1
Item.talkText: He's my brother. He came back from Vavelia.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: Another deity… Ha… This is crazy.

Item.name: Nar1
Item.talkText: Hey. What's the matter?

Item.name: Nar1
Item.talkText: That kid is strong but if we stand against her together, we can still win.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: You don't know a deity's power.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: Once, I lost big time because I looked down on Elysion.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: When I opened my eyes, I was buried in the ground. And she even hardened the ground with magic power.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: I was stuck in the ground… and couldn't do anything.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: Sometimes young deities beat me up for no reason…

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: Hungry… Hurt… I almost died.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: I was barely able to get out when Elysion's magic power weakened.

Item.name: Nar1
Item.talkText: Hey. You told me you fell into a food coma in Vavelia!

Item.name: Nar1
Item.talkText: But in fact, you couldn't come back because you were beaten by a deity?

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: Yeah, yeah. But saving my face is not the what's important now.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: If that little deity defeated you… that means she's growing very fast…

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: That kid… She is probably got much stronger than when you last fought her.

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: We need to use all our power…!

Item.name: Nar2
Item.talkText: All I could do was eat the boars that passed me by once in a while. I was so hungry…
Item.label: 엘리시온에게 당한 일화에 대해 추가설명

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How… How did you break my seal!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's impossible to break a master's seal, no matter how strong you are!

Item.name: Exceedrox
Item.talkText: I didn't break it with strength.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now you can speak, too!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You always did nothing but roar 'AHHHH!!!'

Item.name: Exceedrox
Item.talkText: You and I are connected with magic power.

Item.name: Exceedrox
Item.talkText: As you have grown up, I have also grown with you.

Item.name: Exceedrox
Item.talkText: It wasn't that hard to break the seal. My magic power was basically the same as your magic power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes~ Now you can be a good minion!

Item.name: Exceedrox
Item.talkText: Minion? Why would I?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why would you? I created you, so that makes me your master, and you are my minion!

Item.name: Exceedrox
Item.talkText: I am who I am.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You have your own personality, but not in the way that I expected.

Item.name: Exceedrox
Item.talkText: I won't let you manipulate me any longer.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Phew, you've become really stronger.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Still, that means you'll be more useful as a summoned creature.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Umm…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ummmm…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ummmmmm….!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's wrong?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We… Well…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I lost my costume note…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Have you seen my costume note…?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Sigh, I should have taken care of it well…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: There's a costume that I always wanted to make for you.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But I lost the costume note where I wrote down my design ideas.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why don't you make it again?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It just… takes a lot of time making it… Sob.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The timing was perfect, as this is the season when Tan Silk Cocoons emerge!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What a shame!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's okay. Make it next time when you organize your ideas.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, shouldn't Ethan be here by now?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'm already feeling depressed and he's coming too… It's THE WORST.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Didn't you guys make up when you said goodbye at the port?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: No. I can never forgive the mark he left on your hand.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will never ever forgive him. Ever.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. So you're not going to say hello to him?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Of course not.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then make the costume again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will help you to get the ingredient.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Re… really?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Looking at how much you're obsessed with it… I wonder how nice the clothes would be.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I will do my best since you have such high hopes for them!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Could you bring 10 'Tan Silk Cocoons'? Those can be found in Lunata Forest.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I asked warriors before, but they kept being charmed by the foxes in the forest.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Eh, cocoons? Aren't they really gross?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh, Tan Silk Cocoons look like cotton balls so they won't disgust you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Umm…!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …What? You look so much older since I saw you last time!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Oh… I'm Uris.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Mother fainted when she saw my face… I had to ask a deity to reconstruct my facial bones.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It took a lot of gold… But we were able to pay it off with Ethan's reward.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good to hear.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? What about Ethan?

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: An octopus attacked the ship on our way back.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It wasn't a big deal but that bastard was captured by the octopus.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Ethan was defeated by an octopus? But an octopus is very weak!!

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I guess. But he will come back by himself.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: That young man is probably on Octopus Island.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: That's the octopus' hideout.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: But it looks a bit far away to swim there…

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: And I'm afraid of the octopus…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then let me go with you.

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: I don't need to worry then!

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: It's 10,000 gold for a round trip.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, not again!

Item.name: Navigator1
Item.talkText: Hehe, I will cooperate as 'humanitarian assistance'.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh. Ethan, how can you be so stupid that you're captured by an octopus?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Huh?? Moccamori??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I've heard the octopus took you away! You are weak!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh… That is…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan, you just rest here!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: How are you?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You sound cheerful like always.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm just too bored of this peaceful time that's it~

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How are you, Ethan?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I became a Palace Warrior commander after Justice.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I hate annoying works but I ended up having a palace job.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I just got a vacation… My first day of vacation ruined because of that octopus.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You came to see me as soon as you got vacation days. How touching!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I thought I could see my friends and yeah…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …. Hmm?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So this is the octopus' treasure storage.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It must've stacked up all stolen things when it attacks ships.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nothing looks super nice. Well, let's go out.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Wait a second.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What are you doing?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: There we go. Let's go back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't say… Did you chase the octopus to get that thing back?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Yes. I have sent some to Ürphea beforehand, but I heard the supply ship was attacked by the octopus.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I was worried about my packages… Then the octopus attacked the ship that I was on, so I chased it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What did you send?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Souvenirs for friends…?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I will give yours when we go to your room.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I won't ask how have you been.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Me too. I believe you've been doing just fine.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But… what was the present that you gave to master that makes her not getting out from the dressroom?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: No need to know.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Where is my present?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: There's none.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You said you brought presents for friends?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I lost them. The octopus attacked the supply ship.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Pssh. I didn't expect anything from you at all!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan, can I come out…?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Wh… What! Master!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What's up with those clothes!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan… Did you chase the octopus because of this?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I really wanted to give you this.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The village I live in, Lalaque Village, is so skilled at making clothes that they offer them as tributes to the palace.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I ordered this specially for you to celebrate you to become a true queen.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ee… Eeek!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hmm…?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: You forgot the hairband.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm…? Ethan. You're good at tying hair…?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I used to volunteer to play with village kids on weekends.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I trimmed their hair too.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hmm… Guess I didn't lose my skills. It feels the same when I tied their hair.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Is it because you're small…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey hey, I'm a deity. I get much bigger than you when I fully grow!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Okay done~

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ethan! White clothes look too shallow!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is for noble kids!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But master is queen!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So for master, dark brown looks much better to show queen's dignity!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master! Take off those clothes! Now!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: …… I like this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I wanted to try white clothes too.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ma… Master…?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Good. It fits you well too.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Wa… Wait, how did you know master's size?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Oh, let me give you back.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This… THIS IS!?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: YOU TOOK MY COSTUME NOTE!?!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I borrowed it for a second. Thank you.

Item.name: libro
Item.talkText: Grrr! You bastard!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Hmm… The origin of Dark Magic Stone was primal deities…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Then why the descendants didn't know about this?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Maybe it was a shameful past to former deities…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If the descendants knew about this…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Deities were hunted more awfully than now.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What if Ida didn't take off the desire?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Maybe a primal deity who was strong like Agamo and has so much greed like the Pope would rule the world.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That sounds horrible.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If that happened… We couldn't even think go against him.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Maybe… The pope is a life being that reflects deities who did not remove their desires…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even though Ida said it's possible, but this is unbelievably absurd match.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I feel the same way.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: How they can hand over the job to the young descendant they couldn't even finish?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's okay. If we fail, the next generation can do it.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But… If we fail, I'm afraid I'm going to lost you, master.
Item.label: 에단과 리브로 중 호감도가 높은 사람이 모카를 걱정하는 말을 합니다.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It's because if we fail, we might lose you.
Item.label: 에단과 리브로 중 호감도가 높은 사람이 모카를 걱정하는 말을 합니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't worry about me! I've passed near-death experiences.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Also now that I'm with you guys, I feel much more secure.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel like I can do anything with you guys.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Sure. I don't think I can stop you.
Item.label: 리브로와 에단 중 호감이 높은 사람이 이 대사를 하게 됩니다.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: If you say so, I can't stop you either.
Item.label: 리브로와 에단 중 호감이 높은 사람이 이 대사를 하게 됩니다.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida hid the gate to the Shadow World somewhere in the snowfield.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Let's go when we're ready!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think this will be enough.
Item.label: 리브로가 요청한 재료를 다 모음.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Here I go!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You look stunning in this.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Do you like it, master?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm… It's lighter and softer!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I like it!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I'm so glad master likes this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's wrong?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I forgot to give you Magic Power Brooch.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I just made this new Magic Power Stone, how do you like it?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You put the Magic Power Stone on your right arm, so it must have been a bit irritating.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's very small… Can it increase my magic power?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This Magic Power Stone is from Agamo's Soul Stone so it will work fine.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: It took me quite some time to shave it because the Soul Stone was too solid.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay. Good work, Libro.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: By the way, I'm worried because you are too loyal to me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Sometimes I'm worried if you would get too exhausted.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Ha, never. This job is all my life.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Oh, while you were changing your clothes, Ethan passed the Palace gate.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ethan is here already?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I heard the octopus attacked the ship. Are you all alright?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Really? That mushy octopus, is it still messing with people in the ocean?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I should take off one of its legs!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I took care of the octopus that attacked people on the ship.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But… The supply ship was attacked too, so I lost the present for you guys.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Hmm. That's a shame.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I've looked at the villages on my way here, they all look peaceful.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: How is everyone, fine?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Fine… Hmm…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As I expected… Am I the one at the end of Shadow World?

Item.name: MochamoriDark1
Item.talkText: You are finally here. Another me.

Item.name: MochamoriDark1
Item.talkText: What should we do? You are me, and I am you. So you can never get rid of me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That means you can't get rid of me too!?

Item.name: MochamoriDark1
Item.talkText: I won't kill you. Instead, I the shadow, will rule you.

Item.name: MochamoriDark1
Item.talkText: You saw from the outside world! The one who was devoured by Dark Magic Stone.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won!

Item.name: MochamoriDark1
Item.talkText: You think this is it?

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: All the primal deities failed on this.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: What makes you so confident and challenge this world?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have nothing behind my back.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just want to finish this long battle from the beginning of the world.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Are you that confident because you defeat some shadows that the Temple Lords left?

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Ha, you are arrogant as the primal deities.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: I will tell you the reason you are destined to fail.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Everyone has darkness inside that can't be hidden.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Darkness remains deep inside the people who say they have overcome their dark past.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Then the darkness hides, and it grows without knowing it, and one day it will rule itself again.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: So do you. Because you have darkness in you. That's why you can't win me from Shadow World.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's no use with those words. I won't back down.
Item.label: '이긴다'가 아니라 포기하지 않겠다는 표현을 해주세요.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Do you only see me as a lie and an evil being?

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: No. Moccamori. It's your prejudice that the darkness is evil.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: The real inside of you under the bright side. I, the darkness is the truth that shows the true nature.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Take me inside of you. Then…

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Don't mind anyone and take out all the hatred and sadness inside you!

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Psssh… I see. You are not very easy…

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: It's just a memory from a short time… Why doesn't it break?

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: You didn't have that much of warm heart in you before, did you?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: As you say, under the bright side, hidden under the shell…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: There may still be hatred and sadness towards humans.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I still didn't find the warrior who killed my mother and father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I keep thinking about him too. What would I do if the warrior comes in front of me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have the power that can kill the warrior in one second…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Nobody can punish me for that, what kind of choices would I make?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Would I kill the warrior right away? Or would I forgive him?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Honestly, I'm still afraid.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't know if I can hold this longer, then I will take out myself from the past again and take my happiness away.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Yes, are you admitting now?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I want you to know that the brightness you hate, is another truth that surrounds the darkness.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: What? Now you're talking nonsense.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: The outside is just a shell. How can it be true?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Because the outside that you're talking about, the happiness of this moment…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It's a fruit that is grown from the dark shadow.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So the past dark myself is still me,

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And the happy me is still real me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: One of us doesn't have to be a lie.

Item.name: MochamoriDark2
Item.talkText: Enough of your nonsense!

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: Can you still stay calm with this!? They are the ones who killed mother and father!
Item.label: 세 번째로 변신한 어둠의 모카의 대사. 어둠의 모카가 크라운, 교황, 용사들을 소환했다.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: Be more furious!! Don't look away from your pain!!

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: Eeek…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Do you remember what you first said to me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can't defeat you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That means you can't defeat me too.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: Then go away from this world NOW!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I won't leave until you make up with me.
Item.label: '너'가 아닌 '나'로 표현해주세요. 모카가 또 다른 자신인 그림자 모카에게 하는 말.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I have been mistaken something because I was being hated for a long time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I… Felt like all the conflicts in Ürphea were my fault.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm happy now that the war is over… But something didn't feel right.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You must be the one who represents my shame.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I kept trying to hide you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I am sorry. I hated myself too much.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But you are precious to me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I became stronger because of you… And got happy memories.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Without you, I wouldn't be here now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will remember you when I face to harder times than now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So let's go through this together.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then we can do more amazing things together.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: …… Ha…

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: I can't wear you down. I guess you are indeed me.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: Usually, most guys try to fight against the shadow version of themselves, fail, and be devoured by the darkness.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: All the strong ones were trapped in this.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: Maybe you're the first one.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: Who was able to cover its own shadow.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: The primal deities couldn't even thought of it.

Item.name: MochamoriDark3
Item.talkText: I'm so proud of myself.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: I think maybe… the perfect existence of a deity is like you, Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What does that mean?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: The primal deities wanted to be a perfect being.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: That's why they made a mistake by throwing the disaster called 'Dark Magic Stone' in the world.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: But now I can see by looking at the descendants.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You have to embrace your inner darkness, take it and grow with it…

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: But the primal deities didn't.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: They just took off the darkness from themselves.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: So we did not grow up.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: That's why the primal deity couldn't defeat the shadow.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You are the perfect being that we all wished for.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: I was the imperfect one who was called by Agamo.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No. Without previous deities' failure, I couldn't succeed this today.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: We ALL did this together!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But Ida, even if I overcame my shadow, how does this affect the real world?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So did I get the power that can purify all the Dark Magic Stones??

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I still can't feel changes in my magic power…?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You will be able to find the answer from the next place.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Huh? I just fought with myself! That wasn't the end?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: There is the deepest place in Shadow World.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You will defeat the darkest place with no problem.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I found you!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Hey, Moccamori. You're here!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hehe, were you running from everywhere and you finally caught by Laura?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: No. Boule came to me.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: She was asking me to change her into a dragon's body.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: But Boule. Why don't you put yourself in Terrenord's place?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Do you remember you got hurt when you were impudent to Zirconia Dragon?

Item.name: Boule
Item.talkText: Grrr…
Item.label: 지르코니아 드래곤에게 깔린 안 좋은 기억이 떠오른 보르레

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You were almost crushed to death under the Zirconia Dragon's tail.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You say you're okay but Terrenord is not.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Terrenord got mad because of you, so he took off Zircona Dragons' wings.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You know your father's temper right? He doesn't care anything when he gets mad.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Boule, you don't want other innocent lives to get hurt because of you, do you?

Item.name: Boule
Item.talkText: Grrr….

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Oh, I have a good idea.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Moccamori. Why don't you take Boule as your minion?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What? Why would I? It's her father's work to take care of his baby!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Boule. Why don't you go on an adventure with that lady?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Then you won't be that bored.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Who are you to tell me what to do?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Huh… Boule is changing already? My magic power must have been weaker.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Ugh, she will be pretty psyched and go crazy right after the transformation…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Moccamori. Please take care of this.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: See, I don't have much magic power now…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So annoying.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I just defeated her… why does she like this?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I think she just found a friend who can play with her.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: So? Isn't Boule strong enough to be your minion?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Her skill is fine… But I feel like I am forced to take care of her.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Well, she looks quite calm right now!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Boule admits Moccamori is much stronger than she is.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Then Boule will listen to Moccamori very well. Won't you, Boule?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm… I did want to get a White Dragon… She would look nicer when she grows up, right?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: She will transform into her dragon form sometimes. Just be careful when that happens.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Let's be friends!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Boule just needed a friend.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: I didn't know that and just scold her.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: That's right… At her age, it's normal to breathe fire and fly the sky but I stopped her doing that. Boule must've been so stressed out.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: But then, there wouldn't be any human's villages.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Since you are the queen of people, please share the responsibility with me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, don't say like it's ought to be!

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Take this.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Those warriors tried so hard to take my talons in the past.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: My talons are THAT good as a magic ingredient. You can enhance your talon with this.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm strong. I don't need this anymore…

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: If you become so lazy, you will fall behind me.

Item.name: Terrenord
Item.talkText: Just be stronger. My rival.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Pssh, fine.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I will be much stronger so you can always challenge me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Are you ready?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: This is the last battle you're going to have.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Shadow has guided me from the beginning when I entered this world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I see. The reason that Ida sent me to this world…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Gosh, pure deities… They seem like they don't understand other beings' situations or feelings…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But on the other hand, they take all the others' burdens too.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Did you finally find out Ida's plan?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: So what are you going to do now? Are you going to fight with me?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Don't be hesitated by the shadow's words.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Just keep following the way that you've passed so far.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You said what happens in Shadow World also affects the outside world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now I know.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't get the power that can purify Dark Magic Stone when I win from this battle.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I know if I eliminate your shadow, the real body at the outside world would disappear too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You knew when you disappear, the Dark Magic Stones you made will lose the power, right?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: So the reason you did so many things for thousands of years was… to be dead?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Are you afraid? If my death would make you grief?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How can I not be?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How would you feel if you were me?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida! Do you even have any feelings?

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori. I am just going to rest in peace.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I have existed for a very long time.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: But as much as the time, the Dark Magic Stones that I made ruined the world.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I was in pain. To seeing the chaos in the world because of me.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I want to get out of this pain.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Please do this for me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You fool!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even if all the Dark Magic Stones in Ürphea disappear!!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Chaos will never disappear in the world! Because everyone is imperfect!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And that's how we grow up and we will overcome this as we've always had!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Isn't that what you wanted to teach the descendants!?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I don't want to achieve anything by sacrificing someone else!

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: Thank you. Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Ida
Item.talkText: I always had people around me who wanted my magic.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yes, that's why I'm going to quit this fight right now!

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: But I can't just let you go.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori, you will cause a big convulsion in the world.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: I will get rid of you now.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No need! I won't fight!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I… Ida!?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Maybe you don't have enough motivation for just removing the illusion. Then let me see…
Item.label: 허상 = 마력의 흔적으로 소환된 아이다

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: You have lots of connections in Ürphea.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: I should do some tricks to Ürphea through you…!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: ……Ida?

Item.name: playerObj
Item.talkText: Gaah…
Item.label: 어둠의 아이다의 공격에 당함

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: I will show you, Lady Moccamori. The world in the edge of despair.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: What's happening…? I've never seen this dark magic power before.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Gosh… This is too strong. What kind of magic power is this?

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Varnado Garden might be tainted by dark magic power.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Let's try to stop it with our magic power for now. Noa.

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: Huff… Huff…

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: Damn it…! We came to defeat the Dark Stone Cave monster…

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: We are going to get killed instead…

Item.name: Warrior1Boss
Item.talkText: What is happening? Why they got so much stronger?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: The magic power flow from Pruto Lake is very unstable.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Something nonsense is happening right now.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Let's get out of here!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Run?! I'm going to fight!

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: If we die, we can't protect the village! Just listen to me!

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: What's wrong with the water's color…

Item.name: Merchant_item
Item.talkText: The sky is dark too. It's not just dark clouds.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: Gosh… It looks like the light itself is getting disappear…

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Lady Mariena. This darkness is…?

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Moccamori… Good luck.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This… This is…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master… You will get over this. I believe in you!!

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: She has overcome everything.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Moccamori will surely clear away this darkness.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No… NO!!

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Ürphea will be devoured by the darkness soon.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: How do you feel?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: STOP IT!

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Good. Be more furious.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: The more you get angry, the faster the darkness will spread.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Oh, I got a better idea.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: It would be fun to send dark Lady Moccamori to the outside world.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: How about destroying the kingdom and the bondings you have made?

Item.name: DarkIda
