Item.talkText: Now you feel like have a fight against me?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: I was a bit worried if a thousand years of wait would be over just like that.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: So, let's see what you got. Take out your everything and defeat me.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: This is the deepest place. Follow me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Wait. Ida.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Something is a bit strange.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How you look. You seem very calm…?
Item.label: 마력의 흔적으로 구체화된 몸은 불안정해서 시간이 조금 지나면 사라지기 때문

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can see a lot of your magic power traces…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can feel more magic power from this unstable world than the outside world.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What's happening?

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Nothing strange about this.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: This is the world that I made.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: So it's obvious that my magic power's trace is all over this world.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: Oh, this trial will be much harder than the trials you've been through before.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: You can go back to the outside world and come back with more training.

Item.name: IdaAdult
Item.talkText: I will go ahead and wait for you.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Phew…

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Now I can be finally free.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Don't say like it's nothing.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: It doesn't feel right to me.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: What was Ida's real desire?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Was it to rule the world like the Pope?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Was it to harass people who are weaker than him?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: My desire is to be perfect.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: If I can take care of the darkness that I left at the world by myself…

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: That is my ultimate goal and it will be achieved.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: I have achieved my goal.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Thank you. Lady Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Is that all you could do?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Was death the only way to solve this?

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori. Death is fair to everyone.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: But it wasn't fair to me.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Don't be too sad.

Item.name: DarkIda
Item.talkText: Both my selves in this world and the outside are happy.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Now you are the one who leads this generation.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Lady Moccamori, you will do fine.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No way… Ida's plan was making himself extinct!

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Maybe that is why Derkarr Temple Lords disappeared…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Have you heard anything from Lord Elysion, Pieberry?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: No… I never heard about this before.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: But I'm sure mother was also finding a way to fight back to Shadow World.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: You know the Mirror Room in mother's temple?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Yes. When you go into that room, a reflection of you comes out.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Moccamori told us the mirror in Mirac Temple does the same thing.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: There is a similar room in Derkarr too.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: People test the limits of their magic power and patience.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: So all the Temple Lords prepared for the fight against Shadow World.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: My mom always taught me to grow up from winning battles against myself.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: And told me to be a great Temple Lord.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: It sounds similar to Ida's training method.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Now I hear about it… It does sound similar.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: That means… Vavelia Temple Lords also had plans for their extinction…?

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: It doesn't have to be the same as Ida!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I'm okay if the Dark Magic Stone doesn't disappear. I don't want Lord Aramute to be gone!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Even if there're problems because of Dark Magic Stone again, we can take care of it!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I think so too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Even if the Dark Magic Stone disappears, conflicts in this world never disappear.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Things that are as hard as they are now will continue to happen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then we can get through this like now.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Sure. We can fight then!

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: I agree.

Item.name: Airuddy
Item.talkText: Yes. Me too.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hmm…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Then how can I lead the continent from now on?

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: I don't want to think about what I have to do now or later.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Let's just live this moment, and if someone needs our help then we can help.

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: Ida and Adlai… They also tried something big for the world but they made mistakes, didn't they?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: They did. I also did too…

Item.name: Pieberry
Item.talkText: It's okay. Everybody can make mistakes!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I hope our descendants remember this.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Leave it as a book.

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Or record what happened these days…

Item.name: Luna
Item.talkText: Or why don't you leave some words you want to say to the descendants?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: That's a good idea.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Then why don't you write it on a book made of slate?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I would be sturdier than a book written in inks. Also if you enhance the slate with magic power, it will be much sturdier.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Then someone won't be able to change the book's contents.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Okay, let's get started!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Today is the beginning of another peaceful day.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: All of this… all thanks to master.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You have found Ida's trace. Is this the beginning of a new trip?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: What, Ida is the one who made the Dark Magic Stone in Ürphea?

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I feel like you have responsibility for this as a deity.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The descendants have a better chance to defeat the shadow than the primal deities…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I am a bit worried if Ida would ask you to do everything later on.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: So all the Temple Lords from other continents prepared the war with the shadow. We are going to be like them too.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: I agree with Ida.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: You were able to grow up because you got hurt, and that's why you were able to overcome all these things.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Aha… The battle between Ida and Adlai was because of the ideal difference.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Both made the plans to save the world… It was such a tragedy…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Master, you have overcome everything. And you will.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Shadow World can't handle master.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I think I got into this big deal as soon as I got a vacation.
Item.label: 에엔딩 후 1단과 호감이 낮을 때 에단의 대사

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: But I can't do anything when my friend goes through a difficult situation. Well, summon me anytime.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I have made a vow to the queen, and I am willing to die with her.
Item.label: 엔딩 후 에단과 호감이 있을 때 대사

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: If you need my help, please summon me. Alright? Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When I do and when I win, just be ready to do applause.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is where I lost mother, father, and almost lost Pieberry too…
Item.label: 서쪽 해안 동굴에서 혼잣말

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: This is where I can never forget even though this cave looks like nothing.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: Oh, lady Moccamori!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: You're just in time.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: What were you looking at?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, the flowers….!

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Varon's hard work finally came through.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: The ground is gradually purified starting from the flowers in this darkness.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon… I wish you had waited a little longer.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sorry I couldn't help you.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I'll keep Varon's will, so don't worry.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Once the land is healed, I will also do research on how to reverse deities and humans that were tainted by dark magic power.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: The fairies' magic power is also helping Arkas.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: If we don't lose our faith, it will happen someday.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Yeah, please.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Varon. Your hard work finally came through.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You planted the light in this darkness.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I'm sorry I couldn't help you.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: But I'll keep your will, so please watch me.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I am taking good care of the spring.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I am taking good care of the spring.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: I am also finding a way to purify Varnado too.

Item.name: Arkas
Item.talkText: Slowly… I will do my best to purify here before I die.

Item.name: Noa
Item.talkText: You can do this. I will help you too.

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: I almost died right after my magic power was taken away but I'm fine now.

Item.name: Denny
Item.talkText: I got more magic power back and I'm healthier than the before. I think my sister's anger toward you has been relieved too.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: I think there were some misunderstandings in the past.

Item.name: LunataChief
Item.talkText: We understand each other's goals, and from now on we will work together to protect this continent and the village.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: I'm so relieved to end the fight with you.

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: I almost died because I had to make dozens of armors. Gosh!

Item.name: WeaponMakerLunata
Item.talkText: I didn't care who would win… I really just wished the war to end.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: I am bored to death. Are there any fun things to do?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: It was more fun when I fought with Moccamori.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Why? Were you not scared of me?

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: No! It was actually more fun to protect the village!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Also I don't like to be treated like a kid.

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Now I think of it, it was also fun to fight with Agamo with Moccamori!

Item.name: Edis
Item.talkText: Call me anytime when you have something fun. Okay?

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: I still don't like you.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: But you gave back magic power to my sister so I forgive you… for now.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: But… I give you the credit since you stopped your father's rage.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: But if you would have any other thoughts, don't forget. I will stop you anytime.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: If I knew the peace would come like this, I should not do anything.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: My minions went through so much because of me.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: No, I wouldn't have looked at myself without you rebels.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: With these and those things, I have finally changed my mind and stopped my father.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Your work meant a lot.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You did this to protect your precious people.

Item.name: Sena
Item.talkText: Pssh, no need to cheer me up.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Hey, Mocca.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Hey! How are you?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I got a lot of work to do because of the trade increase.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I have to watch those smuggled goods, also inspect and catch criminals who come here.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You seem too busy right after you came back as the lord!

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: If you don't care about it from the start, the village is going to get worse.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: You always have to take care of it.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Good work. I can count on you, Shukrina!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Hey, Moccamori!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: How are you?

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I was almost moribund to using magic power for saving Pieberry!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I think I will be sick for a while. Phew…

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I can give you some magic power.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: No, that's not enough.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: But I can't ask you a lot when you have your own things.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I can hold up, so don't worry.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: It was my duty to help you as Ida's messenger…

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I just took care of the accident during my mission. So don't worry.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, I feel bad.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You said it's not your fault because you didn't do it, huh?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The one who did that was my minion, and it was an accident during my work.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: At least I feel a responsibility because I'm the queen.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: I feel sorry about the past. It won't happen again.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: When this happens again, I will take the full responsibility.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You have changed a lot, Moccamori!

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: But don't feel too sorry about this.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: It was a pleasure to help you among all the descendants that I helped.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: I had no idea this kid would grow up.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: But she became this amazing strong queen… I was so amazed and had fun.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: Deities' lifespan is very long. You will go through more big things in your life.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: So no matter what trials you are going to face, please lead this continent as you are now.

Item.name: Laura
Item.talkText: You got that?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Of course.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: Oh hey? The chosen one is here!

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: The boredom came to me again. Also, Lord Nova didn't tell me any prophecy after this.

Item.name: Rimula
Item.talkText: If you have something interesting, please summon me.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: There was a hero that was died to protect Kabanes village.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I always remember and honor him.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I am called Uris to take over his will.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: My real name was Kauris anyway… It wasn't that awkward when people called me Uris.

Item.name: Oldman_Cavanes
Item.talkText: Let's forget about the past. We did that just for survival.

Item.name: Man_cavanes
Item.talkText: We thought about what we could do, and this is the best option for us.

Item.name: Man_cavanes
Item.talkText: Lunata village mines metals, and we make weapons.

Item.name: Man_cavanes
Item.talkText: Kabanes is much better than Lunata in making weapons!

Item.name: SugarGrand
Item.talkText: I know. Even though you are small, the dream inside of you is bigger than anybody else's.

Item.name: WeaponMaker
Item.talkText: It's hard to sell weapons these days. I can't even get the ingredients. I can't think of any ideas too…

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: Pruto village is always peaceful, so I don't think there's much change even the war was ended.

Item.name: Woman_purto_0
Item.talkText: All thanks to the queen.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I think harvesting is better since the queen ended the big battle.

Item.name: Famer_purto
Item.talkText: I think the soil is more fertile …Is it just me feeling this way?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: There are no big things these days, but we just hunt wild boars sometimes.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I am no help to the queen, but I would like to be a little help to the village security.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: It's so peaceful… Do you think the palace would reduce the size of the army?

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I'm not good at anything… This is the perfect job for me.

Item.name: Soldier
Item.talkText: I am just loafing around…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I wish I could have done better. But…at least take it. I barely got this.
Item.label: 에단이 모카에게 줄 드레스를 잃어버린 대신 겨우 건진 붉은 보석 20개를 주면서 하는 대사가 추가됨 (리브로가 준 새 옷 이벤트)

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: According to Ida's plan,^nall the Dark Magic Stones in Ürphea lost power.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: The long history established by Ida had finally come to a close.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Ida probably knew already:

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: That even with the Dark Magic Stones gone…^nthe world's conflicts will never disappear.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: Ida gave most of his magic power to future generations. Maybe…

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: He wanted to give his last gift^nthat he could give to us.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I have a problem now.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What should I, who has been gifted with magic power from Ida, leave behind for future generations?

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: We should make a record of this, since so much has happened.
Item.label: 책을 남긴 모카모리에게 하는 에단의 말

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: It would be nice to bind the tales into several books and store them in the palace library, so that they will exist for future human generations

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: The king is favorable to deities, so I'm sure he'll cooperate fully.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: In WitchSpring5, the story of future generations will continue.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Oh, if you need my help, feel free to summon me.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: It was too peaceful and boring in Vavelia.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Here is today's report.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: We have secured partners and trade routes for procuring Vavelia's goods.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Also, new clothes have come in at Rubid Port, so it might be nice to have a look at them.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: And…

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Even though the magic power supply from Pruto Tree has been cut off, it's been confirmed that there's no problem with the local soil.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: That means Pruto Village's soil is rich enough to not need Pruto Tree's magic power!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The village is also doing well. Their previous Warriors are now working as monster hunters.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: Thanks to them, the trading between villages is safe now.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: All seems too good to be true.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: All thanks to your graciousness, master.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Boring. Is there anything I can do…?

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Oh, right. Last time, Ida said there were some traces of magic power he left.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: Well, I wanted to hear about the story between Ida and father. Maybe I should go search for the traces of magic power?

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I even didn't know I have resentment towards villagers.

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: I thought I was inherited father's will and doing well...

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You also know what happened in Shadow World...

Item.name: Shucreena
Item.talkText: Yes. The world that shows your inner world and connected to the real world...

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: I hurt you, Kauris. Because I was obsessed with Uris.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: Pssh, Lady Mariena. I told you I am okay.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: … Thank you.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Thanks to you, I was able to get out of my repentant and obsession with the past.

Item.name: Mariena
Item.talkText: Uris. I think it was my destiny to meet you.

Item.name: Uris
Item.talkText: I really think so too!

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: The word you said to me in Shadow World, I will remember that forever.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: But the passion for you won't go away.

Item.name: Libro
Item.talkText: This is not an obsession, but my true heart towards you.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: What happened in Shadow World... feels like that's what I've been through in real life.

Item.name: Ethan
Item.talkText: I only wanted show you my strong warrior-like images... I showed you my younger version of me. What a shame.

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: You were cute! You were smaller than me!

Item.name: Mochamori
Item.talkText: And handsome.
